Normal.Transcription: You want my services? Heh heh. I'd be happy to, but we aren't cheap, Sensei.
It's hard to imagine our office looking like this.
I wonder how much the rent would be.
Haha. The future of Problem Solver is looking pretty bright.
*sigh* This reminds me of back when I was in middle school.
I oughta throw a shindig for my employees in a place like this.
Heeheehee. With this... I can take out anyone or anything with one shot.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei! I'll be your bodyguard again today!
I've been waiting for you. Problem Solver 68 is ready to tackle anything.
Ha. I'm looking forward to working with you.
Hahaha! You wanna see what I can do, right?
...Huh? You don't?
You have to work overtime all night...? B-But what about our date?
Wh-What am I saying? Ahaha! I guess we never did agree on that, did we?

Heh heh. Nothing gets by Problem Solver 68. Happy birthday, Sensei.
Huh? It was yesterday? S-Sorry...
...Wait! It is today!

Today is the birthday of yours truly! You'd better remember it!
One day, it will be one of Kivotos' holidays.
Happy New Year to you. Expect me to work hard on your requests this year.

Christmas... Oh, right. The most recent request I received...
...was to eliminate a "Santa Claus".

Whoa, whoa, whoa! Wh-What is that freaky thing?
N-Nope! I wasn't surprised at all. Not me! You think I'm lying?!

Normal.Transcription: What do I need to do? Teach me, Sensei.
I've started to feel excited for some reason. I wonder why.
Is this what's popular in the world today?
Hmm...
Would it be okay to undress in a place like this?
What a beautiful place. Or so I assume. I don't have an eye for it.
A multipurpose tactical tool... It's easy to use, even for beginners.

Lobby.Transcription: I've been waiting for you, Sensei.
...Huh? Sensei? When did you get here?
Eimi of the Super Phenomenon Task Force. Standing by.

I've been instructed several times to be mindful of where I take off my clothing.
It's only logical to undress in order to regulate one's body temperature when overheating. I do not understand why people react so strangely.
Isn't it kind of hot in here?
I often hear that I lack emotion, but I don't really understand what that means.
It won't affect my graduation, will it...?

Today marks the anniversary of when you were born, Sensei? 
I see. That makes it a joyous occasion.
You and I would have never met if not for that day.

Birthday...? Oh, right. I forgot that I had one.
You don't have to congratulate me. It's not something I celebrate.
Huh? If you insist... Th-Thanks.

Today is no different from any other day.
But it feels special anyway. Isn't that strange?
Yes. Happy New Year.

I heard that today is a special day, but what would make it special for lovers?
Elucidate me, Sensei.
How severe will the "trick" consequence be if I don't give out treats on Halloween?

Event.Transcription: You're back, Sensei. Nice to see you again.
Ugh... Sleepy...

Do I look cold in this outfit?
Well, I like it because it's airy.

This outfit is cool, but shell casings keep getting in...
It's troublesome.
That was...faster than I expected.
Approved.

Normal.Transcription: Welcome to the Gourmet Research Society. Are you ready to go on an adventure in search for the pinnacle of taste?
A gourmand's journey is long and treacherous...
What is deliciousness? What does it mean to us?
Delicious food is a gift from the divine.
I live every day striving to find the apex of taste.
I'd be glad to answer any questions you have about fine foods.
The path of a gourmand is no different from that of a trainer. Seeking finality, exploring, and moving forward. Heehee... With this, I am indeed able to move forward.

Lobby.Transcription: Heehee. I never get tired of seeing your face.
Oh, that was a compliment. You should take it. Heehee...
You feel the same way about me?
Oh, how have you been? Heeheehee.
Taiyaki? It's my favorite food. Heehee.
Do I enjoy going to gourmet restaurants? Heehee. I suppose I don't mind them.
But what I enjoy more than the atmosphere...
...is sharing a meal with someone I love. ♥
Pretty...? Wh-What are you talking about?

Happy birthday, Sensei. No birthday is complete without a cake.
Fresh whipped cream is always good, or you could put lots of rich cheese on top.
Fresh fruit would be good too.

Oh, you remembered my birthday. Heehee. I'm flattered. 
Are we going out to a nice restaurant? I'm looking forward to it.

Happy New Year, Sensei. I would recommend...rice cake soup.
I can grill this or just throw it in as is.
Throw in potatoes and dumplings, boil them in broth... Baby, you got a stew to go with your kotatsu. Heehee.

Merry Christmas. Burning a yule log would be appropriate. Maybe we could have cinnamon cookies too?
As long we're together and by the candlelight, I don't care what we eat. Heehee...

Do you know what Kivotos' most delicious candy is? You don't?
Well, I do.
It's the candy you're holding right now. So...can I have some too?

Normal.Transcription: Ahaha... I'm still new to this kind of thing, so please be patient with me.
Peroro merch...
Ahaha... I wonder.
It might be okay if we all came together next time.
I think something like this could be fun too!
Hmm... I wonder...
This... Is it really...the weapon?! With this, I can gain a bit more confidence, right?!

Lobby.Transcription: I'm relying on you, Sensei.
Ah, Sensei. You're back!
I'll do my best.

This? This is Peroro.
Isn't he cute?
What do I worry about? Being too average, I guess...
Is there anything you need my help with?
Ahaha... Nothing's going to come out no matter how hard you shake it...

I'm so happy you have time to teach me. I want to learn all I can!
Because that's the best way I can repay you!
Sensei! Thank you so much for the birthday wishes! I'm so happy!
H-Happy New Year! This year, I'm going to be all I can be by your side!

Feliz Navidad! It's Christmas.
It is the most special day of the year in Trinity.
And...to me as well.

Whoa! Geez.
Oh, so today's Halloween.

Normal.Transcription: Nice to meet you. I'm the head prefect, Hina, though I sincerely hope that went without saying.
Cute stuff...
If only I could take a nap...
Thankfully, there are no pressing concerns.
You don't mind if I take it easy, do you?
This is a little embarrassing...
Every story has an ending. I'll see it through with you.

Lobby.Transcription: Ah, I've been waiting for you, Sensei.
There's no need to treat me any differently.
As long I'm here, I'm like every other club member.
Hey... C-Can you not pet me like that?
I'm the head prefect. Someone might see us...
What do you mean it's okay if we're seen?! Wh-What has gotten into you?!
No cutting corners! Do your job properly!
I will aid you to the best of my ability. Call on me if need be.
(I wish I could have some fun... Maybe whine a little too...)
(But it'd probably be odd coming from me...)
Wh-What's on my mind? N-Nothing! Nothing at all!

Sensei... I hear it's your birthday. I can wish you a happy birthday, can't I?
Though, I'm sure you'd rather hear that from someone cuter than me...
N-No?

Th-Thank you, Sensei. I had forgotten all about my birthday.
Hmm? You'd like for us to go out together?

It's a new year. Here's to another great year together.
I'll keep trying my hardest too.

Christmas... Are you okay with spending a day this special with me?
That... That makes me happy.

I don't know much about Halloween. I haven't been to any festivals.
But even I can feel the buzz in the atmosphere.

Event.Transcription:
Ah, Sensei. There's a whole pile of tasks to be done. I was hoping you'd lend a hand.
Would you mind helping me out a little bit?

Welcome, Sensei.
The party aside, there's something else I must do as part of the Prefect Team.
Seems the work is never done, no matter how much you finish.
Hm? "You feel that in your bones?" Heehee. So you work a lot, as well...

I have no plans to stop working.
I am Gehenna's head prefect, after all.

Ah, thank you.
This is a small gift for your help. Please, take it.

Perfect. As expected of you, Sensei. I think I can rest easy now...
This is a small gift for your help. Here.

Normal.Transcription: *yawn* Let's take it slow and steady. No point in wearing ourselves out.
This seems like a nice place. I like it.
Where's a good place to take a nap?
Easy does it.
Hmm. This might work.
Heh... It'll be okay, I think.
Sensei, I'll try again with this, so please continue to take care of me.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. I see that you're still working as hard as ever.
Yo! Welcome. You've got a lot of work waiting for you.
This place is cool. I like it.
I imagine you have it rough, Sensei.
You need me? Ugh, thanks for the empty compliment.
Huh? You actually mean it? Oh, o-okay... Th-Thanks.
There's no shame in pacing yourself. It's important to take your time.

Heh... Birthday? I've never thought about your birthday before.
Ahaha, I'm just teasing. Of course I have. Happy birthday, Sensei.

Huh...? My birthday?
Wh-What? There's no point in celebrating the birthday of an old-timer like me.
...Well, thanks anyway. It was still nice to hear. Ahahaha.
It's the start of another year. Let's make it a good one, Sensei.

Ugh. Days like this are a pain when you're my age. Everyone's so lively...
Well, I guess it doesn't hurt to enjoy a holiday every once in a while.

Halloween, huh? It's never really meant anything to me before.
That said, you like to celebrate Halloween yourself, right Sensei?
Huh? You want me to join you? Heehee, I'd love to.

Normal.Transcription: You must be Sensei. I'll be accompanying you starting today. You can trust me with any mission.
Oh, that feels pretty good.
Let's rest a bit before we go.
The Justice Task Force gives me a headache.
Ugh... I guess there's no way around it. I'll help you out.
*sigh* How did it come to this? Well...I suppose it's not too bad.
I'll repay you with results. That's the only way to express what I'm feeling right now.

Lobby.Transcription: Oh, you're here! What's today's mission, Sensei?

Don't even think about being lazy. Remember, I'll always be watching.
W-Wait. I didn't mean anything weird by that!
I'm free for a while, so I can help you out a little bit.
Why are there so many troublemakers in the world?

Well, I don't mean that you need to follow the rules all the time.
But remember, I'll hold you accountable when you don't follow them.

There's no such thing as a rule that makes sense to everyone.
That's why the rules have to be enforced.
Sensei, I trust your leadership.

Huh?! Wh-What?! Today is your birthday?
Well, okay then. Today, I'll, um... I'll help you on any mission!

Th-Thank you for remembering.
I guess this means I've grown up a bit more. Maybe I should be more serious from now on.
Sensei, let's make this our year.

So, it's Christmas again, huh? These days, I feel like it's lost its original meaning.
Not that there aren't still some nice things about it.

Tricks? Treats? I'm good either way, as long as I have fun doing it.
What do you think, Sensei? Should we go out together?

Normal.Transcription: Hey, Sensei! Wanna tag this wall with me?
I think this wall would look really nice with a fresh coat of paint on it.
How can I express fluffiness through spray paint?
Oops! I'd better not get paint on my clothes.
How about adding more red here?
What a great color...
I'm going to color the world with this gun!

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. You're looking sharp today!

You're late, Sensei! If you had made me wait just a little longer...
...I would have made your phone explode. Boom! Just like that.

Is there something on my face?
...Huh? Paint?
Isn't this design cool? I did it myself!

What would be the point?
Every hacker needs to leave behind a calling card. Heh heh...
TANGO DOWN!

I have a cool idea.
Sanctum Tower is at the heart of Kivotos, so what if we tagged it with graffiti?

Happy birthday, Sensei!
Huh? How did I know it was your birthday?
Wait, have you not shared that publicly anywhere?

What do I want for my birthday? Hmm...
Are you okay with me painting your clothes in whatever color I want?

Happy New Year, Sensei!
Let's paint lots of sparkly things this year too!

There are lights all everywhere... It's so pretty.
I wish I could capture them with a painting!

I've been working on a Halloween costume for over a month.
Heehee. You're going to love it!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive
Huh?! Damn it, our eyes met. I guess I've got no choice but to help you.
Hmph. Not too shabby.
What? You trying to cheer me up? Ha! That's a good one.
What I enjoy the most? Hmm. Winning.
Huh? Th-That's... You idiot!
Um... This is embarrassing. I'm saying that I'm grateful!
Well, you know... L-Let's go out together!
Give wings to a tiger, a magic pearl to a dragon, and two submachine guns to me!

Lobby.Transcription: Yo, Sensei. You're late.
All right, Sensei. Let's have another good one, yeah?
God. Did you really make me wait? Unbelievable.
All right! Wanna get this cleanup duty thing going or not?
Now you know what it's like to work with the best, right?
I always get the job done.
Let me know whenever you need help. I'll do whatever I can to back you up.

Yo, Sensei, happy birthday! Uh... There's this cake that I just happened to get, so...
...do you want some?

Haha, Sensei! You know what day it is? Not that it's a big deal if you don't.
I am gonna require a gift, though. Chop-chop. Now. Go!

Yo, Sensei, Happy New Year. I hope it's cool if this year I...you know... 
Gaah! I hope it's cool if I count on you!

Yo, Sensei. Merry Christmas...you know.
You got something for me? I mean, wow a gift!

Yo, Sensei. Trick or treat.
What? Have you never heard that or somethin'?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Whoa! Did you find me? Let's eat something good together!!
I wish there was a tree that grew hamburgers. A hamburger tree... Science can do it, right?
All right! I'm on the hunt for some food!
Here we go! Let's make today a great one!
What's my specialty you ask? Yup, it's eating!
Supper time? You should have said so sooner!
It's another tool to eat delicious food with! Of course, these aren't like chopsticks, but...let's eat a bunch of different foods with it, Sensei!

Lobby.Transcription:
Welcome, Sensei! I've been looking forward to this all day, so let's go eat!
Oh... You have work to do?

Sensei! What should we eat today?
You're saying missions are more important? 
Wrong answer! Food always comes first!
Are there any missions where we beat the crap out of bad restaurants?

I wonder if there are any good places near Schale.
I did raid a restaurant near Trinity...
Oh! Should I not have said that...?

Huh? Are you giving me this cracker?
Thanks, Sensei! You're so sweet!
(That octopus pancake from before looked pretty good...)

A bluebird that brings happiness...?
Hmm... I bet it tastes like chicken.

Is it your birthday, Sensei?
Let's rent a cafe and eat cake all day long!
I'll be with you the whole time!

Ta-da! Guess what day it is!
Ahem! It's a day for eating yummy food!
Let's have cake together! I'll make a special exception and share it with you!

It's New Year's Day! Get ready for rice cakes and red bean soup!
I heard that you can get gamju over there!

Christmas...
Turkey and whipped cream cake are so yummy!
They're even better together!

Treat or treat, Sensei! Let's go already!
I've heard there are candies the size of watermelons!

Normal.Transcription: Second-year of Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force, Sunaookami Shiroko. Hello.
Hmm... This place is spacious. I could get a decent workout in here.
Hmm.
What ride should I go on next?
I've always wondered what you do here, Sensei.
That reminds me: my gun could use a cleaning.
I'm a little stronger now, right? Well, as long as it becomes a source of strength for everyone.

Lobby.Transcription: If there's something you need done, you can always let me know.
Welcome, Sensei. It's good to see you again.
I'm here to help, Sensei.
(Why is Sensei staring at me like that?)
...Hey, is there something on my face?
You just felt like staring...? I-I see.
Being together like this isn't so bad.

Happy birthday, Sensei. Why not celebrate by going on a jog together?
...Is that a no?

I didn't think you'd remember my birthday.
No, I really don't mind. I mean it.
Happy New Year, Sensei. I'll be counting on you this year too.

Merry Christmas. I've heard that today is a special day.
Though, I don't know why it's special...
Will you teach me, Sensei?

Halloween. I've never experienced it due to how desolate our district is.
I don't mind being in a vibrant city for a change.

Normal.Transcription: I'm Shun, an instructor of the Disciplinary Support Department known as Plum Blossom Garden. Please take good care of our children, Sensei.
Heehee. Should we have a class here next time?
It's not nap time yet...but I'm still sleepy...
I wonder if Rinka is taking good care of the children...
Oh, my. How pretty...
Heehee. How adorable!
I didn't want to use this, but sometimes tough love is necessary.

Lobby.Transcription:
Welcome back, Sensei. What would like to do first? Eat or take a bath?
Or...would you rather have class first?
Then let's pick up where we left off. Heehee...

Come on, Sensei! You can't act like a child when you're with me.
If it's only every once in a while... I'll let it slide.
Heehee. I'm excited for today!
Yes, it's Shun!
Nice! Very nice!

If you keep doing that...
...I'm gonna yell at you!

Happy birthday to you! ♪ Happy birthday to you! ♬
Happy birthday, dear Sensei! ♪ Happy birthday to you! ♬

Phew... Another year gone by. I'm getting older.
How old am I? Heehee.
Heehee. I'm looking forward to another year of us working together!

Hush, Sensei. Be careful not to get caught wearing the Santa costume.
You mustn't take away the children's sense of belief.

Oh, the children received so much candy.
Trick or...
How does it go again?

Normal.Transcription: Weight training is a science. This is where Millennium's advanced theories are put to the test.
Hmm...
Is there somewhere we can train...?
These look like they could make for free weights.
Huh? You wanna stretch with me?
What? You also want to go on a run later...?
Being able to handle something like this is a result of training. However, I will not become complacent and will continue trying, Trainer.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Trainer. Let's work hard today.
I've been waiting for you. Let's start training.

The world itself can look different when you change your perspective.
Take those stairs for example. They'd make for great training equipment.
Let's start off with a nice run.

Huh? Why don't I wear my school uniform?
Training in it is uncomfortable.

Weight training is all the rage among the students these days.
...Yeah, I know. I wish that were the truth.
Think of you calves like another heart. You have to train them.

Happy birthday, Trainer. I got you something... 
Huh? Did you not want a dumbbell?

Thank you for remembering.
What do I want?
Hmm. The highest quality protein... Wait, no!
I-I want an adorable stuffed kitty!
If I had one wish, it'd be for everyone to be healthy this year.

I was told Christmas is...
...the day a saint was born.
I can't say I know much about him, but he must have been in great shape.

Care for some protein candy, Trainer?
Huh? How's it taste?
...I remember when things like that mattered more to me than the nutrition.

Normal.Transcription: Keeheeheehee! Kyahahaha!
Ugh. What do I do? What do I do?
Please don't talk to me...
I'll be in that corner...
Ah, hello...
U-Ugh.
Heh heh heh! Heeheeheeheeheehee! Muhahahahahahahahahahahaha!

Lobby.Transcription: Oh... Hello, Sensei. I've been busy with patrols.
Tsurugi, standing by! I-I'm ready to learn!

It's a great day for PAIN!
Wait! No, that's not it! What was I supposed to say?!

Keeheehee. Heeheehee...!
...Huh? W-Were you watching?
Ah... Tell me... What do you desire?

Since I d-don't know much about grown-up stuff!
Just say the word!
(Just let me go home... I like Sensei, but I'm not sure what to say...)

B-Birthday?! Wh-What do people do for things like this?
What do I do now?

B-Birthday?! You want to wish me a happy birthday?
Huh? Did you say a d-d-date?
Date?
H-Here's to spending another year together!

Christmas... Today is when adults...
N-Nothing! You didn't hear anything!

Halloween... Festival... Party...
Huh? N-No, I didn't say anything!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
My fondest greetings to you, Master. I pledge to give you only the best service.
This room has been kept in perfect order. A very competent maid must work here.
Dieting... I do recall a time when I was concerned with such things. Haha.
Welcome. Could I interest you in a cup of black tea?
Master, Sensei, or...Darling? Haha. I wonder how you would prefer to be addressed.
My. I should be the one...doing this for you. Instead, you're the one who cheered me up, Master.
To be someone others look forward to seeing is so exciting. I, Akane, will pay this back with my best service, Master.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Master. You did well today.
Would you be interested in a cup of tea? I happen to have a few leaves of the highest quality on hand.
Yes. I've already sorted the documents. You can entrust this to me.
You can tell me any wish you may have. I will serve you to the best of my ability.

There's a letter for you.
Oh, my. What lovely handwriting.
Should. I. Read. It. For. You?

This may be an inelegant request. But, Master...
...please call me Akane from now on.

Happy birthday, Master.
I'm glad...
...that you came into this world, Master.

It is a blessing to have been given life.
I have been grateful for that since the moment I met you, Master.

Happy New Year to you.
I hope you'll need me again this year, Master!

Merry Christmas!
I come bearing the gifts of top-class service and a professional smile.
What gifts have you brought me, Sensei?

I think the rule is that if I don't get a treat, then I get to trick you!
...Which sounds preferable to me.

Normal.Transcription: Um... So, what should we do now?
Was that...a dream?
I'm so tired...
Gotta get the elephant into the cafe...
Um...
*yawn*
This is...mine?

Lobby.Transcription: Sensei, you're here. Mm... Sit anywhere you like.
Don't worry about me. Just do your thing.
The sky is so blue.
Evil spirits, begone, evil spirits, begone...
Sensei...aren't you going home?
Sensei, I tried writing a haiku. Would you care to hear it?
For my lunch today I ate some good fried chicken made in Nagoya.

Happy birthday, Sensei.
If today's your birthday...
Does that mean you're a year older now?
Today is my birthday? Really...?

I saw a tomato in my first dream of the new year...
Could that mean some luck is coming my way soon?

How does Santa Claus know which kids have been bad?
Is that...a namahage?
I wanna eat some pumpkin soup...

Normal.Transcription: I'm Akari of the Gourmet Research Society. Shall we find something delicious to try together?
Hmm. Where would be good to eat?
Hmm. It bothers me to see you spend time with so many other girls.
Heeheehee...
Let's all go out and eat something delicious together!
Wow! Steak is on today's menu! Let's go to the dining hall!
It'd be nice if everyone could just settle their scores with eating contests. Doing it through strength isn't ideal, but I'm ready nonetheless.

Lobby.Transcription:
Good day, Sensei.
What kind of food should we try today?
Heehee. Good morning.

You're asking me where the cookies went?
Uh, I don't know.
Isn't daydreaming fun, Sensei? Heehee.
Is there anything you want me to do?

I may eat a lot, but I'm still a gourmet.
I'm simply a gourmet that enjoys eating a lot of gourmet food.

A diet...?
I don't know. I never gain weight no matter how much I eat!

Happy birthday, Sensei.
Today is your special day, so it'd be my pleasure to make you something special.

Thank you for the birthday wishes.
You'd like to buy me cake?
Hmm. How many cakes should I have? The same number as my age?

Happy New Year! 
I hope you get to eat all the food in the world this year!

Merry Christmas!
Sensei! Hurry up! There's turkey, cake, and so many other dishes waiting!

Prepared to be tricked if you don't provide treats.
Hmm. What should I do if I want to play my tricks and eat the treats too?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Hanekawa Hasumi of the Justice Task Force. Awaiting orders, Sensei.
Someday, I'll wear a cute, short skirt...
I like it here. It makes me want to stop by more often.
It's nice to have time off like this on occasion.
It looks delicious...but I really shouldn't.
The Justice Task Force has a simple credo: Never forgive injustice.
This power you gave me... I will cherish it.

Lobby.Transcription:
Hello. Am I the first one to greet you today?
...I'm glad, then.

You're late. You overslept again, didn't you? It's rude to keep a lady waiting, so...
...next time I'll come wake you myself.
What kind of mission should we carry out today?
A sure way to win? Well, I do know of one. Endless training.
People tell me I don't laugh very often. Do you think that too, Sensei?

The Justice Task Force is made of love and peace.
What? No, I wasn't joking.

You can take your time with the work, Sensei.
I don't mind a more relaxed pace.

It's your birthday?
Happy birthday. But I don't have anything to give you...
Uh... Is there something you'd like?

I usually spend my birthday with my clubmates, but today, I'm spending it with you.
Haha. It feels a bit different.
Last year was special thanks to you. Let's have another good year together.
Merry Christmas. I'm happy to spend a holy night like this with you.

It's Halloween... That alone isn't too exciting.
But if you're with me...maybe it is.

Normal.Transcription: Yup yup, I'm finally here! I look forward to working with you, Sensei!
This is so fun! ☆
Hmm? What could that be?
It's so pretty. Maybe the others would like it as a gift...
We should revive the Abydos Idol Project. ☆
All of our students are super adorable after all.
Yes, I think power is a double-edged sword, but it is necessary for Sensei and everyone else. I'll use it wisely, so please keep watching out for me.

Lobby.Transcription: Yup, yup! Hello, Sensei. I've been waiting for you to get here.
Let's have another great day today! You can count on me, Sensei!
You've got this like always. ☆

Hmm? You wanna lay your head in my lap?
Maybe when it gets a little darker...
Nope! You can rest after you're done with work!
Um...Sensei. Why don't I give you a shoulder massage?
I feel at ease when I have you with me.

Happy birthday!
If you hadn't come to Abydos...
I don't even want to imagine it, Sensei! Thank you for everything!

Today's my birthday. Did you get me a gift, Sensei?
Yup, yup! I'd be happy with anything. As long as it's a gift from you! ☆
Happy New Year. This will be the year that you and I... Heehee! ☆

Sensei. Should we go shopping together?
Let me be your Santa Claus!

Whoa! You surprised me!
Sensei! Please don't scare me like that.

Normal.Transcription: I'm not mad or anything. People always say I look scary.
*sigh* This isn't good.
Well, I guess my interest is piqued at least a little.
Our plan for the future? Well, we don't have one. It'll work itself out.
You didn't realize I could be so cute...? Hmph. That's a lame joke.
I'm fully aware of how intimidating I can be, though.
Although I don't disagree with your decisions... *sigh* Never mind. I'll try to meet your expectations.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. Well, then. Let's get to work.

We got a new request in. Something about it seems familiar.
I guess Schale reminds me of Problem Solver to some extent.
Do you need something? I can handle whatever you need, you know.
...I get it. My face scares people. They get the wrong idea sometimes.
You think I'm...cute? Stop teasing me, Sensei.
I'm here to help you. That's what we agreed on.

I'll put all I have into knocking out requests.
That's what being professional is all about.

Happy birthday, Sensei.
I'm not really sure what else you're supposed to say on birthdays...

Happy birthday? Hmm.
It's just... This is the first time anyone outside Problem Solver has noticed.
Th-Thanks...

It's New Year's Day.
I'll be relying on you a lot this year as well.

Merry Christmas. I've heard this is considered a romantic holiday...
Hmm...

Bright decorations, and so many sweets. I'm just not used to stuff like that.
Well... 
...should we go sightseeing together anyway?

Normal.Transcription: Ta-da! I'm finally here! All right, Sensei, let's have some fun!
As long as it's fun, it's okay.
Hmm? That doesn't look half-bad either!
Heehee! ♥
One head pat, please!
Let's play together!
Sensei! Look! Look! This weapon seems really powerful, and it's cute!

Lobby.Transcription: Hello, Sensei! I'm here to give YOU a lesson!
What kind of mission are we doing today? Let's start with something fun!
What should we do for fun today, Sensei?
What? You're busy? Can't you do work stuff some other time?

Should we pick up where we left off last time?
That was fun...wasn't it?
Heehee! It's funny seeing you get all embarrassed. ♥
Huh? Was I teasing you too much? I hope I don't get in trouble...

Wait, it's your birthday, Sensei?! We have to celebrate the occasion!
We can throw a party at the Problem Solver office!

Today's my birthday!
Sensei... You'll spend it with me...riiight?

We'll have even more fun this year than we did last year!
Heehee, I can't wait! ♥

Drum roll, please! Your Christmas present is...me!
Want to unwrap your present? Heeheehee!

You know how this works! Trick or treat!
Huh? You're giving me a treat? I'm more of a trick kind of gal, though.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Nope, not gonna help... Wait. You'll feed me? What kind of food though?
Is there nothing...? Nothing at all to eat?
That reminds me, the cafe we went to was pretty good... Heh heh.
I hear the dumplings from Hyakkiyako are, like, super good...
*sniff* *sniff* Hmm? That smell... Something smells amazing!
I've followed that sweet scent all this way. Time to find out what it is...!
Th-Thank you, Sensei! I will cherish it... Truly!

Lobby.Transcription:
Greetings, Sensei.
Let's give it our all today and then cap it off with some great food!
Oh, there you are, Sensei! What kind of mission are we going on today?

You want to know what my hobby is? Reading books, of course.
...Hey, why are you making that face?!

Don't tell me you see me as a little kid who only wants to fill her belly.
You should learn to rely on me a little more.

Do I like dango?
N-No! I mean, not that much. I'm just eating it because it's cheap!
(It's just me and Sensei? Oh...)

Wh-What did you just say?! There's a place with all-you-can-eat cake and pie?!
Let's get moving, Sensei! We need to head out ASAP!

Happy birthday, Sensei!
Today's all about you! You have my full attention!
So? What would you like to eat today? Beef? Fish? Chicken?!

Today's my birthday! You knew that, right?
It's not a birthday without meat!
A buffet would work! Anything's good, so let's get some grub!

Happy New Year, Sensei! Let's hurry to the shrine!
The gamju and rice cakes await!
Merry Christmas! Let's hit the streets, Sensei! The lights are all sparkling!

Huh? Th-This candy is mine.
...B-But I don't mind sharing some if it's with you.

Normal.Transcription: I'm Kuromi Serika, and there will be no slacking on my watch. Understood?
Hmm. Maybe I should've been more friendly.
I still have some time until my part-time job.
I wonder if anywhere nearby is looking for part-timers...
Wow! I'm so excited...
Ahaha!
Good, this can help everyone a little bit!

Lobby.Transcription:
Welcome, Sensei. I was waiting for you.
Don't give me that look! I haven't been waiting THAT long!

At least work hard when you know I'm watching.
...Let me give you a hand.
Shouldn't you be doing something instead of sitting around?
I get slacking off can be fun sometimes, but don't you have work to be doing?
(I'm right next to you. Throw me a bone, will you...?)
Overworking isn't healthy, so you can lean on me if you need to.

Um, h-happy birthday. Thank you for always looking out for me.
...Don't laugh!

Huh? Birthday? Th-Thanks. You...remembered...
Teehee!

A new year. Visiting a temple might be nice...
Ah, I never said I wanted to go with you!

Merry Christmas! You don't have any plans today, do you?
Being alone on a day like today would be sad, so I'll keep you company!

Eek! I mean—no! Don't get the wrong idea!
Eyeball candies and jack-o'-lanterns aren't even a little s-scary!

Normal.Transcription: Blue...Archive...
I never thought this moment would happen. I'll be working with you from now on, Sensei.
This place is so comfy that I could see myself taking a nap here.
It feels like I'm dreaming. I wonder why...
Ahahaha! Ah, whew... All that laughing wore me out.
Wow! I think I can get a good rest here.
Heeheehee. A new pillow should be arriving soon. I can't wait.
Ahahaha! In the dream I just had, Sensei was... Oh my goodness, it was too funny! Ahaha!
Ahahaha! I slept great. Hmm? You've never seen me like this before?
This weapon is... Is this a dream? It must be!

Lobby.Transcription:
*yawn* G'morning, Sensei.
Huh? It's not morning?
Who cares...?

Zzz. Sorry, Sensei... I think I need some more sleep.
Do you wanna lie down too...Sensei?
*yawn* Huh? When did you get here, Sensei?

Now's the perfect time for a nap...
I think we'd both be more productive...after a good nap.

What am I never able to get a good night's rest?
Heh heh. Should I tell you, Sensei?

Well...
It's hard to sleep when I know that I get to see you when I wake up.
I'm so happy.
(I wish this moment could last forever. I feel so comfy.)

Happy birthday, Sensei.
Care to take a celebratory birthday nap? *yawn* You can use my lap as a pillow.

Today is...my birthday?
What better way to celebrate than by sleeping in more?
Happy New Year. My resolution is to wake up earlier this year.

I love Christmas...
It's not a typical holiday in Hyakkiyako...
...but it's still a holy night that many people find joy during.

It'd be a waste to sleep today.
Let's go outside, Sensei.
It's going to feel like a dreamscape, even when we're awake.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive
The conditions have been met. Let's get down to business.
Huh? I never realized that a place like this existed.
We'll go bankrupt at this rate. We must cut down on spending.
You need a short break? We have approximately 1,890 second to spare. Use them wisely.
I get the feeling today will be a fun day. It would surprise me if it wasn't.
This is a huge plus!

Lobby.Transcription: Sensei. I'll do everything I can to assist you, just as I did yesterday.

Welcome, Sensei. Shall we begin reflecting on our mistakes?
Wait, where are you going?
Sensei! I need you to work harder!
I have approximately 34 tips on how to improve your behavior, Sensei.
(...Though one of them isn't quite like the others.)

You have been striking me as more teacherly of late.
Huh? You think it's because of me?!
I mean... O-Of course it is!
Sensei. Please plan an objective and course of action before you proceed.

Happy birthday, Sensei.
This marks...how many years since you were born? Let's see...
Huh? You don't want me to know?

Today is my birthday. Allow me to choose my own gift.
Would going out be all right? It doesn't have to be anywhere fancy!
The first step is crucial in any math problem. Let's start this year on the right foot as well.

Christmas Day... These sorts of holidays usually don't interest me.
But I'm having fun this time because I'm with you.

Calculating total candy distributed in Kivotos via population density...
...and the associated net calorie intake. *mumble*

Normal.Transcription: Um, is it really okay for me to be here? You can tell me if I'm in the way.
Is there somewhere I can hide...?
Is it really okay for me to be here?
I don't like crowds. I want to hide...
S-So... I-Is there anything I can do?
S-Sensei. Thank you... I-I mean! I'm sorry!
Whatever Sensei hates, I will get rid of it!

Lobby.Transcription: U-Um... Did you mean to call me? You didn't dial the wrong number, did you?
Does someone like me deserve to be here...?

What? You really need me?
Uh, uh, th-that's...
I'll do my best to be useful to you, Sensei...
...Thank you, Sensei.
Huh? Don't be so nervous? W-Was it that obvious?!
(I wanna die, I wanna die, I wanna die, I wanna die.)

H-Happy birthday!
N-Not that I think you need to hear it from someone like me!

I-I wish I was never born!
Huh? Y-You're celebrating?

H-Happy New Year!
This year, I know for sure Sensei and I will...exterminate them all!

I'm glad that you and I can spend Christmas together, Sensei...
O-Of course, I'm not sure if I deserve it...!

Oh. So today is Halloween.
I did shoot at a group of people that showed up wearing ghost costumes...
...Mistakes were made.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Life with my new master begins today!
Hmm. My clothes feel tight again. Did I gain weight? Or is it because...?
Boring! I wonder if there's any manga around here.
Hmm hmm hmmm. ♪
La la la! I have a good feeling about today! You can feel it too, right, Master?
Master! Welcome! Let me cheer you up!
Oh, it's the master! Care for a meal? Want to wash up? Or would you like... Heehee!
Master! Look! A new weapon arrived! Isn't it shiny and pretty?!

Lobby.Transcription: Sensei! I mean, Master! Welcome! Let's give today our all!
I'm not afraid of any mission! Together, Master and I can handle anything!
Hey, Master! I'm here to serve you with everything I have, just like always!

You came to see me, right?
I knew I was my master's favorite!

Leave cleaning and washing to me!
There's no stain I can't get out!
We have a mission! Come on, Master! Let's take care of it right away!
Rest? Nope, I'm good to go! Let's play together instead!
Master, I wish you the happiest birthday in the world!
Guess what, Master! Today is your beautiful maid's birthday! So...what did you get me?

Happy New Year, Master. Here's to another year together...
And the next year and the year after that and the year after that! I'll make sure you're happy every year!

Merry Christmas! Your faithful maid has played the part of Santa and come bearing gifts!
Those gifts are... Heehee!
Whoa, it's Halloween! Look, Master! Look at how lively the streets are! We need to join them!

Normal.Transcription: If you need an explanation or commentary, just leave it to me!
The facts are never far from the question. But neither are the lies.
Oh? I sense there's someone in need of my expertise!
Ugh. I want to explain things! I have to do it!
The riddle has been solved!
My explanations are always perfect. I never skimp on the details!
The name of this weapon is Professor K!

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei! Let me explain today's schedule!
It's a great day, Sensei! Please come to the briefing room!

If you have any questions, give a shout!
Yell my name, and I'll come running! Okay?
Great question, Sensei! Let me give you the answer!
Aren't these glasses cool?! Would you like to try them on?

Facts are the light that dispels the darkness of ignorance.
...But I agree that no one likes explanations that are too flashy.

Oh, there's someone who has a question.
Sensei! Let's go!

Happy birthday, Sensei! A birthday is a special day to celebrate the day you were born...
Wait! Where are you going?

Since it's my birthday, let me tell you my life's story...
Please, come back! I haven't finished my explanation yet!
I'm only getting started!

Happy New Year!
I'd like to listen to more of your lectures this year.

Merry Christmas! Today marks the birthday of a historical messiah. How did it become a holiday for couples...?
Huh? Lovers...?

Trick or treat! If you don't give me candy, I'll start explaining...
Oh! I don't need that much!

Normal.Transcription: Does this count as a part of the Vigilante Crew's duties? I'll do what's necessary to uphold Trinity's peace.
(It's so peaceful here.)
(Wow... This decoration is so cute.)
(Something this cute probably wouldn't look good on someone like me...)
The security here is exceptional. I can't find a single flaw.
Being well-rested is also an important factor in being able to complete missions.
It's always best to use a weapon you're comfortable with.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. I know you keep a busy schedule, but I'd like to see you more often...if possible.
I've been waiting for you, Sensei. Let's hurry and start our patrol.
Am I really that standoffish...?
You mean the Vigilante Crew? It's a tough job, but someone has do it.
There's no time to rest.
The best way to serve justice is one step at a time.
Did I...make a mistake?

Happy birthday, Sensei.
Today's your special day, so let's go for a walk instead of a patrol.

My birthday has never been particularly important to me, but hearing Sensei wish me well...
...is something I could get used to.
What's your New Year's resolution? Mine is to patrol with even more vigilance this year.

It's the time before the holidays when everyone starts to relax a little.
So we should be more vigilant than ever during our patrols.
Are the streets always full of weird people during Halloween?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
How do you do? Oh, where are my manners? It's a pleasure to meet you.
There's something about this place. I like how nostalgic it is!
I hope you're a bigger fan of okonomiyaki than you are pizza or pancakes, Sensei.
Wow! What a great atmosphere!
I prefer cool oolong tea! Not coffee or soda.
It's not the weapon that becomes stronger, but the soul!

Lobby.Transcription:
How do you do, Sensei?
Oops. There I go again greeting like I used to at my old academy...
Welcome, Sensei! Let's get on with our missions!
Summer in Hyakkiyako is always exciting. That's when the festivals begin!
Everyone knows kimonos are the best. The best of the best!

Don't worry. I only hit you with the back of my sword.
Wait... Actually, it was the gun stock!
Here she comes! The blonde beauty that fights injustice!
Was I supposed to do a handstand while saying hello? Hyakkiyako's culture is so different!

Today! Is! A very special day that only happens once a year!
I heard it's your birthday. Happy birthday, Sensei!

Today is my birthday!
Sensei! Let's go out for some red bean rice!

Sensei! We have to go to a shrine for the new year!
And we can't forget to get our omikuji!

Merry Christmas! Santa Claus is the best.
Do you like Santa too, Sensei?

Ghosts be gone! Blessings come in!
Wait, it's Halloween? I thought it was Setsubun!

Normal.Transcription: I've been waiting for this and knew it would come. The moment when you would call my name.
What if I had more time and a bigger budget...? No, that's just an amateur's excuse.
A meister's job is to get the best results within the given time and budget.
How about placing your statue here? We can make the joints of its limbs move.
Hmm. I've found a few things that could use some repairs and improvements... Huh? I'm not allowed to do repairs?
I could install some amazing traps if you want. What? I can't even do that?
I want to make more. And...to be of help to Sensei.

Lobby.Transcription: Hi, Sensei. I've put today's mission list on the desk. Give it a look when you have the chance.

Hmm... I think your efficiency on missions could improve, Sensei.
I'll look for ways you can improve.
I have fun hanging out with you. Heh heh...
What did you think, Sensei? Was my equipment helpful?

Do I enjoy making useful things? Sure, but...
This is more of my job than a hobby.

I prefer maintenance work. There's something special about bringing life back to a machine again.
It feels like I've accomplished something, and that's satisfying.
(And seeing you smile is too...)
Happy birthday, Sensei. I'm thankful you were born and that you came into my life.

What do I want for my birthday? Nothing in particular.
...I already have everything I want.
I wish you the best in the coming year. This year, I promise to become a better version of myself...

By my calculations, in order for Santa to deliver presents to all the children of Kivotos in a single night...
...Rudolph would have to achieve a speed of at least Mach 4.
It's Halloween... I wouldn't call it a very scientific holiday, but there's still something exciting about it.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive
Originally, Millennium was my master, but starting today...you're my master, Sensei.
*sigh* I hate having to study math. I'm so sick of numbers.
What a nice place. Someday, I'd love to... Oh! D-Did you hear that just now?!
Taking a rest is sometimes important too.
Cute things? Sure, I like them. A lot. Is there something wrong with that?
Neru and Asuna always take the lead. My responsibility is to cover for them.
The chance of winning a war is proportional to the development of weapons. Watch this, Sensei.

Lobby.Transcription: There you are, Sensei. I've...been waiting.
I had checked your schedule, and I'm looking forward to working with you today.

Target confirmed. Proceeding with elimination.
...Only kidding. You don't have to hide.
No problem, Sensei. That issue has already been taken care of.
How? Th-That's...! On a need-to-know basis.
What mission will you see to today? I'll be there to help no matter what.

Happy birthday, Sensei. I may not be the best when it comes to expressing these sorts of things...
...but I'm truly glad to have you in my life.

My birthday... I've never really celebrated it or anything.
But it does feel different...to hear you wish me a happy one.
Happy New Year, Sensei. I'll be counting on you again this year.

Christmas, huh? I don't need Santa...
...because I have you.

Treat or fire! Surrender the candy, or I will open fire!
Huh? Is that not how the saying goes?

Normal.Transcription: I'm here! So where's my next test subject?
Heh heh. I like this room... I think I'll make it my new lab!
What should I test on May next time?
The temperature and humidity are perfect for growing bacteria. Heh heh heh...
Wait. Something smells like delicious cheese!
Nezusuke, you maniac! You have to control yourself!
My pistol is finally here! Of course, it's nothing compared to this terrifying bacteriological weapon.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome back, Sensei! I was just about to call you to test my newest elixir.
What? You came over because you wanted to hang out with me? Oh, well...
I! Am! The greatest!
Is Nezusuke is a hamster or a guinea pig? We'll find out...with our next experiment!
Everyone knows that mice make the most beloved characters in human storytelling!
Medicine and poison aren't all that different. Both are double-edged swords depending on their usage!
What an adorable guinea pig. Want to participate in my experiment?

Happy birthday, Sensei.
Huh? How did I know it was your birthday? Well, us researchers just have impeccable memories!

You remembered my birthday? Your memory is better than I expected, Sensei!
I once saw you going to work on a Sunday, so I thought you had trouble remembering the days of the week.
This year is going to be a great, Sensei. I swear that this is the year I will create the immortality elixir!

'Tis the season when an old man carrying a giant sack of gifts roams through all of Kivotos.
What kind of supplements do you think he takes to stay fit at his age?

I wonder what kind of drugs were used to animate the corpses roaming the streets during Halloween.
I can't believe I've never heard of it before. How infuriating...!

Normal.Transcription: Well met, Sensei! What kind of ice cream do you like?
Hmm. What to eat...
You can't go wrong with strawberry mint!
Ice cream! Ice cream!
School is out! It'd be a crime not to enjoy some dessert!
Strawberry and mint are the best!
This weapon is... Thank you, Sensei. Finding strength isn't easy, but you give me the confidence I need to try!

Lobby.Transcription: There you are, Sensei. You're going to come with me to get dessert, yes?

Sensei, you're late!
Let's go get some ice cream!
Yummm... Nothing beats sweets!
You like ice cream too, right?
After-school time is dessert time!
Let's give our all today and earn some tasty desserts for later!
Is something wrong, Sensei? You look like something's on your mind.
In that case, come on! Let's go get some sweets!

Happy birthday, Sensei!
I made a reservation at a great dessert place!
Come on, Sensei. Let's go already!

Sensei! Today is my birthday! Let's go get ice cream together!
Huh? Do I want a present?
I've already received one! You're the only gift I need, Sensei!

Happy New Year! Sensei!
Let's make it another good one, filled with plenty of tasty desserts!

Look, Sensei. It's Christmas!
What better day to enjoy ice cream together? Let's go!

Heehee. Today is Halloween.
Let's dress up as ghosts and go get ourselves some sweets!
Trick or treat!

Event.Transcription: Let's give it our all today and earn some tasty desserts for later!
I'm gonna work hard today!
Heehee, you can rely on me a little more.
Heehee, I'm a little embarrassed, Sensei.
Thank you, Sensei!
Good luck, everyone!

Normal.Transcription: I'm Fuuka from the School Lunch Club. Let me know if you're hungry. I'll whip something up for you.
Is it all right if I use your kitchen?
What would you like for dinner?
We're running low on ingredients.
Maybe I should stop by the grocery store.
Let's get cooking.
Hahaha... I'm not used to this kind of support, but I will do my best to be of service, Sensei.

Lobby.Transcription: Good work out there! I made you dinner and it's still warm. Would you like me to serve it to you?
How do you like your eggs, Sensei? Soft-boiled? Sunny-side up? How about a rolled omelet?
I hope you're not skipping meals! Do you want me to make something for you?
Cooking for everyone is hard work, but I'll be okay.
Ahaha... Are you worried about me?

I'm curious. What kind of food do you like?
Huh? Why am I asking?
That's a secret!
Hmm. I wonder what kind of foods would be the best for your health...

Happy birthday, Sensei.
Today is a special occasion, so you should eat something nice.
U-Um, if it's okay, can I make you something for your birthday?

Oh... My birthday?
A-Ahaha... I'm better at remembering other people's.
It's sweet you remembered. It makes me happy.

A new year has arrived!
I was gonna make some rice cake soup. Is that okay with you?

Christmas...
I'm thinking of making a special dinner.
B-But only if you're okay with it!

Pumpkin soup, pumpkin pie, pumpkin porridge...
I'm planning to make everything I can.
It's Halloween, right? What kinds of treats do you like, Sensei?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Your Ministering Angel has arrived!
Hmm hmm hmm hmmm. Is there anyone in need of an operation?
Salvation! Hope! And love! Hanae has it all!
I can't wait to play with the rabbit and cat!
I have so much fun these days now that I have so many friends!
Hi, I'm Hanae! I'm happy to be working with you!
This weapon... It's full of love!

Lobby.Transcription: You have some new mail, Sensei. Let's go on some fun missions together!
Welcome back, Sensei! I've been waiting for you.
*gasp* Sensei, your face is so pale! Do you need me to perform first aid?
I'm here to help you get better and put a smile on your face!

What type of girl do you like, Sensei?
I bet you like the cute, bubbly types, don't you?
We have lots to do today, so no slacking off!
Hey! I have a good feeling about today.
Today's the best day of the year! Happy birthday, Sensei!

Today's my birthday! So for a birthday gift...
...I want you to spend the day with me!
Happy New Year! I hope you have a really good one.
Christmas is a time for everyone to be happy! Every Trinity girl likes to celebrate Christmas.
Halloween has only just begun. Let's go! The festival should start soon!

Normal.Transcription: Nice to meet you, Sensei. I'll show you what a Millennium girl can do.
If only there were a way to have the vending machine stocked with only energy drinks.
Hmm... Why don't we continue after taking a nap?
Need...more...sugar...
If I fix this part this way, and that part thataway... Good. Time for some modifications.
Hmm. Huh? What was I doing just now? I was playing a new game.
It's an old weapon... This weapon contains memories that cannot be quantified.

Lobby.Transcription: Hello, Sensei. Would you like a cup of coffee?
Welcome, Sensei. You're here approximately 43 seconds earlier than I expected.

Believe it or not, I'm pretty good at games.
You wanna test my skills, Sensei?

Cheat...?
I may be a hacker, sure, but that would take all the fun out.
Do people think hackers are just a bunch of cheaters or something?

I hack because knowledge should be free.
That's what I believe.
The sweetest soda is the drink of intellectuals.

Happy birthday, Sensei.
Today, I bestow unto you Hare's Protection. It's code which will protect you from every bug regardless of what coding language you use.

Um, this isn't what I meant by Raspberry Pi...
Still, thank you for remembering my birthday.
Hello, new world.

Did you know, Sensei?
Christmas is the time of year where people do a certain something together.
Heh heh. You know what I mean... Hacking, of course.

Why am I not outside enjoying the festival?
Because the Halloween Festival can be enjoyed the same from behind a screen.

Normal.Transcription: Makeup doesn't make a girl beautiful—passion does.
If I made a Sensei Bot, I could make a fortune...
Now that I think about it, the helicopter could use a tune-up.
Hmm... How about a battle-ready bidet?
I'm surprised no one wants camouflage underwear. I was so confident that it would be popular...
Hmm... Is there anything that needs to be repaired?
A miracle happening at my fingertips. Design and production... Sensei, look forward to my genius.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. Let's do our best today!

Calling upon my expertise was the right decision.
I'm going to prove that to you.
(Hmm. Sensei can be...very hard to read.)
I thought it might come to this. I'm looking forward to the opportunity to finally work together.
Millennium battles are decided by the abilities of the technicians around you.
With you by our side, our potential is greater than ever.
The true beauty of a machine can be found in its logic, precision, and simplicity.

Happy birthday, Sensei. 
So, how old are you turning this year?

Today is my birthday? 
I see. It completely slipped my mind. It's never been that important to me...
But...it makes me happy that you remembered my birthday, Sensei.

Happy New Year, Sensei. 
I'm going to be a nicer person this year...
...because I'm with you.

I hope Santa brings me the latest gadget.
What? You think I should make it myself?
Hmm. Well...
Making my own Santa could be difficult...

I was asked to make a moving pumpkin doll.
But...mine was rejected because of its self-destruct capabilities.
I don't get it. What's the point of even building a robot that can't self-destruct?

Normal.Transcription: I'm Okusora Ayane. You can count on my support.
Ahaha!
It looks expensive...
Should I hide some snacks here...?
How does it work?
Is this okay...?
Hahaha... I don't know if I can handle something like this very well, but...I'm sure it'll work out somehow if I look at manuals and stuff, right? Thank you!

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. Allow me to go over your schedule.
I-I've been waiting, Sensei.
What kind of tasks are on your itinerary today?
I'll check the schedule too.
Huh? We have to work all night? J-Just the two of us?
N-Not that I mind, but...what will the others think?

Oh, I see. You were just joking.
Yeah.

Happy birthday, Sensei.
Shall I add a birthday party to today's schedule?
What? With me?

You knew it was my birthday?
Oh, wow... Thank you.
To be honest, I wasn't expecting that...

I look forward to working with you this year, Sensei.
I'm glad I get to spend another year with you.

Christmas, huh? I suppose a festive holiday like this is okay from time to time...
Huh? Go out together? M-Me and you?
Happy Halloween! It's been so loud around here, Sensei.

Normal.Transcription: Blue. Archive.
I will fight by your side when you want to overcome adversity and hardship.
We're running low on medical supplies.
Hmm. Well, it's not bad.
Looks cozy.
I'm impressed by how...clean everything is.
Body temperature good, pulse is stable... Hmm. You're perfectly healthy.
The fact that I need more power to heal more people feels like a bad joke. But I will always do my best.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. These documents need your attention.
The Prefect Team desires order. Isn't that what Schale wants too?

I'll tell you a secret...
I'm not a fan of needles either.
I hope you know there's no cure for stupidity.

Pardon? You want me to laugh?
...Perhaps if we were alone together.

(If I knock Sensei out and perform CPR...)
(...would that count?)
What? I look lost in thought? No. It's nothing.

Happy birthday, Sensei. You're due for a booster shot.
I'll have to ask you to undo your pants.
Wait! You only have to pull them down slightly!

Today is my birthday. That gives me the right to have you to myself.
Would you...hold my hand?

Happy New Year, Sensei. Last year was very chaotic...
...but I enjoyed it because I was with you.

I like Christmas because its primary color is red. Do you appreciate shades of red like I do, Sensei?
I'll say it now, but it has nothing to do with the color of blood...
Happy Halloween, Sensei. Would you like some candy? These are sugar-free, so they're healthier.

Normal.Transcription: Otose Kotama from the Millennium Science School. I find you very intriguing.
There's a wiretapping device in this cafe... Hmm, I see...
The signal is unstable.
How odd. Sensei's GPS signal was detected nearby...
Look at the cafe's new dessert. Uploading to my blog now...
New Momo Friends merchandise. The time of reckoning...has arrived.
Adjusting the hertz... Can you hear me?

Lobby.Transcription: There you are. I could hear you approaching by the sound of your footsteps.
That was a surprise. I nearly screamed, you showing up out of nowhere like that.

I see your call history is exclusively female students.
I would like an explanation.
...Crime? What do you mean? Wiretapping is not a crime.
Would you care to explain the post that just went up on your private account?

Sensei, could I ask you to sing a song for me?
Please sing into this voice recorder.

I can hear the voice of other girls looking for you, Sensei.
...Let's ignore them.

Happy birthday, Sensei. Though you've probably heard that many times today already...
Then again, it is a sentiment that never loses value or meaning, even over time.

Thank you...for wishing me a happy birthday.
Hearing it from you means more to me than all the other well wishes today.
I look forward to hearing your voice in the coming year more than anything else.

Christmas is an excellent time to listen to wiretaps. You hear all kinds of interesting stories and talks.
Same as...lovers whispering sweet nothings.

I wonder what a rapping Halloween ghost is supposed to sound like.
I could always bug it if I get the chance... I mean, record it. With consent.

Normal.Transcription: I'm Juri from Gehenna's School Lunch Club. Let me know if you're hungry.
Mmm... What a sweet scent.
Do you think this is edible?
Maybe I should try frying to see what happens.
Oh, wow. This place is nice.
I think I can cook something really tasty here.
Heehee, if you use this gun for cooking, the meat becomes significantly more tender!

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. Aren't you feeling hungry?

Welcome, Sensei. Would you like to eat before we begin?
What about...just a snack?

Ugh... 
Why does everything I cook end in failure?
If the ingredients are still moving, that means it's fresh, right?
Do you smell something burning...?
Oh, silly me! I forgot about the pie in the oven!
Which do you think will add more flavor? Sulfuric or hydrochloric acid?

Happy birthday, Sensei!
I baked a cake for you...
...but it, uh, ran away. Yeah...

You want to get me something for my birthday?
Heehee. Hearing you say that is all I could ever want.

I made osechi to celebrate New Year's.
Would you mind giving it a taste?

Um, so I roasted a turkey for Christmas...
It shouldn't still be moving...right?

I'm surprised at how popular my usual snacks are for Halloween.
Apparently, they make for good for pranks.

Normal.Transcription: Is anyone in need of first aid? I would be happy to help.
Does anyone need first aid?
It warms my heart just looking at this place.
A patient would be able to make a speedy recovery in a place like this.
I don't think it's a bad thing to relax like this every now and then.
Oh... What a beautiful shade of pink.
Don't run away just because the shot hurts!

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. How are you feeling today?
I've been waiting for you, Sensei. As always, let's work toward creating a peaceful world together!
Oh, a new patient?
You look tired. Would you like me to massage your shoulders?
Fatigue is the root of many illnesses, so don't push yourself too hard.
It always breaks my heart to think about the patients who are suffering.
I can't forgive those who would trample on the peace we have!
Happy birthday, Sensei! I hope your day is filled with warmth and joy!

Thank you for remembering my birthday. Oh? A birthday gift?
Your smiling face is enough for me!
Happy New Year! Be sure to bundle up so you don't ring in the new year with a cold!
Merry Christmas, Sensei. Even if just for one day, I hope people can stop fighting and enjoy a wonderful peace.

I got some Halloween candy!
I love sweets, but if I eat too many, I'll earn myself a trip to the dentist...

Normal.Transcription: We've turned the first page of our story!
I don't see enough books here. You need to stuff that bookshelf.
Oooh. This room is perfect for reading.
Oh, I've never seen this book before!
Heh heh heh! Everything's coming together!
Heehee! I have an idea!
Heeheehee. Those who have overdue books are in big trouble now.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei! Did you read the book I gave you?
What kind of book shall I recommend to you today?
Whenever I have spending money, I buy a book first. Clothes or food are secondary.
What kinds of books do I like? Hmm... I'm not choosy when it comes to reading.

Sensei, I wouldn't recommend that book. Four pages from where you are, the main character dies in vain.
...Whoops Was that a spoiler?
It'd be nice if there were more books here. Can I recommend a few?
I wish people would read a little more...
Happy birthday, Sensei! Please let me know if there are any books you're interested in!

Heehee, I love books, but...they're all I get on my birthday, it feels like sort of a letdown.
Today, I'd like to get a special gift from you!
Happy New Year! I'll be counting on you in the months to come.

Merry Christmas! Today's a special day, Sensei!
I'm so glad we can spend time together on a day like this... Teehee.
Halloween is almost here! I'll have to pick out a special mystery or horror novel.

Normal.Transcription: Don't underestimate me because I'm small! I have big potential, you know!
I'm not even done growing yet... How do I know? Just trust me!
Heehee. Maybe I should take a nap before I go.
*sigh* How can you be so oblivious?
I wanna eat some yummy desserts! Oh! Sensei!
Ugh! Regular milk leaves such a gross taste in my mouth. O-Oh. It's strawberry milk?
If I accept something like this... All right! I'll do my best with it!

Lobby.Transcription: D-Don't pat my head like that! Hmph. I'm not a little kid, okay?!
Do you think I'll look more grown-up if I give it a few years?
I've been chugging a liter of milk. Every! Single! Day!
C-Can I still eat some yummy snacks with you even if I'm on duty...?
Do your best today! I'll help you however I can!

Sensei? You're not looking too good...
Sh-Should we try some dessert therapy?
As long as I'm here, don't even think about slacking off. That's what I thought! Now, back to work!
Happy birthday, Sensei! There's a decent dessert place nearby. Let's go!

Th-Thank you for remembering.
(I wonder how many years it'll take for people to start thinking we look good side-by-side...)
Why are you looking at me like that? I-I wasn't thinking anything weird! I swear!
Happy New Year! My New Year's resolution? That should be obvious. I want to grow up more!
Merry Christmas! I love the holidays! The streets and windows are all decked out with my favorite colors!

Trick-or-treat! It's a super special Halloween for the After-School Sweets Club! Let's go!
I don't really care about the ghosts, but the candy aspect is very important to me!

Normal.Transcription: I'm Mashiro, first year from the Justice Task Force. I may be inexperienced, but I'm here to help however I can.
I doubt Tsurugi would like these kinds of decorations...
Hasumi's wings looked fluffy enough to nap on.
Tranquil like water...
Is Tsurugi's neck okay...?
I don't mind coming here every once in a while.
How pretty... Heehee.
This is what you call true justice.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. Let's strive for justice again today.
I've been awaiting your orders.
Oh, are we mobilizing?
You called for me, Sensei?

The goal of the Justice Task Force...
...is to vanquish evil and establish justice.
Justice—in this academy.

I gave my word.
I would endure brutal training and mind-numbing trials...
...so that I could protect justice.
But the time I spent with my upperclassmen was so enjoyable...
Forgive me in advance. Everyone strays from justice from time to time.

But I'm only saying this just in case...
What you're touching right now is not the operational console.

Happy birthday, Sensei.
I hope you feel righteous justice on your birthday.

I see. So today is my birthday.
It must have slipped my mind.
Thank you for telling me.

It's a new year. This year...
I will see injustice stopped once and for all.

This is a holy day for Trinity.
I wonder what sordid activities those Gehenna scum are up to on a day like this...

The festive day to celebrate all of Trinity's saints has come.
Pumpkin ghost...? Did you have a nightmare?

Normal.Transcription: Sensei—er, my lord! Izuna heard your call and came right over! Nin nin!
O-Oh, my lord!
A ninja lives in the shadows, forever lurking in the dark... It's not good for your eyesight.
Should we hide somewhere nearby to gather information?
This place is big enough to where I can use my Secret Izuna-Style Ninjutsu 108 Shadow Clone technique...
I am awaiting my lord's orders... I'm so bored!
Th-This is a cutting-edge ninja weapon...! *gulp* Can I become an elite ninja with this?!

Lobby.Transcription: Oh, my lord! I've been waiting for you! I'm looking forward to today! Nin nin!
Welcome, my lord! I want to show you the ninjitsu I studied yesterday!

Izuna's dream is to become the best ninja in Kivotos.
You'll work with me again today, won't you...?

What will today's mission be, my lord? Scouting the enemy camp? Rear infiltration?!
Huh? Studying for tomorrow's test?

Are you going out on a patrol today, my lord?
I'll stick by you as though I were your shadow! Nin nin!

I may be a ninja, but I can also play the role of the femme fatale!
Especially with you, my lord!

What? I'm not supposed to use my skills on you?
Then...who am I supposed to use them on?

Happy birthday, my lord!
Izuna vows to stay by your side and make this the best birthday ever!

Wh-What? You want to wish ME a happy birthday?
Th-Thank you, m-my lord...

I'm spending New Year's Day with my lord! This is great!
Happy New Year, my lord!

Merry Christmas, my lord!
I prepared Christmas ninjutsu specially for today!

Halloween. Today is the day when ghosts and goblins walk among us...
But don't worry, my lord.
Izuna will keep you safe from their trick and treating ways!

Event.Transcription: My lord! It's the festival! Where should we go first?

My lord! Izuna is really excited for the festival!
Izuna shall follow you!

The festival is already at this stage.
My lord! Were should we look next?

Aw. The festival is ending soon, right?
Whatever it takes! Please stick with Izuna till the very end, my lord!

The Hyakkiyako Festival is already over...
There's still plenty of festivals to come.
Please hang out with Izuna again, my lord!
Hmm hmm hmmm. ♪ Izuna, on the lookout!

Izuna senses a presence... It's my lord!
Were you looking for Izuna? Heehee.

Dango, senbei okonomiyaki...!
There's so much food Izuna wants to eat with you!
Izuna is ready! My lord, Izuna will protect you by being your festival guide! Nin nin!

Normal.Transcription: I'm Shizuko of the Festival Operations Department! I look forward to working with you, Sensei... Huh? I'm trying to be professional here!
Moe moe...kyun! D-Did I do it right?
I need to get back to preparing for the festival.
How should we spruce up Momoyodou's menu?
Maybe we should try something bold... Like kimono-style bunny girl outfits.
Do you think we could use this place as a temporary shop for Momoyodou?
This is something that's not for sale at any festival, right? Heeheehee, I'll cherish it, Sensei!

Lobby.Transcription:
Heehee, you're back, Sensei!
Heehee. That was perfect.

Ugh. I'm getting exhausted...
Oh, Sensei, you're here! Sit down, sit down! Please, make yourself comfortable!
Yes, Sensei? Which task can I help you with today? You can count on me!

I don't know why I always let my guard down when I'm with you.
Is it...just because of who you are, Sensei?

Ah... When I go back to Momoyodou, there will be a lot of work waiting for me.
Do I not wanna go back?
Heehee. That's not it. It's what I'm supposed to do.

What? You think I'm cute?
D-Don't tease me like that! You know how I really am. I'm so...
That's what's cute about me? U-Ugh...

You're careful with your wallet, right, Sensei? You need to be careful with it, okay? 
The festival and Momoyodou's anmitsu are waiting for us.

Happy birthday, Sensei.
Now, let's go to Momoyodou. The Festival Operations Department president declares that it's time for a birthday party!

What?! You want to celebrate my birthday?
A-Ah! D-Don't look at me! I know my face looks really weird right now!
Heh. Heh heh. Heh heh heh...

Happy New Year! I'm going to spend New Year's Day dozing on the kotatsu!
Five more minutes...
Today is Christmas! Let's go Sensei! The Festival Department can't just sit around do nothing.

Trick or treat! If the students try to trick us, they'll have to order our anmitsu!
What? We can't force them to? Why not?

Event.Transcription: Welcome to the Momoyodou shop! Now, Master, what do you need today?

Oh, Sensei. Welcome.
Now, choose to your liking!

The festival is over, but we're still open.
I'll personally bless the remaining items. Look around, Sensei!

Momoyodou won't be stopped, even if there is a festival!
Well, we are the Festival Operations team after all. Heehee.

Great. Here it's... Moe moe...kyun!
Huh? This looks old? How so?!
Oh, that! No, no. It's not like I was thinking about taking the leftovers!
Your choice... I knew you had good taste, Sensei!
As always, thank you, Master!
That's a good item, right? Heehee.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive
Go with the light at your back, hero.
I must prepare for new game plus.
I would also like a cup of coffee.
It is important to take a few breaks. They restore your HP.
I want to go on another raid. Expect a DM later, Sensei.
I like to be petted. It warms my artificial proteinic skin.
This is the...legendary holy sword...! Oh, it's a gun.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. I have been waiting for you.

What kind of adventure will you embark upon today?
I am ready to accompany you at any time.
A new game is coming out soon! You will join me to play co-op, correct?

Mmm. I am hungry. Huh...?
No! I do not eat batteries!

It has been many a millennia since humans last set foot here...
I have always wanted to say that.

I do not know why I am shedding tears.
They must be to wash my ocular lenses.

Sensei, your next destination is an arcade...
L-Lying? I would never!

It is the anniversary of the first time Sensei logged into my world. I am eternally grateful.
Congratulations, Sensei.

Today is my birthday. The day I got to meet everyone.
It is also the day I met Sensei for the first time.

Happy New Year...
 Disregard! Now is not the time for that!
Sensei! The New Year's event is underway!

Santa Claus allegedly leaves presents for good boys and girls.
I hope you will be my gift, Sensei.
Ghosts are not scary. Dark-type monsters are weak to light-type spells.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
I'm the best player around! I'll help you out.
Hmm... This game is actually kinda fun.
I hear this game's getting a sequel. That's it, I'm getting a part-time job.
When I'm all grown up...I might grow out my hair.
C'mon... C'mon... The claw picked it up!
All right, now I just need to... I got the prize!
I don't know if this is the right way to describe a weapon, but it's beautiful. I'm happy.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. Let's be sure to work hard today as well.
I'm going to work hard so today is special for both of us.

I'm worried about the Game Development Department.
I know we'll be okay as long as you're with us...
You played our game too, right? Which part was your favorite?

I want to draw even more beautiful things... But I need to practice.
Can you help me?
I don't want my art to just be about moe, I want it to convey "love" too.

Hmm... It's a tight budget again this month.
Do we get paid if we're on the roster?

I want to wish you a happy birthday, Sensei! 
I don't know what you like, so...
Do you wanna come hang out with me?

I think birthdays should always be spent with family.
So I've got to hang out with Momoi today. Wanna come with, Sensei?
Happy New Year! I'll be counting on you this year as well.

Merry Christmas! Today's a day made for couples.
...I-Is something I heard once!

I'm not usually a big Halloween fan, but maybe with you here this year...
I think it'll be fun. I'm excited!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Wanna hear a fun story? Let me tell you!
Games! Games! I just want to play games!
Huh? I used to watch this series when I was young.
Hmm... We don't have enough for everyone's snacks. Should I get a part-time job?
Oh! I just thought of a wonderful story idea!
Great! All clear!
Th-This is exclusive equipment! I am now a proud, OP schoolgirl!

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei! Let's start a mission!
I'm all ready. Let's go! We've got quests to clear!

There's a difference between pro gamers and game lovers.
Which one are you?
Oh! That new game is coming out today.

I was supposed to go on a raid today! But I'm on the roster instead!
...I guess this isn't so bad, either.
The mission can wait, Sensei. Let's play a game first!
You're so lucky, Sensei... You can buy any game, whenever you want.
Happy birthday, Sensei! Let's go chow down with everyone from the club!

Sensei! Today's me and Midori's birthday!
Buy us a two-player game that we can play together!
Happy New Year! Let's play fun games this year!

Christmas... *sigh* 
If you dress up in red and gift me a game, this'd be the best Christmas ever!
Wow! It's Halloween! I'm so excited, Sensei! C'mon, get me some candy!

Normal.Transcription: The Great Leader of Red Winter Academy is here! Feel honored, Comrade!
Hmm... I like it. The great leader is quite pleased.
Hmm... I see everything is in order.
Ahem. Her honorable-ness has arrived.
What a peaceful day. And it's all thanks to me! Hahaha!
(Is my mustache on right...?)
I absolutely love it. My authority! My power! My mustache! Now I'm starting to get scared... But don't worry, Comrade. I'll always be with you.

Lobby.Transcription: There you are, Comrade! We have much to do and so little time!
You're here, Comrade! We've got a big day ahead! You'd best be ready!
Did you call me, Comrade?
You're with me today. It's time to partake in revolution, Comrade!

Can't you feel my authority?
Worry not, Comrade. You have nothing to fear. I am quite merciful.

Huh? My mustache fell off?
Huh...? Nooooo! My authority...
What the heck? It's right where its supposed to be! Is this a joke to you?!
Heehee... I'm glad we're together again, Comrade.

It's your birthday? Really?
Very well. I shall create a new annual celebration to mark this day!

Um... I admit, I'm a little embarrassed...
My grand superiority feels somewhat lessened when you tell me happy birthday...
But thank you anyway, Comrade!

Happy New Year, Comrade! Are your resolutions for the new year in order?
If not, then I'd be happy to advise you!

Today's date is... Right, Christmas! That day when a fat, old man gives gifts to kids.
That's amazing! I want a gift too!

Halloween... The masses always get so loud and annoying.
Oh, my mustache...? It's not a Halloween costume!
Say it again, and you'll be tasting my boot, Comrade!

Event.Transcription: The purge begins now!
Heh heh. It's time for revolution!
Excited for Ivan Kupala's festival!
Hmm? Need my help, Comrade?
I can't believe there are students who still defy the authority of the mustache!
Purge them all!

For this year's Ivan Kupala, I've prepared a huge... uh... um...
Pudding! A huge pudding!
Once the purge is done we can share among us.

Normal.Transcription: Are you the one that I've been watching through my telescope? Ooh, I'm so excited!
Heehee. I found some cool furniture!
I wonder what's beyond...
If I don't escape from the Spec Ops...
The view here is spectacular!
I wonder where Sensei is...?
Thank you, Sensei! I'll treat it as preciously as this telescope!

Lobby.Transcription:
I knew you'd be back soon!
I was... I was watching you!

Huh? But Sensei was here just now...
Ah! You scared me! When did you get here? I wasn't watching you!
I'm happiest when I'm watching you.
I never get sick of your face no matter how many times I look at it!
Ugh... You're not supposed to be like that with other people.

When you're looking out at this big wide world...
...you realize that we're all so insignificant.
I hope you and I can go stargazing one of these days.

Happy birthday, Sensei!
I'll be watching to make sure nothing bad happens to you today!

Did you know, Sensei? If you look up at the stars on my birthday... 
...you can see a pair of stars flying across the southern skies. That day is...
...today!
This year,I'm gonna get out of this place and go back to the main institute.

If you look up at the night sky from far below on Christmas...
...all the stars shine so beautifully.
I wonder if I'll get any candy this Halloween...

Event.Transcription: Oh, Sensei? Did you bring something to eat?

Thank you so much for the supplies!
We'll find some way to repay you!

The festival is already halfway over.
Well, I guess this doesn't relate to us that much...

Looks like Ivan Kupala doesn't have much left either.
If you find anything else that might be delicious or useful...
Please bring it to us!
It's the last day of the festival, Sensei. Anything you're forgetting?
The festival is over, but we still need all the supplies we can get!
Spec Ops is always low on sweets...
When do you think we can return to the main institute...?
Wow! That looks so tasty!
Can we really eat it?

Normal.Transcription: I'm Yuzu, president of the Game Development Department. You're really going to accept me?
I guess...you like the mature types?
I want to study games more seriously.
This area looks nice. I want to take a nap right here.
Um... I wonder if there's anywhere to hide.
Ack! What are you doing here?!
I feel like power is filling my body. Is this...courage?

Lobby.Transcription: Sensei... You're here. I was waiting for you.
Sensei... Welcome.
A favor for you? Anytime.

Yes, you can ask me anything.
I'll... I'll do my best!

Oh... I really want a pet cat.
Games and cats... That's all I need to be happy in life.

Yes, Sensei. I'm going to become stronger.
Just like how you and everyone else protected me... I want to help everyone too.
(I want to be someone worthy of standing by their side.)

Happy birthday, Sensei.
