I mean that...from the bottom of my heart!

Today is...my birthday.
It's Kivotos' Culture Day... Don't forget!

Happy New Year.
I'm gonna show you just how much I can grow.

Merry Christmas, Sensei.
There's something Santa and video games have in common. Both of them make you feel so excited.

The streets are filled with flickering jack-o-lanterns and candy.
I want to go too. With you, Sensei...

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
I'm Shirasu Azusa, a transfer to Trinity. I work solo and can take cover easily due to my size. Any other questions?
Hmm. Not bad, I suppose.
(So many interesting things...)
What's that?
Heehee. That's funny.
So cute!
Sensei, I want you to decide how I should use this power. Because I am here for you.

Lobby.Transcription: I've been waiting, Sensei. What's today's mission? Anything I can help with?
You're back, Sensei. Let me know if there's anything you need done.

If life has no intrinsic meaning, then why do we live at all?
Huh? Oh, it's nothing.

Missions. Objectives. Achievements.
I've never really thought about much else...
...until now, anyway.

I wonder if I'm being helpful...
I am?
Um...
It's okay. I know I'm no fun. Sorry to disappoint you.

One of these days...
...I might fall short of your expectations.

Even if none of this matters, it's okay if I'm with you.
Happy birthday.

Are you really...celebrating my birthday?
Is it really okay to celebrate a birthday like mine?
I was happy to hear it... Thank you.

Here's to surviving another year. I hope next year we'll...
N-Nothing!

Christmas... A holy day, and one of the most important of the year.
Is it really okay for someone like me to be with you like this today?

It's loud and crazy. I just don't care for it.
But if you like it, then I'll do my best to care.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
I'm Urawa Hanako. I look forward to working with you, in all kinds of ways.
What a cute, cozy place!
Did you do the interior design, Sensei? It's adorable!
Maybe I should casually just leave something behind...
Or, hm... Maybe I should play a prank...
Heehee. This is so much fun!
You are so silly, Sensei. Do you really want to see everything from me? Heehee! I'm talking about my skill. What were you thinking?

Lobby.Transcription: You're here, Sensei! I look forward to working with you today.
Heehee. I've been waiting, Sensei.
Heehee, I guess it's kind of fun to be on duty like this.

I think it's just the two of us here...
Maybe I'm kind of excited?

Huh? What do I mean?
I'm not sure... What DO I mean?
Do you need me to do anything, Sensei?
Heehee. I just wanted to see your face, Sensei.

Happy birthday, Sensei.
Is there a particular gift you've been wanting? If not...
...I could always be your gift.

Um... A birthday gift...
Oh, you're the gift, Sensei? Heehee. Just what I wanted!
When can I unwrap it?

I look forward to working with you this year, Sensei.
I'm sure I'll make lots of mistakes, but please don't leave me, okay?

A holy night. I'm so excited...
Huh? Oh, heehee. I'm just talking to myself.

It's Halloween. It's the day everyone shows a little more skin...
Huh? That's not what it is?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Shimoe Koharu... Mark my words. I won't be here for long!
Ugh. Normies...
Ugh...
I have no plans on getting to know you better.
If I come across anything unseemly, I'll get rid of every bit of it.
Everyone looks so excited.
I made it this far. Sensei, you saw it, right? This is just the beginning. Please continue to watch over me.

Lobby.Transcription: Oh, Sensei. Welcome.
I've been waiting, Sensei.
I-I won't forgive anyone being naughty where I can see!
Quiet about my grades...! I'm trying my best.
I'm gonna do my best to attend the Make-Up Work Club and graduate.

N-Naughty things...?
No such thing allowed! I'm gonna confiscate everything and burn it into ashes!

Teacher-student relationships are completely inappropriate!
That can't happen in Kivotos!

It's your birthday, Sensei. You can relax today.
No, wait! You can't slack off just because it's your birthday!

Y-You knew today is my birthday?
Th-Thank you. I didn't think you'd remember.
That makes me weirdly happy...

Are you sure you want to spend your New Year's with me?
N-Not that I'd care, mind you.
Nothing illicit will taint this holy night! You got that, Sensei?!

Do I want some candy? I can't eat childish stuff like that...
Oh, never mind.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Shirasu Azusa. Arrived at the objective. Let's go straight to the next, not that I'm particularly excited.
This place isn't so uncomfortable. Not bad.
I feel like I'm being watched.
Heehee.
I have to admit this is cute...
Might be just a bit tired...
This is exactly what I needed. Thank you. I'll make sure you won't regret it.

Lobby.Transcription: I've been waiting. Hurry, Sensei. What's the next mission?

Just...continue like this?
Hmm? When did you arrive?

Wh-Why are you staring at me?
I knew it. Is it too loud? The clothes...?

I don't have any room to judge, I'm being honest.
I wonder what I look like...
If that is what you want Sensei, then I'll follow your decision.

Hmm? What am I doing?
Nothing in particular, really.
And that's how I like it.

I get to experience a lot of new things when I'm with you.
I never could have imagined this at one point in time.

These clothes offer no particular defense to my midsection.
Hmm? You think it makes it more powerful? What is that supposed to mean?

Happy birthday, Sensei.
The days we can relax and talk together...
I really am glad.

Hmm? Happy...birthday?
Oh, yes... Thank you, Sensei.

Another year safely gone by. Hopefully this summer as well...
N-No. It's not that I'm looking forward to...

I don't think the outfit is suitable at all...
But that makes it better?
I don't understand.

Well, people often wear flashy clothing today.
So I think this will be fine.

Event.Transcription: Ocean... Summer...
Hmm? What the...? What are you looking at?
Welcome, Sensei. There's a lot to do.
This swimsuit is so cute! Heehee.
S-Sensei? Were you staring at me?
S-Stop looking... I'm really not used to this.
I-I'm fine... Don't mind me.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Trinity Justice Task Force first-year, Mashiro. Wherever it may be, under any circumstance, I will support you, Sensei—with all my might.
Something feels suspicious, but...
Surely there won't be students causing a commotion at a place like this, right?
(It would've been great to come here with the upperclassmen.)
(This location offers a great vantage point.)
(Carefully... Stay still as the water.)
Is this also...true justice?

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei! How shall we train today?

I've been waiting, Sensei. Let's go and have fun in the water...
I mean, let's go begin training!
Alas, let's sortie!
Justice is never out of season!

Cute swimsuits are justice...?
I'll keep that in mind.
You mean this? It's a normal popsicle.
Are you okay with eating something that I've been eating?

Happy birthday, Sensei.
I'll stay by your side and protect you so that your day can be perfect, Sensei.

A birthday present? I see...
...but this popsicle is more than enough for me, as long as I'm with you, Sensei.
Happy New Year. I'm already looking forward to this year's summer training.

Summer is over and now it's already Christmas.
Good times fly by so quickly.
I'm starting to enjoy the warm pumpkin soup served in the dining hall.

Event.Transcription: It's pretty hot today too. Watch out for heat strokes!
Now, let's begin the special summer training!
I'm nervous. It's my first time at the beach with students from Trinity...
The wise ones like the water...
(Maybe I should at least consider non-black for my swimsuit color...)
Just now, I think I heard Tsurugi's despair.
Whether it's for duty or for fun, I'll do it the proper way.
Surely students wouldn't cause a commotion at a place like this...
Never let your guard down, not even on vacation.

Normal.Transcription: Bluuue Archive!
Keheehee! Oh... S-Sensei?
I-Is it really okay for me to be here?
H-Huh?! Sensei?!
Y-You see...um... Ugh... Ahhh!
I'm more at ease on the battlefield...
A place like this... I-I...!
Heeheeheehee... No doubt... Heeheeheeheeheeheehee!!!

Lobby.Transcription:
Y-You're here, Sensei!
L-Looking forward to today...
I-I've been waiting. Sensei!
Kehee....heeheehee... Keheehee!!

Ke-hahaha
Hahahaha!!! Kekekeke!!!

Yes? S-Sensei...?
How long have you been standing there...?
Hmm? The whole time?! Then...?!

S-So...about that...
I don't know how I should explain it.
B-Birthday... Just say whatever you want, Sensei!

B-Birthday? Y-You remembered my birthday?!
Th-Thank you...Sensei.
I'm looking forward to the coming year, Sensei.

Th-This doesn't feel like an appropriate look for a day like this.
What? You think it's fine as is?

The streets are glowing strangely, and so busy.
So this is, Halloween...

Event.Transcription: S-Sensei, um... It's n-nice to meet you!
(I wonder what Sensei thinks about how I look...)
Wh-Whoa!
Oh... Um... Uh...
I...I'm ready, Sensei.
(What to do, what to do... What am I going to do?!)

Ts-Tsurugi!
Let's go!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
I-I know this look is still very modest. But if you're okay with it, I'm happy to help!
It's a little embarrassing to wear this in a cafe.
The furniture has a summer vibe too...
(No wonder. I had a feeling I was attracting attention.)
(The warmth of the summer sun feels great...)
(Is there any summer-exclusive Peroro merch?)
This firearm is waterproof, right...?

Lobby.Transcription: Sensei, it's the ocean! The ocean is waiting for us!
The weather's nice today, Sensei. Are you up for a walk on the beach?
I heard we were going to the beach, so I put this on.
How does it look? Is it too plain?
We can't leave out Peroro, even during a vacation on the beach!
I thoroughly prepared waterproofing measures to prevent Peroro's soft feathers from getting wet!
Hmm? Sensei, have you seen the Crusader that was parked at the front of the Schale building?

Happy birthday, Sensei!
I want you to have my cherished Peroro tube as a gift!
What do I want for my birthday?

No... I'm okay.
Having a vacation with Sensei is the best birthday gift for me!

Happy New Year, Sensei!
I can't wait for summer this year as well!
I saw Peroro buried in the snow in front of the Schale building earlier.
It was only wearing a Santa hat. Won't it get cold in this weather?
H-Halloween costume? This is just a typical swimsuit. Ahaha... I can understand the confusion, though.

Event.Transcription: Mmm... Refreshing ocean smell!
I hope it's a fun vacation!
I'm ready! I even brought a Peroro tube for swimming!
Oh? I swear I put the keys to the locker rooms here...
S-Stop looking at me! It's embarrassing!
We're finally here! Look, the ocean!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Gehenna Head Prefect Hina reporting. I assure you this outfit is merely for summer training.
I hope this swimsuit will not cause any issues.
I'm getting a little tired. Perhaps due to the training.
Cute swimsuits aren't my style.
It's nice and cool here. Perfect for summer training.
Perhaps I should plan my next session for here.
This, for me...? Thank you. I won't let you down, no matter what.

Lobby.Transcription: Ah, you're here, Sensei. Preparations for the training session are complete.

I'm looking forward to the summer.
Don't look at me like that, please.
My swimsuit? It's my summer training uniform.

No, I didn't hold particularly high hopes for this summer.
...Mostly.

Resting is just as important as training?
I suppose, but I can't just neglect training.

You want me to ask for help when I need it?
Thank you, Sensei. You always know what to say.

Please accept my support this summer, Sensei.
I'll be there until the end.

It's your birthday today, Sensei?
Let's see... Have any gifts in mind?
A walk on the beach? Heehee. Sure if that's what you want.

My birthday? Oh, I forgot about that.
Do I want anything? I haven't given it any thought.

You want to go in the water, together?
S-Sensei, wait. I'm not ready!

Happy New Year, Sensei.
I'll look forward to this summer. And maybe the next one...

Merry Christmas, Sensei.
I'll never understand the commotion about this day.
But it is nice spending it with you.

Oh, Halloween? I've never really participated...
Everyone seems so lively spending summer on the beach.

Event.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. We're ready for summer camp. Let me know if you need anything.

Oh, you're here, Sensei. Did you get to check the summer camp schedule?
So hot today... Stay hydrated.

It's summer. The heat and humidity are leaving me lethargic...
...but it all comes with the territory of training.

Dangers are always lurking at the beach.
You never know when and where accidents will occur. Be careful.
Um... You can call me if you need me.

I never expected to spend summer camp training with you.
That's...somewhat new and refreshing.
This outfit is suitable for summer training.

There's no sense in throwing out things that are still good.
I just thought that this would be effective. That's all.
The summer training camp will begin now.
It's annoying, but it's part of training.
It's hot and annoying...
I'm seeing real effects from the boot camp.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
I'm not joking! This is all part of the recon mission.
Surely there won't be students drunk off the resort atmosphere causing mischief here, right?
Looks like there isn't anyone...out of line.
(Would this be enough to protect from UV rays?)
(Is there an ideal place to open up the sun bed...?)
(Aaaah! No wonder I felt like someone was staring.)
This is...a proper weapon? Really?

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. It's sunny today and great for sunbathing.
You're late! I thought I was going to get sunburn waiting for you!
No eating while walking! No exceptions just because it's a resort.
What's that smile on your face? Surely you're not excited about the ocean, right?
What? You can't stop smiling after seeing my swimsuit?
Die, you pervert!
Heehee. Lemonade tastes so much better at the beach.
N-No, I'm not excited because of the ocean!
Happy birthday, Sensei. Is there any gift you want?
This is already enough? What do you mean?
A birthday at the beach seems a little romantic, but I guess I don't hate it.
There are only fools in the water and trouble on the beach, but...
It's still the best birthday I've ever had. Thanks.
Is it already New Year's Day? It felt like summer was just yesterday. Time sure flies.
A Santa bikini outfit? No one would ever wear anything so stupid! Pervert! Die!
No wonder I had an uneasy feeling.
Y-You say something just went by behind me?
It's not even summer. Stop it with the sudden scary story!

Event.Transcription: You're here, Sensei. We've prepared whatever you might need for summer camp.
My schedule is always a lot lighter compared to the president.
Hmm. That's not bad.
Not bad, Sensei.
You can trade in Gehenna supply boxes right here.

Why are you staring like that?
Nothing's free, period.
We're already halfway through camp. You should hurry if there's anything you need.
Not many days left for summer camp. If you need something, be sure to let me know soon.

Is today the last day? It was an eventful break.
What a summer camp.
Summer training is all over. Check if there's anything left behind.
Huh, there was something like that lying around? You're lucky, Sensei.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Summer! It's summer, Sensei! Come eat delicious food with me this summer!
Traditional summer foods. Shaved ice... Somen... Grilled sweetfish... Yum!
Next time we go to the beach, Sensei... We're eating 100 takoyaki!
They're a must for summer! Yakisoba, zarusoba, and nagashisomen!
It's so nice and cool here...
Swimsuit? Check. Cooler? Check. I officially have everything ready for summer!
An equipment just for summer?! You got it for me?! Yay! I'm so happy!! Thank you!!

Lobby.Transcription:
Oh, Sensei! Let's go to the beach! The beach, Sensei!
You have work to do? Then I'll wait until you finish!

La la la... Welcome, Sensei!
I'm all set. Waiting on you to get ready, Sensei.
Hmm? What do I mean? Of course it's about preparing to go to the beach!
Summer calls for the Beach Shack! We have to go, Sensei!

Red, yellow, green...and blue.
Which is your favorite, Sensei?
Hmm? What am I talking about? Shaved ice syrup flavors, obviously!

Sensei, have you heard that swimming in the ocean makes you hungry?
I tried to think of a solution.

And I got it! I just need an edible tube! It'll help me float AND feed me!
What do you think? Amazing right?! Eh-hem!
Hmm? There isn't a tube like that? Why not?

Happy birthday! Sensei!
Let's turn Schale into a waterpark to celebrate!

Ta-da! Today's my birthday, Sensei! Let's go for a swim!
Summer is still a ways away, but how could I wait when you're here with me?

Happy New Year! Sensei!
Rice cake soup would be great to ring in the new year, but I can't waitto eat summer delicacies with you too, Sensei! Heehee!

Merry Christmas! Do you think it's too cold to be wearing a swimsuit?
I just had a warm udon, so I'll be fine!

Halloween is a day dedicated to wearing weird clothes and getting candy, right?
Hmm. Then maybe this look is okay after all?

Event.Transcription: Oh, it's Sensei! Well, welcome to the Beach Shack!
Welcome, Sensei! I've been waiting for you!
Yes! Take a gander! Lots of tasty things!

Hey Sensei! This one! See?
Come on, don't look at me! Look around the shop!
Um! N-Nothing for free even if you keep poking me like this!
We're almost half way to the end of the day! Enjoy while you can!
The end is close! Keep at it!
Sensei! Today's the store's last day. Did you get everything you want?

We're closed! Thank you everyone!
Thought that was it? Don't worry. You can still exchange!
Remember to check one last time if you forgot anything!
Wow! I knew it, Sensei!
You chose that? Hmm... Good choice!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive
I was just cycling. Want to join me, Sensei? It'll just be a light 200 kilometers.
Today's average pace is... Hmm. Just a little faster than my average.
I need to cool off.
Where should we go next?
We need to fill up on calories so that we don't get tired.
Group-cycling would be fun too...
This is a lightweight personal weapon developed for riding and more agile tactics. It's great for enduring long-distance rides as well.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. Would like to go cycling with me?
I was waiting for you. Where should we go today?

I've been working on improving my cadence when cycling.
I heard pedaling faster while at a lower gear makes for good practice.

I haven't had as much time to cycle lately due to task force work.
That's why I'd like to go the distance today.

Would you like to learn how to cycle, Sensei?
I can be in front and block the wind while you follow behind. 
That will make it much easier for you.

There's something I want to buy, but I'm holding out.
It's an expensive bike part.

Actually, I made several of these jerseys hoping to go cycling as a group. 
But the others refused, so it's just me.

It's Sensei's birthday today?
Would you like to go cycling to celebrate?
My birthday?....Oh. I suppose it is. Th-Thank you.

I know a mountain course where you can see the sunrise from.
We can ride through the night and watch the sunrise from the peak.
Would you like to go with me? It's only 2,000 meters above sea level.

Cycling on this kind of day as well? Well...I don't have any plans anyway.
I'm fine with meeting up right now, Sensei.
Cycling is off limits? Hmm...

Today is Halloween?
Hmm. How about Trick-or-Cycling...?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Don't treat me like a child! I'm still everyone's favorite older sister at heart!
(Seeing the cafe from this perspective is interesting...)
Hmm. It would be uncomfortable for anyone at this height.
(Just a little more... If I stretch just a little more!)
*yawn* So sleepy...
If I'm just a kid, it's okay if I take a nap, right?
It seems a little big for me now, but still, I'm most familiar with this weapon!

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. Looking forward to today's class!

*yawn*...
A strawberry chocolate with rum raisin...

O-Oh! Sensei?
I-I wasn't dozing off!
I'll be a good kid and wait patiently!
Yes, it's yours truly! Shun!

Sensei, Sensei! Someone gifted us Roy's rum raisin chocolate!
Can I try one right now?

I can't have a snack because it'll spoil my appetite?
But they look so good...
Can't I have just one?
Happy birthday to you! Happy birthday to you! ♬

Happy birthday dear...
Ah! I bit my tongue...

Today's my birthday?
Oh, my. I completely forgot about it.
Wait. Then how old am I technically?
Happy New Year, Sensei! Let's hurry over to the temple and drink gamju!
I knew it. I'm still too old for Santa to leave me gifts...
But that's okay. I'm spending this Christmas with you, Sensei!
That means the current me is okay with receiving candy!

Event.Transcription: What a nice day for a picnic!
I'll be guiding you through Shanhaijing today!
Wh-Where do you think Shun went?
(No one noticed...right?)
Sensei, over there! Look at those snacks!
(Haha. I guess this look isn't so bad...)
Welcome, Sensei. Looking forward to today's class!
Heehee. This size is convenient sometimes!
Mmm... I got sleepy...
Thank you!
Heehee. Thank you, Sensei.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Valkyrie Police School's Kirino, reporting for duty! Put your hands up and do as you're told!
Surely there aren't any culprits hiding around here...right?
I hope I'm not breaking any laws by being here...
That person looks familiar somehow. Could they be a wanted criminal?
Nothing to report!
Another peaceful day in Kivotos!
How great would it be if I could shoot this gun skillfully...

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome back, Sensei. Are you up for going on a patrol with me?
Welcome, Sensei. Run into persons of interest on the way?
Was there an issue you wanted to bring up with me?
All I want is to help Kivotos' students.
I love doing the rounds in this neighborhood because there are so many delicious places to eat.
B-But that doesn't mean that I'm slacking on my patrols!
You have the right to remain silent. You have the right to... Wait, what was the other thing you have a right to?
Happy Birthday, Sensei! But even if it's your birthday I won't look past any broken laws!
You remembered my birthday... How touching, Sensei.
Happy New Year, Sensei. Let's work together for Kivotos' safety this year as well!

Ensuring the safety of citizens 24/7!
We can't let our guard down even on Christmas!
Ah, more students walking around with provocative attire!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
I was taking a long break, but oh, well. Can't do much about it if Sensei is calling for me.
Could there be a cheese-flavored drink?
This is a great place to spend the day off.
Can this thing be used in an experiment?
Don't be afraid, Nezusuke.
Oh, my. This is quite...
I am a jack-of-all-trades who is not only skilled at researching, but at shooting as well!

Lobby.Transcription:
*sigh* Oh? You're here?
Want to grab a bite to eat?

There you are! Don't you know it's rude to keep a lady waiting?
As punishment, you'll be helping me with an experiment. Heh heh.

Hmm. The chewiness of the knife-cut noodles...
Astounding. Truly amazing.
What? Is me eating normal food weird? I'm not Nezusuke, you know!

This cool outfit suits me?
Hahaha! Of course. Everything I wear suits me!

I can get a ton of inspiration outside of the lab too.
Either making fun of Kin, or bothering Mei...
Hmm? Is something leaking?

Happy birthday, Sensei.
I don't have a gift for you...but would you like to have an elixir I've been testing?

Ugh. Another year of the immortality elixir being incomplete and another year older.
Hmm? Am I worried about getting old? Haha. Surely not. I'm not like Shun.

So I get to start the year with you.
That must be a sign of good things to come!

Sensei, is there a gift you want?
I don't have gold, but I can brew up something that can turn your hands and feet gold. Haha!

Trick or treat! I'm going to cause mischief if you don't give me something.
Well, I'll be doing that even if you do. Mwahahaha!

Event.Transcription: Sensei, welcome to Shanhaijing!
Heehee. You didn't forget about today's plans, right, Sensei?
Where did Shun wander off to this time?
Heehee. Won't be long until the elixir of immortality can be made!
That's strange. There shouldn't have been any other ingredients in the rejuvenation elixir...

Wait, while I was working...
Did this get mixed in with Nezusuke's fur?
Welcome, Sensei, to my new remote lab!
I'll purchase any good alchemy materials!
Anything can be made with the power of superior alchemy!
Hmm. This blue stone you mentioned. I'm not familiar with it either...

The remote lab won't be open for long.
Remember to exchange any good materials you find!

The vibe around the promenade feels kinda off.
We need to close the remote lab and fast.

The remote lab is open until today.
Get what you need while you can!

The remote lab is closed.
But if there's anything left, please show it to me.
Not a bad choice.
Heehee. Thanks for collecting all the good stuff.
Oh, an excellent choice!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Why pick this of all outfits? Well, it's surprisingly easy to move around in. Hahaha!
I can feel people staring... Is it because of the outfit?
It's even easier to get around in than my maid uniform. Not bad.
Hey! What'cha looking at?! Better watch it!
It's not a bad place. I think I'll be coming here often.
Is Sensei not here? Away? I-I mean, it doesn't matter, anyway...
Hah, you have to go all-out sometimes. Hope you can keep up.

Lobby.Transcription: Oh, Sensei! I was waiting for you. You could show up more often, you know.
You came at just the right time, Sensei! Let's do this!
Why are you looking at me like that? Is it that weird?

Huh? My bomber jacket?
Give it up. Wherever I go, it goes.

Things are pretty slow today. How about you give me something to do instead?
I'm not really a fan of standing around and doing nothing.

Do you need anything?
So maybe there's something I can help you with.
Hey! Hands of the bunny ears! Yeah, I know they're not real, but still.

Hey, Sensei! Happy birthday!
H-Huh? Did I wear this to celebrate your birthday?
S-Stop fooling around!

Haha, Sensei! Today is a special day, right?
...Huh? Did I wear this especially for your birthday?
Absolutely not!

I'm looking forward to the coming year, Sensei.
Really? You're looking forward to it as well? Haha! Leave it to me!

What? Only kids get Christmas presents?
I know that! Who said that's why I'm here in the first place?!

I saw a bunch of people wearing strange outfits today, so I decided to play along.
This should do. How do I look?

Event.Transcription: All right! It's time to work, Sensei!
There is no time to delay. Let's get started right away!
Is there anything else you need me to do, Sensei?
Hahaha! Not bad!
No time to waste.
Wh-Why do you keep looking at me? Let's get work done.
I like to get things done in advance.
Let's finish up neatly.
Cleaning up? That's my specialty!
All right! Wanna get cleanup duty started?
Let's hurry up and get going.
You cheering me on? Ha! I could get used to this.
I am unstoppable!
Heh, guess I have a knack for these things.
When it comes to work, I get it done.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
No matter my appearance, it doesn't change anything. All I have to do is complete my given task.
What a well-organized place. I like it.
I feel like I'm being watched...
Speaking of which, I wonder what Sensei will think of this outfit...
Hmm? Could that be...?
Nothing to do. Well, I guess it doesn't hurt to enjoy some free time once in a while.
If I accept this, I can't make any mistakes in our next operation. I've got your back, Sensei.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. I thought I'd be seeing you soon.
It's time for the mission, Sensei. Let's leave right away.
My outfit? Is there something strange about it?

Who I am doesn't change just because of an outfit.
I'm still me.

Sensei? Do you have something to say?
Huh? You want to touch my ears?

The most important thing for a sniper is keeping calm.
Sensei? What are you staring at...?
W-Wait, Sensei! Don't just stay silent. Say something...

When I wore the maid uniform, I worked with a sense of dutiful service, but...
...I don't know how to feel in this outfit.

Happy birthday, Sensei.
If there's anything you want, just let me know.

Birthday? Oh, thank you... Wait, a gift?
No, you don't have to. You've already given me enough.
H-Happy New Year! Was that okay?

Christmas...
I wouldn't exactly say I'm dressed for the occasion.

It's not uncommon for people to wear something unusual today.
So it should be okay to go outside dressed like this...right?

Event.Transcription: All ready, Sensei. Let's leave.

Is it about time for a mission?
It's fine. I'm always on stand by.
Huh? What is it? Is it related to the mission?
It's about time we start heading out, so let's talk about that later.
Let me know when we're ready to go. I can go right away.
...Huh? Did you call me, Sensei?
Danger comes when you least expect it, Sensei. Time waits for no one.

The end is approaching.
Everything is ready on my side. Leave it to me.

Must finish strong.
I will help, Sensei.

It's the mission results.
Shall we check the contents?
It requires efficiency. If only I were any good at math...

Wait, you want me to calculate it for you?
B-But I told you I'm bad at math!
I-I can't solve something like this...
A great choice.
So that's your choice. Now I get it.
Yes, I agree.
I knew I could count on you.
Look, Sensei. We're not too late.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Ta-da! Look, Master! I'm Bunny Asuna!
Hop hop! I'm Bunny Asuna!
This place looks very interesting!
Hahahahahaha! What's this? Fun!
Hmm, I wonder where Master is? Shall I start looking?
It's not uncommon to see a bunny like me at a theme park, right?
Ta-da! It's done! Bunny Asuna is complete!

Lobby.Transcription: There you are, Master! Me and my cute bunny outfit have been waiting!
What's your favorite part of it, Master? The ears? The tail? Or...?
Hmm? What's wrong? I thought you liked it. Do you want to try it on for yourself?

It's natural for bunnies to seek attention.
That's why you have to pet them, Master!
Hahahahaha! It tickles, Master!

Hmm. I'm kinda bored.
But you know, I'm happy as long as you're here, Master!

Can a pet bunny be taken for a walk?
Wanna try it, Master?
Happy birthday, Master! It's your birthday, so here's your gift: a cute bunny girl Asuna!

Do you know what day it is, Master?
Haha. That means you have to play with me even more today than you usually do!
A new year has begun, Master! I'll be staying by your side yet again.

Merry Christmas, Master!
Huh? Why am I dressed up as a bunny on Christmas?
I'm Bunny Santa!

Everyone is wearing something fun. I think my outfit counts too, though.
Come on, Master! Here we go!

Event.Transcription: Welcome, Master! Your rabbits are waiting!
Come on, let's go together!
Master! Let's play together!

Ah, Master! Hooray!
I've got an idea. Let's just start running—who cares where to? It'll be fun!

Oh, what was that for? Is it some kind of new game?
Then I'm going to poke you right back, Master! That's okay, right?

Ah, Master! I was so bored waiting for you!
So, let's have fun together!
Can we play if we finish soon?
Have fun until the end!
Oh, Master! Over here!
It's time to pick one, Master!
*da-dump* *da-dump* *da-dump*
Hahaha! What are you looking at?
What's it gonna be? I'm getting nervous!
Woooooow! Really? You're amazing, Master!
Wow! I knew I could count on you!

Ta-da!
Oh, no!
Hahaha! What is this? It's so weird!
Looks like there's still some time left!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Hey, Sensei. I hope your day is sweet like candy!
Wonder if there's anything to munch on...
It's lively. I like it.
B-o-r-e-d.
Is Sensei here as well?
Oh, oh! That's...!
Amazing... You're certain, right? No refunds!

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. Would you like to eat something first?
Heeheehee. I've been waiting for you.
What's wrong, Sensei? Is your tummy hungry? Should I get you something to eat?
I'm curious, Sensei. What do you usually like to munch on?
I don't only talk about snacks!
Sensei. Don't you know there's always room for dessert?

The philosophy behind this dessert...
Impressive, right?

Sensei's birthday!
It can't be helped. I'm paying today!

Sensei. Sensei. Did you...truly forget the importance of today's date?
While I've anticipated and looked forward to this day all year long...

I wonder what this year will bring!
Let's go shopping together, Sensei!

Will Santa abandon me this year too?!
Or maybe you're my Santa!
Today I can get lots of candy...!
C'mon, Sensei. There's enough storage space around here to fit all the candy we'll buy!

Event.Transcription: Heeheehe. I've been waiting for you.
Shall we start?
Buy me dessert after we're done!
In the name of Rewards! Go- Go-♪
Oh, that! That's what I wanted to get!
Oh...! That's...!
Wow, amazing.
Heave-ho!
B-o-r-e-d.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
All encounters are inevitable... It's a pleasure to see you, Sensei.
I feel a holy energy...
The weather is nice today as well.
Would it be okay...if we stop here and rest a bit?
Blessings be with this place.
May the world be at peace for a while.
I didn't want to use a weapon, but if it's to control injustice then...

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. You look great today.
Grace be with you. I pray you have a nice day today.
Would you like to hear a verse?
I-I shouldn't do anything unholy...
(May my prayers protect you, Sensei)
You can confide in me when you're having a rough time.

If it's you, Sensei...
Everything will be okay. I promise.

You being born meant we were able to be together like this.
So I'm genuinely happy to celebrate today of all days.

I can't believe I get to spend my birthday with you, Sensei.
I already feel as though I've been blessed with a gift. Asking for more feels like tempting fate.

Happy New Year. I wonder what fun things lie ahead.
I'm looking forward to it.

It's a festive day on which a great saint was born.
I hope you have a reverent and holy day.

As for the candy... No, thank you.
Abstinence is one of the virtues of a Sister.

Normal.Transcription: I'm Hatsune Miku, a virtual singer who loves sharing my music! I look forward to performing for everyone!
What an awesome stage!
The technology in Kivotos is amazing...!
La la! ♪
Listening to this cafe's music calms my mind.
(Is this...a leek? But why?)
Now my voice can reach more and more people! I'll sing for everyone!

Lobby.Transcription: Hello, Sensei! What kind of song do you want to hear today?

Ah, I've been waiting for you Sensei.
Let's get to work on designing a new set list!
I was originally a virtual idol, but I gained a physical body in Kivotos that I can use to sing with to my heart's content.
I wouldn't call it a repayment exactly, but I'm always happy to contribute!
If it's for you, Sensei, I can sing all the time!
Did someone say "Miku"? Here I am!
If I wrap the leek around my neck, will I be able to sing better?
I'm a virtual vocalist. I'm a singer who conveys the feelings of the music!
Happy birthday, Sensei.
Happy birthday to you! Happy birthday dear, Sensei!
Today is a very special day for me.
I couldn't be happier to spend it with you!
Happy New Year, Sensei. I hope you have a very happy one!
Merry Christmas! Let's sing some Christmas carols together!

Who are you again?
If an interview is what you're after, talk to my agent.
...Just kidding, heehee. What? It's Halloween, so I was playing a trick!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive
I'm Amau Ako, the senior administrator of the Gehenna Academy Prefect Team. I look forward to our future cooperation.
Hmm. The facilities here...pass, I suppose.
The schedule for the next coordinated task between Schale and the Prefect Team is...
The president... Do you think she's eating well?
Things are pretty easygoing around here. Well, it's probably a good thing.
If need be, the Prefect Team can take over... No, that would put the president on the spot. What a shame.
A daring approach...but okay. I'll show you myself what a talented student I am.

Lobby.Transcription:
Ah, you're here, Sensei. So, shall we start our tasks?
There's still more work to do, right?
Hello, Sensei. You're here earlier than I expected. That's commendable!

Sensei? Don't you think you should get to work?
It would be a shame if you have to put in overtime yet again. I don't want that either.

We've barely made progress.
*sigh* It can't be helped I guess.
I'll help as well.

Starting now, I will manage everything from your meal time to your bathroom breaks, so please do as I say.
No complaints, right?

Wait, you're getting things done a lot quicker than I thought...
Wait a sec. Sensei? It's just that...
Was a little concentration all it took for you?
Let me know if you need any help. Assisting is what I'm here to do.

Happy birthday, Sensei. Heehee. I already planned today's perfect schedule a week ago.
I promise you an immaculate day in which not even a minute is wasted.

Oh, are you wishing me a h-happy birthday?
*sigh* Sensei. There are more important things scheduled than that...
Huh? There's nothing more important than my birthday?
You're so forward. Well, I mean, I'll still say thank you, though.

Happy New Year, Sensei!
Of course, even if it's a new year, there are still tasks to do, right? Allow me to help.

Would you like to spend Christmas Eve with me, Sensei?
You can't leave work until you finish all of your overdue tasks.

Is Halloween a day where people give each other snacks?
It's been a while, so would you like to get some sweets with me?

Event.Transcription: I appreciate your support, Sensei.
I'll be counting on you for the rest.
The Prefect Team's supplies!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Cold is nothing to me, the Master Scribe of Red Winter Academy.
*yawn* ...Sleepy.
Every last lazy bum will be purged!
Development of the new resort is going well, I presume?
(Heehee. No one can take their eyes off how majestic I look!)
(Maybe I should've added even more medals?)
Oh, I almost forgot. Even on vacation, I cannot remove symbols of my authority. Like my mustache, or my mustache...and my mustache!

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Comrade. Let's enjoy the winter banquet together!
You're late, Comrade! Even if it's you, being late is an unforgivable felony!
Heehee, my authority still shines even on vacation!
It'd be nice if Red Winter Academy had a bunch of great hot springs like Gehenna...

Actually, if I were to take over Gehenna Academy...
Heeheehee.
The hot spring manju made by those former institute guys was pretty good...
Huh? Why am I wearing my school swimsuit under my yukata?

Isn't it common sense to wear a swimsuit in the bath?
Come on, Comrade. You're asking such obvious things.

Hmm. It might get wet...
...but is it really impossible to enter the hot bath with my mustache?
Even for someone like me, if you keep staring like that...it's a bit embarrassing...
Today is your birthday, is that right, Comrade? I rented this luxurious hot springs resort especially for you! So rest up and enjoy.
Together with me of course!
It's my birthday... As of today, I've grown one step closer to becoming an adult.
Something like this should always be celebrated, Comrade!
Since Comrade will be with me this year, there won't be any trouble at Red Winter Academy!
Santa Claus' mustache...is a real mustache, right?
D-Did you see that, Comrade? A scary-looking gremlin just passed by over there!
...It's just an ordinary Halloween costume?
Ugh... All those who dare scare me will be purged! Purged!

Event.Transcription: Those who doubt my authority, even on vacation, will be purged!
Ahem. It's not so bad enjoying a vacation once in a while.
How dare they open up a hot springs resort without my permission! I'm infuriated!
Purge them all!
Is there a problem, Comrade?
I-I'm not necessarily enjoying this, all right? As the Master Scribe, I am simply inspecting the academy!
Those guys from the Gehenna Hot Springs Development Department were pretty talented...

When I return to the Secretariat, I will build a bigger hot springs resort than this!
Heeheehee...
I don't know why, but the more I enjoy vacation, the sleepier I get...

I'm tired of the hot springs now, Comrade...
I want to return to the Secretariat and rest...

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Overworking can backfire. How about relaxing today and enjoying a break with me?
My body feels nice and warm...
My head feels clear and at ease.
Huh? For some reason, I'm the only one dressed like...?
Everyone looks like they're having fun.
Is there somewhere to sit and rest?
I feel a great burden of responsibility on my shoulders. I will do my best not to forget this weight.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. I've been waiting for you.
You're here, Sensei. Let's check your vitals first.

During breaks, I try to forget about work.
But the more I do that, the more my mind wanders.

I don't know why, but since I'm wearing something like this here, I'm...
I'm a bit nervous.
Sometimes you need a break... You say it so much that I've always wanted to say it back to you.
A hot spring... I never thought I'd find myself in such a place.

Self-care is also important.
I've perhaps been a bit neglectful.

Happy birthday, Sensei. Since it's a special day...
...if there's anything you need... Anything at all.

Huh...? My birthday...? I see...
Seeing you like this is more than enough of a gift.

I look forward to working with you this year, Sensei.
In the future...
If we could be together then too, I'll be happy.

It's Christmas. Huh? Am I not cold...?
Heehee. I'm fine. My body is warm.

It's a busy day, Sensei.
I don't have any candy, but would you like some hot spring boiled eggs?

Event.Transcription: Preparations are complete, Sensei.
Leave support to me.
Sensei...? P-Pay attention to the task!

I do not necessarily hate spending time here...
Meaningless as it is, it still...
How may I assist you, Sensei?
Please stop joking, Sensei.
Let's pick up the pace, Sensei.
Almost there. I will help.
Cleaning up is just as important as the preparation.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Nice to meet you, Sensei. Are you here to learn about the accomplishments of the great President Cherino?
Instigation starts slowly, with the smallest things...
Heehee, it's a cute item that suits President Cherino.
This space is nice because it's warm.
Next time, I'm definitely coming here with President Cherino!
Huh? I sense the president somewhere.
You got this gun for me...? Heehee, thank you, Sensei.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. Did you happen to see President Cherino on your way here?
Heehee, I've been waiting for you. Let's work together for the revolution of Kivotos today, Sensei!
President Cherino's every move is recorded in this notebook.
Do you want to maybe...read it?
No. It's a girl's secret.

In preparation for the day Red Winter Academy takes over Kivotos...
...we need to diligently prepare our speeches.
Heehee, isn't President Cherino's mustache just so cute?

Happy birthday, Sensei. As a gift, I present you my most treasured item.
President Cherino's pre-used toothbrush!

Are you asking about my birthday?
Please remember to celebrate President Cherino's birthday as well.
Of course, I am happy you're celebrating with me like this.
This year... I hope Red Winter Academy will become the best academy in Kivotos...

President Cherino is picking up on things so quickly these days. It's terrible!
She can't find out that Santa Claus isn't real.

Trick all you want—I still can't give you anything back.
All of my candy is reserved for President Cherino.

Event.Transcription: Welcome to the Red Winter Academy Secretariat, Sensei.

Did you find Cherino's special Matryoshka on the academy grounds?
Trade as much as you want here!

Are you enjoying the festival?
Tell me right away if you find the boss Matryoshka!

Aw, there's not much left until the festival ends.
What a shame...

Today is the last day of Ivan Kupala's festival.
Take a close look around Red Winter Academy to make sure you don't forget anything!

The festival is over, but the remaining Matryoshka...
You can trade as many as you want here!

I designed that Matryoshka doll shaped like the president.
Heehee. Cute, right?

I love watching the little Matryoshka dolls within the bigger ones.
It's a bit sad...
You've won a prize! Congratulations!
Oh, you've won! You are lucky as well, Sensei!
You drew something really good. Please take good care of it!
It's an adorable gift. Just like Great Leader Cherino!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Welcome to Hot Springs Resort No. 227, Sensei. As the hostess of the hot springs resort, I will serve you wholeheartedly!
It'd be nice to have furniture like this at our hot springs resort.
This cafe is always full of people. I wonder what their secret is.
This is probably...expensive, right?
(I'm sure I saw Sensei somewhere near here.)
(I don't want to return to the Former Institute just yet...)
I hope I don't have to use this weapon at the hot springs resort... Though if I have to, I will!

Lobby.Transcription: Hot Springs Resort No. 227, open for business!
Welcome back, Sensei. What would you like to do first? Eat or take a bath?

Huh? Ah, th-that's!
Our hot springs resort does not offer that kind of service!

What do you think of this kimono, Sensei?
I paid a lot to rent it.
Does it look good on me? Heehee...
I will try my best not to bring shame to the name of the one and only hot springs resort at Red Winter Academy!
Heh, heeheehee.
I-I wasn't staring, okay?
Sensei, if you're going to take a bath, please come to our hot springs. Don't take a bath anywhere else! Got it?
Including the Hot Springs Development Department members, there are a lot of weird students at Gehenna for some reason.

Happy birthday, Sensei!
How about relaxing leisurely at our hot springs today?

Today is my birthday.
So, just this once, can I...
...ask you to spoil me today?
I hope to eat lots of delicious food this year as well...
Would it be weird to add Christmas cake to the kaiseki course meal?
To commemorate Halloween, we here at Hot Springs Resort No. 227 are giving away pumpkin-flavored corn sticks!

Event.Transcription: Hello. Welcome to the Hot Springs Resort No. 227!
Wow! S-Sensei?! D-Did you have a reservation for today?!

I can earn money and enjoy the beautiful scenery...
The hot springs resort is the best!
Yes? Are you all out of bath products?
Heehee... I'm no longer the old me!

Heehee. Now that I am overflowing with tranquility...
I'm planning on eating two puddings after my meal!

It's been almost one week since I started running the hot springs resort.
I think I can call myself a good hostess, right?

I didn't know that running a hot springs resort
would be this difficult.
The hot springs resort is gone...but I won't give up!
I'm preparing items needed to run a hot springs resort!
If you have any unused products, we'll exchange them for other items here!
Sensei? How can I help you?
E-Even if it's Sensei, I can't give it away for free, okay?
Thank you for the great deal.
Thank you for always helping me, Sensei.
Thank you for your business today!
C-Can I really accept such a good item?
Unfortunately, Hot Springs Resort No. 227's is closed for business...

Normal.Transcription: Bluuue Archive
Heehee. Can I still prove useful to you this year? There's no other choice. Stay by my side and watch what I accomplish this year.
Whew. Business is really going to pick up in the new year.
It's important I keep my composure as a leader.
Are bosses usually expected to give their employees cash gifts for New Year's?!
This rented kimono is expensive, so I need to move carefully...
So tired... Hmm? Where did my employees go?
This is what you call turning it up to 11...right?

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome back, Sensei. Let's get started on today's schedule.
I've been waiting. Now, I'll be escorting you, Sensei.
Sensei, you've made an excellent choice continuing your contract with us this year. ♪
Are you asking if it's hard to tie my hair back this high?

Not really. To be honest, my wallet's the one having a hard time...
Huh? I-It's nothing...!
This kimono is pretty, don't you think? Isn't it beautiful?

I'm prettier...?
S-Stop your lip service!

Heeheehee. Don't underestimate the preparedness of Problem Solver.
I-Is something the matter?
Uh, I mean, h-happy birthday.

Heehee. Today is a special day, Sensei.
Huh? You already knew?
Oh. Th-Thank you...

Happy New Year, Sensei.
This year will be even more special than last year. Heehee.

Merry Christmas! Why am I so excited?
Well, it's almost a new year!

...Trick or treat?
Sit down, Sensei.
Let me tell you why New Year's Day is better than Halloween.

Event.Transcription:
Welcome, Sensei. I've been waiting for you.
I already have something to take care of right at the start of the new year.
Heehee, would you like to help, Sensei?

Your hands are really cold, Sensei!
...Even if there's a lot of work, you still have to get proper rest!

I came to wish for the business development of Problem Solver 68 for the new year.
Why did this happen...?

This year, Problem Solver 68 will be born anew.
Come on, let's give it our all to make this the best year ever!

Don't worry, Sensei. As long as Problem Solver 68 is together...
...we can overcome any obstacle.
Huh? Plans? N-No, I don't really h-have any...

*sigh* It's become a huge commotion.
I hope our employees didn't get hurt.
I didn't expect the commotion to get this boisterous. *sigh* It's unexpected...

...Coming this far actually makes me want to do it more.
Since this is how it is, Problem Solver 68 will stay until the end!
Sensei, you'll be cooperating as well, right?

It ended up being KAITEN FX Mk.1! What the heck?!
It's so ridiculous. I don't even know what to say...

*sigh* Well, it's no use crying over spilled milk...
Sensei, I'm tired. Do you want to grab a meal next time?
Welcome, Sensei. Work preparations are complete.

Problem Solver 68 has prepared a lot for the new year.
Take your time and choose.

Heehee, what do you think? Aren't they such catchy, cool items?
These are all the hidden powers of Problem Solver 68! ♪

Sensei, is there anything that catches your attention?
...A photo of everyone in Problem Solver 68 wearing kimonos?
W-We wouldn't have something like that!!
You have good taste, as expected. Well done, Sensei.

Wow, good choice! I knew it.
It's a really good item, so use it well.
I can't believe you chose that. Not bad. You're fit to be my business partner, Sensei.

Oh, that one's cool, right? I've been wanting to buy one for the office...
N-No! I'm not saying you have to buy me one!

*sigh* The chaos has finally died down.
Heehee. But we're still open for business.
So take your time looking around, Sensei. ♪

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Hahaha! Hi, Sensei! We're going to play together lots this year, right?!
I want to get together with everyone and play hanetsuki!
What should I play with Sensei? ♪
If you laugh, blessings will come your way! ♪
Found a toy! ♪
Hmm. Maybe I can get Sensei to spoil me and give me some New Year's cash!
Hahaha, okay, okay! This could be a little bit of fun!

Lobby.Transcription: Hey, Sensei! It's a new year and you're already hard at work!
Welcome, Sensei! I've been waiting for you this whole time! ♥

Sensei, what should we play today?
Rock, paper, scissors? Kick the can? Or...
Hide. And. Seek?

Oh, right. You're an adult, Sensei. You can just play all day, yeah?
I've got an idea...
I can help!
Maybe it's because I'm wearing this, but I feel like I have more energy than usual!
Come on, Sensei, you can do this! Let's finish work quickly and have lots of fun!

I can't believe I spent this much time playing with you...
Maybe it's fate?!

Happy birthday, Sensei! Of course I remembered!
I could never forget your birthday or your promise to play with me everyday! Heeheehee! ♪

You want to wish me a happy birthday?
Heeheehee! I wonder what my gift is!
Let's go out and play pranks! It'll be so much fun together!

Happy New Year, Sensei! Happy New Year! Bonne Année! Guten tag!
What? The last one is wrong? Oh, you're right!

It's almost the new year. Merry Christmas, Sensei!
Heeheehee. I want to play with you today!

Trick or treat! I'm going to E-A-T you, Sensei! ♪
What? I can't eat you?

Event.Transcription: Oh Sensei, found you! It's the new year and you're working like always!

Wow! I'm surprised to see you right at the start of the new year, Sensei!
High five!
Oh, Aru seems to be in some kind of trouble! Well, it's okay because it's fun for me!
Out of the blue, there's a offering box thief! I just love the chaos at the start of the new year!
Ugh! It's so boring just sitting around doing nothing! Let's go, Sensei!

Looks like there'll be lots of commotion this year as well.
Aru, Kayoko, and Haruka are all relying on you, Sensei, so do your best! ♪

Huh? Me? Well, what do you think?
What do you think?

So, Sensei, what toy should we play with today?
Hanetsuki? Fukuwarai? Daruma otoshi! Heeheehee! ♪

Hmm, I'm kinda getting tired of playing with toys. I'm going to play with Sensei instead!
What do you think? It's a great idea, right?

Heehee. That was fun! You had fun too, right?
I hope this year is full of fun stuff, just like this!
Welcome to Mutsuki's special exchange center!
Hello, Sensei! You have the lucky pouch, right? Let's open it up!
I wonder what's inside! *da-dump* *da-dump*

Huh? Why am I looking at it like that?
Well, because it's always fun to open lucky pouches!

Wow! I can't believe this was inside! I'm shocked! I envy you!
I want it too!

Yeah! It's a good item, Sensei!
This might all be thanks to me! You can be grateful. Heeheehee!

Oh, maybe you won something! Heeheehee. I mean, I did pick it for you.
Think of it as an extension of me and cherish it, okay?

Sensei! Hello! The New Year's event is over, but...
It's still not enough! If there are any leftover lucky pouches, we should open all of them!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
This is my special miko outfit. What? You thought it was cosplay?! No, it's for my part-time job!
Evil spirit, be gone...! Or something like that.
I get a lot of requests to perform exorcisms when I wear this...but heck if I know how to do that.
Miko miko nyan nyan...! ♪ What the...?! How long have you been there? Forget what you just saw!
I worked overtime this month. Can't wait to see my paycheck. Heehee! ♪
I should come here with everyone once I'm done with my part-time job!
Wow, to have prepared something like this... You're leaving me no choice. I'll just have to try to repay you, Sensei.

Lobby.Transcription:
Hey, Sensei. Let's get to work.
I've been waiting to help out.

And then when you returned to Schale...there was a miko standing in the lobby!
Just narrating to myself. Now I'm embarrassed.

I'm the miko, and my role is to help you.
Then does that make you my spirit lord?
Don't just sit there doing nothing. Work, Sensei. WORK.

Senseiii!
I said no goofing off!

Come on now. Get motivated. Motivated!
What do you think? Will it be effective?
Come on, Sensei. You can do this.

Does the miko outfit look good on me?
Y-Yeah! Well, I guess!
...I received a c-compliment.

Happy birthday, Sensei. I got paid today, so I'll treat you. I-If you don't mind, that is.
I-I'll be fine! Since it's an important day...

Do I want anything for my birthday...?
Um... Well, as long as we're together like this...

Happy New Year, Sensei.
S-Since I'm dressed up like this I can go with you to, uh...make a wish and stuff.

Merry Christmas! I knew you would be free today, so I dressed up and came out.
You like it? It has been a while. Should I try a Santa outfit instead?
I-I'll do that later!

I-I can exorcise Halloween ghosts with this outfit...right?!
What do you mean I can't because it's just a cosplay?!
I-It's not cosplay!

Event.Transcription: Oh, welcome, Sensei. So? Did you make your New Year's wish?

S-Sensei. Why are you here?! Y-You're here f-for me?!
Oh, sorry, forget it...

A-As I said before, this is not cosplay!
I'm wearing it for my part-time job!

Wh-What, Sensei? You're staring at me weird...
D-Despite what it looks like, I'm actually working diligently.
When my part-time job is over, I want to call Ayane and the upperclassmen and share a meal with them to celebrate...

Huh? You want me to say it one more time? Again?
Ugh... O-Okay! Okay! I'll say it again!
...E-Evil spirits, begone! Are you satisfied now?!

It's the new year, but it's still pretty wild!
Well, I do think it's good that it's so lively.

*sigh* The Kurokame Gang, the Kaitenger... Why are these things happening one after another?
Will my part-time job pay me without any issues?

We've been flustered since the beginning of the new year, but things seem to be calming down.
Great job, Sensei. Want to go back together and eat some osechi?
Oh, Sensei. Are you here to pick your omikuji? They're over here.

How about picking out an omikuji?
...Are you sure you can promote omikuji like this?

T-Try your luck, Sensei!
My heart is starting to pound for some reason...!

It's okay if you get a bad result. I'm a miko!
D-Don't laugh like that! I was just being supportive!

Oh, you got a great blessing!! That's amazing, Sensei!
If you pick out a great blessing, you get a special prize! Here!

That's a good fortune, Sensei! Congratulations!
On that note, here is a prize given by the lucky miko!

Is it a moderate blessing? That's not bad, right?
Here, this is for Sensei and your moderate blessing!

Huh? A small blessing?
Don't be disappointed, Sensei. Here, let me give you this!

It's a future blessing... I guess it kind of suits you...
Oh, I didn't mean it in a bad way. Anyway, take this. It's the prize for picking a future blessing.

C-Curse?! Ah, hahaha... That's...that's f-fine!
Here, I'll give you this, so don't worry about it, okay?

Oh, the New Year's event is over, but you can still pick out an omikuji.
Here, Sensei!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive. Heeheehee.
Heeheehee. Finally found you. I won't lose you again. Please don't leave my sight. ♥
Normally, I wouldn't be able to relax like this.
Heeheehee! ♥
*sigh* I wonder what you're up to.
Oh, dear.
Heeheehee. That's not good.
I, Wakamo, am ready. I will eliminate your enemies with this. Heeheehee.

Lobby.Transcription:
You're back, Sensei.
I, Wakamo, have been patiently waiting for your return...
...for a very long time.
I've been waiting, Sensei. Heeheehee! ♥

What would you like?
I'm ready to do anything, no matter what.
I'll do whatever you tell me to do.
Everything is yours. My heart, my soul, everything.

Just tell me if there's something you want.
Yes, no matter what. ♥

Ah, I could use a hug right now...
But I have to be patient. Oh, what a difficult test this is...

Do you like this mask?
Heehee. I like it as well.

You can take it off at anytime if you want...
Aren't you curious what's under my mask?

The day you were born...
It feels like a dream to be together on such a joyous day.

Oh, my goodness. You remembered my birthday?
I'm so happy. It can't get better than this.

I hope you have a Happy New Year.
I want to make happy memories with you this year as well.

What do couples do on Christmas?
Heeheehee. I don't know! ♥
Can you teach me, Sen-sei?

This mask isn't for Halloween.
I'm a little sad because someone asked me that earlier.

Event.Transcription: I, Wakamo, have caught you.

No matter how hard you try, you can't run from me. 
You'll learn that today.
Oh... I can feel your presence getting closer.

Heehee. Did you think you could get rid of me like that?
Ah, you're so cute. ♥
Oh, Sensei. Where are you?
You can't hide behind the smoke of explosions and gunpowder...
That's right. I, Wakamo, will never let you go. ♥

Is this what people call...
...a game of hide-and-seek?
Heehee. I don't mind this kind of entertainment.

I'm supposed to chase and catch you, right?
I'm looking forward to it.
Get ready. I'm coming for you. ♥

Normal.Transcription: Blue...Archive.
Huh? Me? I think you've got the wrong girl. What do you want from a lazy Public Safety Bureau member like me?
The sofa here isn't too shabby.
I want to put one in the Public Safety Bureau office.
I want to actively do absolutely nothing...
Ah... I feel like I hear an ominous siren somewhere...
I hope the higher-ups won't come all the way here.
Valkyrie Police School's standard issue firearms are sturdy and easy to maintain, but their accuracy isn't the greatest...

Lobby.Transcription: Hey, Sensei. You're here.

Good job, Sensei.
Actually, I wasn't doing anything.
*yawn* So sleepy.
I don't know why Kirino goes to such lengths.
If the police are idle, that means the city is at peace...
That's why, for a peaceful city, the police should be lazy!

Old-fashioned donuts. The name is corny...
...but the taste is undefeated.
A donut without a hole isn't a donut...
It's just fried dough!

Huh? It's your birthday today?
I didn't get you a gift or anything...
I have no other option. I'll look the other way if you commit a crime, but just for today, Sensei.
Isn't it unfair how we have to go to school or work on our birthdays?
I wanted to rest and do nothing today...
I packed something special for lunch today.
The New Year's osechi lunch box? No, it's a box of donuts from Master Donuts.

I don't really like Christmas...
...but the bargain-priced cakes after the holidays are always welcome!
There are fools in monster masks running rampant around the city?
Here. I wrote down the Security Bureau's number. Call them.

Event.Transcription:
You're busy today as usual, Sensei.
I bought chocolate donuts. Do you want one?
I don't wanna patrol...
Everyone is so lively. Ah, burning youth! How nice...
I have a feeling something bad is gonna happen.

It ended without any huge issues.
I hope this peace lasts forever...
Ah, so peaceful.
I love the lively atmosphere of Valentine's Day so much.

When all the commotion is over...
Leftover chocolate donuts will be on sale!

Unless something huge happens...
...the Public Safety Bureau won't need to get involved.

For example...
The Fox of Calamity stealing an armored vehicle.
Haha. I'm sure that wouldn't happen easily.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
I'm Himuro Sena, president of Gehenna's Medical Emergency Club. A pleasure to meet you.
Hmm... Everything seems fine here.
Any corp—I mean. Is anyone injured?
It should be easy enough to rest somewhere like this.
I don't mind something like this every once in a while.
Where are you, Sensei...?
The equipment has been transferred. We'll be able to provide more support now. We look forward to working with you.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. I've been waiting for you.
Everything is ready. Just let me know, Sensei.

You called for me?
It's fine if it's not anything big, even if it's just a personal matter.

My club's basic purpose is to respond to medical emergencies, including surgical ones.
We don't attend to common ailments such as colds.

I'm used to waiting.
And I'm used to being called suddenly.

Being in this position...
...means that you're trusted.
It's smart to rest when you have a chance and there's nothing else to do.

Happy birthday, Sensei.
I hope today passes without incident.

I just remembered today is my birthday.
Not that it holds any significance.

You're...wishing me a happy birthday?
Thank you. I'm happy to hear that.

It's already time for the new year.
I look forward to working with you this year too, Sensei.

Christmas is great time of year...
...but we tend to be busier than usual.

If it's a day for gift giving, I just want my gift to be time alone...
I mean, maybe some time alone for the two of us.
Trouble typically arises on days such as today. I have to be more alert.

Event.Transcription:
You're here, Sensei.
If you need anything, please let me know.
What a commotion. We should make preparations, just in case.

I stayed because follow-up measures seemed necessary.
If you need anything, please let me know.
Just to clarify I am not a reward...
I'm sorry, but rules are rules. I can't just give myself away.
That's not bad thinking.
I agree with the decision.
I'll get ready right now.
Okay, please wait a bit.
Hello, Sensei. Here's the list of tasks. Good luck.
Here is the work progress so far. Please review it.
...Sensei? Please pay attention to the task.
I'm sorry, but I can't do the work for you.
Yes, I've checked.
It's been processed.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
I'm Kagami Chihiro, the vice president of Veritas. Please inform me immediately if any of my underclassmen cause trouble.
The younger Veritas members are usually causing trouble in one way or another.
Hmm...I did stay up all night, so I'm a bit...tired.
The server crashed again?
(Does this cafe not serve coffee?)
(For this level of security...ten seconds should be enough to get in here.)
Even white-hat hackers need guns. For example... When dealing with rude clients...

Lobby.Transcription: Hello, Sensei. You look busy as usual.
Sensei, I told you to lock your computer before leaving.
What if someone with malicious intent accesses your personal information?
Knowledge must be free... It's a profound but pleasant thought.

Veritas isn't just a playground for oddballs.
It's an association organized to fight Seminar's monopoly on information.
Of course, I can't deny most of the students gathered there are oddballs...
Please don't say "Trackers" in front of me...
Even I don't know what President Himari is thinking.
There seem to be a few people who are relentlessly trying to break in to get your personal information.
Two people... No, maybe three? Maybe even more...
Happy birthday, Sensei. I hope you have a great day today, tomorrow, and forever.
My birthday? Oh, that's today.
I was worrying about everyone else and forgot about myself. It's kind of embarrassing.
How about we approach the new year like a new simple volume?
The cafe is empty on Christmas Eve, so it's great for working all night.

I didn't plan on drawing weird stuff on my face just because it's Halloween...
...but if Maki is the one drawing, I'll allow it.
It's cute, right? Heehee.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Heehee. Hello, Sensei. I'm Mimori from the Inner Discipline Club. I look forward to working with you.
I'm glad that everyone seems to be smiling.
I hope I can give Sensei this black tea I prepared before it gets cold...
Maybe making a meal for Sensei could be part of our training...
Kaede, you aren't bothering Sensei, are you?
It's a bit messy. Should we clean before Sensei returns?
Did you prepare this for me? Thank you, Sensei. I want to support you for the rest of my life.

Lobby.Transcription:
You're back, Sensei.
Heehee. I will be by your side to help you.

W-Welcome, Sensei!
Please, come take your seat. We need to start our tasks, yes?

Did you wash your face this morning? You didn't skip breakfast, did you?
Heehee. Yes. Good Job. Then how about a nice cup of black tea?

If there is anything you need, whatever it may be...
Yes, you can ask me anything.

You're always so busy, Sensei.
The time I spend alone with you like this is precious.
O-Oh. I-I just let that slip out, didn't I?

I've dreamed of becoming a proper lady ever since I was young.
Like the ones I read about in mangas and novels.
I'm training with the Inner Discipline Club and Schale to become a proper lady and make that dream come true.

Happy birthday, Sensei.
I suppose today's a free pass to act however you want, isn't it?

Oh. Are you wishing me a happy birthday?
Heehee. Yes, thank you, Sensei.
Today is already wonderful.

Heehee. Happy New Year, Sensei.
How about some gamju to warm yourself up?

Hmm hmm hmmm. Hmmm hmmm. ♪
It's Christmas, Sensei.
Would you like to go on a walk with me tonight?

Trick or treat...? Ah! Today is Halloween.
I-If it's you, it's okay for you to play pranks on me, Sensei!

Normal.Transcription: Blue...Archive.
Wh-What?! Oh... It's you, Sensei. I thought you were an outsider.
A-Ahhh! Wh-What is this place?
So many people...and they're staring at me. Ughhh!
It's better than being outside, though.
Huh? What's that...?
P-Please don't talk to me...unless you're Sensei.
I-I honestly don't get why would you care about someone like me. But I-I'll...try my best. I swear it.

Lobby.Transcription: Y-You're here, Sensei. I want to recommend you something.
Oh, S-Sensei? When did you get here?

N-No, I wasn't up to anything in particular.
I was just reading a book!
I usually feel anxious unless I'm in the old library.
This place is somehow different. Maybe it's your presence.
Oh, um... No. It's nothing...
You always seem busy, Sensei.

Is there anything I can do to help?
If there's something I can do, please let me know!

There are lots of books here too...
Was I not supposed to see that? I-I'm sorry.

H-Happy birthday, Sensei!
How about taking a day off? Maybe we can read together. If you'd like...

T-Today is my birthday, Sensei.
If you're not busy...
...can we spend time together?

Do you think I can change for the better this year?
Maybe I could...with your help.

Ugh. What a noisy day.
I don't like loud noises...
I like to read in front of a heater on a day like this.

The security system must be enhanced!
Today, a lot of rude people from the outside will show up!

They'll barge in making a fuss about candy or whatever...
Seriously!

Event.Transcription:
Oh... Sensei.
I've been waiting.

You're here, Sensei...
Heh... It's good to see you.

Already halfway done...
It's a little...
It's nothing. Please don't worry about it...

We don't have much of time left...
Hmm...
I wish I could always...see you like this.

Oh... Yes. Here it is.
What's wrong...?
Eeek?!
Um, Sensei... Should we start?
Um...is there anything you want to tell me?
I've made a list of your tasks...
This way. These are the things I need your help with...

Hmm...? Sensei...
It's okay... No worries...
It's nice to organize the list with you like this...
Oh... Yes. It all worked out.
I see... Yes, I'll check.
Th-This is all we have today. Thank you, Sensei...

Normal.Transcription: B-Blue Archive!
I-I'm Wakaba Hinata. Nice to meet you.
I-I can't sit still for some reason.
There are so many different things here...
I-It's probably not a bad idea to rest somewhere like this every once in a while, right?
Hmm... I'm tired.
Is it really okay for me to relax like this?
I didn't expect to get so much attention. But...I'm glad! I'll try to live up to everyone's expectations!

Lobby.Transcription: Y-You're here, Sensei! Peace be with you today!
Oh, you're here, Sensei! Just in time! I'm done organizing.
It's so nice to be able to help!
I-I wonder...if I'm helpful to you in any way.

I'm always making mistakes...
I'm a manager, though...for some reason.
Y-You can ask me anything! I'll always do my best!

I heard there are a lot of rumors going around about me. I wonder what they're about.
No one will tell me...
I-I can organize things for you.
I'm a manager, after all!

Happy birthday, Sensei!
Your birthday is a very special day for me too!
S-Sensei... So, um, today...

T-Today is my birthday! S-So would you...
...mind spending it with me?

A new year...
This year, I want to show you an even better version of myself, Sensei.

It's Christmas Day!
I'm still part of the Sisterhood, so...
...I'll pray for you, Sensei.

H-Halloween?
Th-That's why people are wearing those outfits...
Oh. This is no costume. It's my normal attire!

Event.Transcription: You're here, Sensei! I've been waiting for you!

Peace be with you always.
It's not awkward to hear that from me, is it?
Let's try a little harder!

I think we need to hurry up a little...
I-I'll try my best!
Finishing things is important. I'll help you!
Sensei? Do you need anything?
Hmm? Wh-What's wrong?
Sensei? Is there something you wanted to ask?

I like talking about things like this with you, but...
I think it's time to get started.
I-I organized the things you need! Take a look when you can!
I'm good at organizing and managing! Please, take a look!
There's some work left. Can you check before I finish it?
You can call me all you want...but I don't know what I can do.
P-Please look at the organized items, not at me...
Oh, that's good!
I agree. That would be best.
I knew I could count on you!
Hmm... I think that's good!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Did you call for me, Sensei? Are your orders from President Cherino?
I wish I could have a cold glass of kompot...
It's warm and fluffy. I'm getting drowsy...
Oh, I can't do this. I must train harder!
This place is big, so it's good for combat training.
What if I get lost here?
That's a great piece of equipment. I should be able to wipe out enemies with it.

Lobby.Transcription: Time is gold, Sensei! Try to get back faster!
You're back, Sensei. It's time to attack again!
We, the fearless Red Winter bears, will begin the hunt!
I'll report you to the Secretariat for sabotage if you slack off!
Wh-What are you touching? I'll send you to the Spec Ops!

Who's Medvezi?
Medvezi is a loyal teddy bear that sleeps on my bed.
There's no guarantee of good sleep without him.

You think President Cherino is cute?
Yes! I think so too.

Today is your birthday? Congratulations.
I'll contact the Secretariat to send you special supplies.

You don't have to do anything special for my birthday.
But if you can spend it with me...
...that would make me happy.
Let's make every effort to charge in every direction this year!

Santa Claus.... How does he visit every academy in Kivotos in just one night?
That's awe-inspiring speed!

I'll get treats if I don't play a trick?
Nonsense. Treats should be distributed equally to all students!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
SRT Academy, RABBIT Squad's Tsukiyuki Miyako. Your orders, Sensei.
...I found a cute decoration.
I can handle this much myself.
I didn't expect a sniper point here...
...Receiving. Good reception.
Is there a problem?
RABBIT Type 31 submachine gun acquired. So cute...

Lobby.Transcription:
Welcome, Sensei.
I've been waiting for your next order.
It's nice to see you again, Sensei. Is there anything I can do...?
RABBIT Squad is ready to mobilize at any time.

I suddenly got curious...
What kind of sound does a rabbit make?
...Hop, hop?
If you encounter an enemy you can't handle alone, make sure to call us.

The RABBIT Squad emblem...
Isn't it cute?

Happy birthday, Sensei.
To ensure you have a perfect birthday,
I'll be protecting you today.

I just realized today is my birthday...
I don't need a gift, thank you.
Your safety is the best gift for me.
Do you think we can rebuild SRT Academy this year?

Santa Claus...
I'd like to try fighting him.
If I just shoot the ghost, it won't be so frightening.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
SRT Academy, RABBIT Squad's Sorai Saki. So, where's the Schale operation manual?
Everyone lacks discipline... It's a pity.
There are stupidheads everywhere I go.
Even if you're on a break, you should always be vigilant.
(Where's the manual for using this thing?)
(What is that? It wasn't in the manual...)
RABBIT Type 26 machinegun received. It has a nice weight to it.

Lobby.Transcription:
Oh, it's you, Sensei.
I thought it was an intruder. I almost shot you.
...You're late. Don't you know that even a split second can determine life and death?
...If you have time to joke around, you should focus on our mission.

Guns are like good friends.
As long as you manage them well, they won't betray you.
Malfunctions only happen to lazy people.
Paper manuals are the best.
No need to charge a battery, and there's no fear of hacking.
...No means no. Why would I take my helmet off during a mission?
The upperclassmen would have already finished such a simple task by now.
Sometimes, I get so frustrated with my immaturity...
Happy birthday, Sensei. Is there anything you want?
...My helmet?! The one on top of my head?
Th-That's... Even for your birthday...

...Oh, my birthday? You remembered.
Thank you, Sensei.
I refer to my notes a lot. Otherwise, I'd forget everything.
I hope we can return to the SRT this year...
Christmas... We need to be more vigilant about security, especially since people tend to let their guards down during the holidays.
Sensei, where did you get that terrible disguise?
...Halloween cosplay? What's that?

Normal.Transcription: B-Blue...Archive...
Th-This is SRT Academy. RABBIT Squad's Kasumizawa Miyu... Umm... May I please...go b-back...?
Oh, um...
(I want to start a conversation first...but I'm scared...)
(I want a cup of hot chocolate...)
(I knew a useless crybaby like me didn't belong here...)
Wh-What about the cover...?
RABBIT Type 39 rifle received. H-Heavy...

Lobby.Transcription: Th-Thanks for your hard work, Sensei...
Please tell me when a good time is... I-I'm really good at waiting...
Um, Sensei... D-Do you remember me?
It's always h-hard for me to make new f-friends...
I wish the RABBIT Squad members got along b-better...
I w-wish I was stronger...like th-the others...
I'm as useless as a p-pebble on the street...
I-I don't know how I even g-got into SRT Academy...
S-Sensei... Today's your b-birthday...
I'm homeless, so I couldn't g-get you anything...
B-But... Happy Birthday...!
H-Huh? My b-b-birthday?
H-How...did you remember that...? Wow...
Th-Thank you... I'm so happy...!
I w-wanna go home...back to the SRT this year...
I-I heard Santa Claus...doesn't give bad kids p-presents...
S-Santa Claus probably forgot I exist...
I w-wore a ghost costume at a Halloween festival once...
B-But no one cared I was there...

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Ta-da! The mascot of the Inner Discipline Club is here! The wait is over, Sensei! What should we do today?
*yawn* I'm sleepy. I can't open...my eyes...
According to my calculations, this is the best place for hide-and-seek!
*humming* Hey, whatcha doing today?
In order to become a proper lady, it's important to rest! It said so on TV!
I wonder what Tsubaki and Mimori are doing right now!
Whoa, so cool! Wow...! Hahaha! I'm gonna power up even more! Sensei, thank you!

Lobby.Transcription: Yay! Sensei! I've been waiting for you! What should we do today?
Sensei! You're late! Mushiqueen already started!

What should we do today?
O-Of course, I'm gonna do my homework!

I need to train every day to become a proper lady!
Huh? What kind of training?
First, I'm gonna start with jumping rope a hundred times!

Did you know, Sensei? There are people called "heroes of justice" in Kivotos!
I think they were called...Kaiten...something.

Huh?! They're not heroes of justice? They're kind of different?
...U-Um, is this like a grown-up problem? It's too hard!

Are you working today, too? Why do you like working so much?
...Huh? Sensei? Why're you making that face?
A-Are you okay...?! I'm sorry...

Don't worry. I'm here for you!
This is part of training to become a proper lady someday.
Today, I'll be your secretary! Heehee, aren't you happy?

Oh, Sensei! Happy birthday!
Here! I got this special birthday present just for you!

Huh? You wanna know what it is? It's a cicada I caught some time ago!
Come on, open it!

Wow! You remembered my birthday?
Thanks, Sensei! You think I'm one step closer to being a proper lady now?
I hope so!

Happy New Year, Sensei!
Huh? You're gonna give me New Year's cash? Really?!
Yay! You're the best, Sensei!

Merry Christmas! I'm gonna call Tsubaki and Mimori.
We're gonna party together! I wanna eat chicken so bad!

I saw on TV once...someone said Halloween is a conspiracy from confectionery companies!
They're taking advantage of people's innocence! I can't forgive them! It's not okay!

...Huh? This cracker's for me?
Wow! Heehee, thanks!
