Event.Transcription: Welcome to the Hyakkiyako Movie Village! I'll be your guide, Sensei!

Oh, Sensei! What's going on? Are you gonna play in the Movie Village?
I wanna play with you too!
Oh, but, I can't do that now...

Sensei, how were the attractions at the Movie Village? Were they fun?
I'm jealous! I wanna try them too!

Oh, look at the time. Ugh, I wanna play more...
Can we go there together after this, Sensei?

Huh? Is it already over?
Ugh! But I didn't even get to have any real fun with you!
Well, okay. We should come again later!

The Inner Discipline Club has to help with the event this time...
Ugh... I just wanna play!

Huh? What? Is this like a poking game?
I'm not gonna lose! Yap! Yaaap!

I know that helping like this is a part of my training, but...
It's still so boring!
Hmm... I wanna go out and have fun...

Hmm... No. Being still is just so boring!
...Ah, I feel better after yelling.
You can choose a card now! Why don't you go for it, Sensei?
All right, pick one! It's your turn. Draw!

Might as well pick all of them!
Maybe it'll be a rare card!
Ba-dump, ba-dump! What's it gonna be?

I hope it's a rare card!
It's sparkly and pretty. So exciting!

Whoa, this is an incredible rare card!
Sensei! Amazing! This must be fate!
Oh, that's a good card! This must be...the power of an adult...
Oh, I see that one often. But I think it's still a pretty rare card!

So, um... D-Don't be disappointed, Sensei!
I'm sure you'll get something good next time! Maybe.

Normal.Transcription: *sigh*... Blue Archive!
*sigh* How did it come to this? Well, I'll just have to deal with it.
Is there a quiet place to read?
Ugh. What a nuisance...
I don't really like big crowds...
Where...can we go hide?
I think we'll be safe here.
*sigh* Seriously...what do you expect me to do when you act like this?

Lobby.Transcription:
*sigh* What? Student duty?
Okay. I'll do my best to fulfill your request.
Oh... Welcome, Sensei...lots of annoying tasks are awaiting you.

*sigh*
Do you wanna slack off somewhere?
...You're working hard?
How annoying... *sigh* Fine, then.
...What? I finished everything I was supposed to do.
What brings you here? Can I help you with something?

You don't have to make that face. I know it's your birthday today, Sensei.
...All right, then. Let's celebrate your birthday.
Happy birthday, Sensei.

...Huh? My birthday? How did you know...?
No, I'm not saying I'm upset...
Please give me some space. I just need some time...

Happy New Year.
I see. A New Year's wish...
I hope there will be less annoying things in my life this year.

Everyone seems excited.
No, it's not that I dislike it.
I'd rather not go outside. So, I guess I'm staying here with you.

Okay, give me treats.
...Huh? You want me to say it, right?
Okay, okay! Trick or treat!

Event.Transcription: Seriously, there are so many problems.
*sigh*... I can't do this.
It's taking a while. Do you think it can be done in time?

It's getting there...but don't let your guard down until the end.
I hate annoying stuff.
It looks like the commotion ended. Great work, Sensei.
The exchange meeting somehow ended up a mess.
*sigh* ...Why can't they consider the person who has to clean up the mess afterwards?
Why am I in still stuck putting things in order in a different district?
I guess this is the pain of a middle manager.
These are the problems that need to be solved.
Please check the list, Sensei.
It's annoying, but I'm glad you're with me, Sensei.
It's so hard!
Phew... One problem resolved.
Did you take care of it? Great job.

Normal.Transcription: Blue! Archive!
Heehee... Thanks for waiting! Chidori Michiru, president of the Ninjutsu Research Club has arrived! Looking forward to working with you, Sensei
I need a new video idea for the channel...
Michiruchi, a Girl's Ninja Scroll... Going for a hundred subscribers!
Oh! I just thought of a new ninjutsu!
When is the new issue of Kama-Boke Gale Battle coming out?
Ugh, there are a bunch of students... I don't wanna go near them...
Whoa, this is for me?! I-It's a bit much... Well, okay, fine! You can count on me, Sensei! I'll show you the power of Michiru-style ninjutsu!!

Lobby.Transcription:
Sensei! You're late!
First, can I show you the ninjutsu I made today?

Oh...hi, Sensei. I prepared perfectly for the task, but...
Please help me with my homework first! Please!

Although the Ninjutsu Research Club hasn't been officially recognized...
...I won't give up! One day, ninjas will be official too!
What if, for some reason, everyone becomes a ninja like in the zombie movies?

The underclassmen are working hard to promote our ninja way.
Izuna and Tsukuyo... They're so great!

Ugh... I can't seem to increase my subscriber count for Michiruchi, a Girl's Ninja Scroll. What am I doing wrong?
...A deduction?
Huh? What? Seduction?!

Wh-Wh-What are you talking about, Sensei? Am I supposed to blow kisses at the camera or something?!
I can't do something so shameless!

There you are, Sensei! Happy birthday!
Heehee! Today, the Ninjutsu Research Club has prepared something incredible for you.
It's called the "All-Day Ambush Operation"!

All day today, Izuna, Tsukuyo, and I...
Will appear out of nowhere to surprise you! Heehee! Starting now!

Whoa?! You're wishing me h-happy birthday?!
Oh, I see...but I'm still happy to be congratulated. It feels pretty nice!
H-Heehee... Heeheehee...

Happy New Year, Sensei.
I'm positive that this year is gonna be the year of the ninja. That's what my ninja intuition is telling me!

It's the holiday season...which means Christmas is coming soon!
All those things labeled "limited edition," they're the devil...
My wallet is getting thinner and thinner. Please...no more...

Trick or treat! It's like a jutsu to get candy.
What if I say, "Trick or ninja!"?! You think they would subscribe?
Huh? Too much? I thought so...

Event.Transcription:
Oh, Sensei! This is the perfect time for the Ninjutsu Research Club to shine!
Okay, let's just take care of it at lightning speed!

Whoa, it turned into a big commotion somehow...
S-Sensei, are you okay? I believe in you!

Argh, look at the time! Oh, no... Can I make it?
Ugh, those Mouryo bastards are so persistent!

I'm not gonna give up until the end! The Ninjutsu Research Club will be officially recognized!
And Michiruchi, a Girl's Ninja Scroll will reach a hundred subscribers!

Ugh... I-I managed to finish it... Can I go back now?
Argh... I just wanna go back and watch a ninja movie...
Something I can watch mindlessly, like a B-rated movie...

The Mouryo are running amok, and the Yin-Yang Club is pressuring me.
The Gehenna Pandemonium Society is so annoying... And I'm so confused now...

...Huh? S-Sensei?! What did you just do?
I-I was surprised because you poked me all of a sudden!

To a ninja, there's no such thing as quitting.
We run until the finish line. No matter what happens, we complete the mission...
I'll prove the greatness of the Ninjutsu Research Club!

I'm going to successfully fulfill the Yin-Yang Club's request...
...and get official approval for the club. I swear!

Normal.Transcription: B-Blue...A-Archive...
Hello, I'm Ono Tsukuyo... I'm a member of the Ninjutsu Research Club... Nice to meet you...
(I'm a tree...just an ordinary tree...)
(I'm just a background...like...a piece of furniture...)
(I wish I could turn into a piece of furniture like that...)
Oh, I'm sorry... Am I in your way?
I feel like I stand out for some reason...
Are you sure you want to give this to me? Do I deserve this? Y-Yes? Really? Thank you, Sensei. I'll do my best to make you proud!

Lobby.Transcription:
H-Hello... Sensei, u-um... I...
Oh, never mind. It's nothing...
Oh, s-so... I'm on duty today. I'm sorry...
Did you...call me by any chance?
N-No. I'm not trying to run away...
Um, am I in your way? Can you see behind me...?
If you can't, I can crouch a little...
Even if I hide, I'm still so noticeable...

Sensei... It's your birthday, right? Happy birthday!
As your birthday gift...may I show you my disguise technique? Heehee...

A-Are you wishing me a happy birthday? Wow...
Heehee... Thank you...! This means so much to me!

Happy New Year, Sensei.
I'll be counting on you for my ninjutsu training again this year!

Christmas... Should I disguise myself as a Christmas tree?
No, I mean... I was wondering...if you would use me as a decoration for Schale...

Halloween... Should I wear a wraith costume?
Huh? Really...? Then who'll play the role of demon for the exorcism?
Oh, Halloween isn't like that? I see...

Event.Transcription:
Let's go, Ninjutsu Research Club!
I'm sure we'll figure it out, right...?

We'll solve this incident!
B-Because we decided to do so...?
I guess it's not gonna be that simple to resolve... I'll try my best!

I think it's about over...
I couldn't have done it without everyone, and Sensei...
Thanks for the hard work. Sensei, was I able to help you, at least a little?
I feel like I'm just a tall girl who can't do much...
Why is this happening...?
I'm sure the Ninjutsu Research Club can handle it...maybe...
D-Do you think I can do it?
I have ninja tools and many other things. Pick what you want...
If you need something, I'd like to help you...
The incident was resolved...but if you still have concerns, it's not too late...
Oh, um, so...I'm not for sale...
Am I interrupting you? I'm sorry. I'll get out of your way...
Yes, I think it's an excellent ninja tool!
I just want to be helpful, even if it's just a bit...
Thank you, Sensei.
So you picked those... Good choice, Sensei!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive
Misaki of the Arius Squad. In other words, the hound who lost its master. I'm under your command now.
How noisy.
So many unfamiliar things...
...What's fun about that?
I'm not interested.
...What are you doing?
I won't question it, but... I've never received a gift like this. You're strange, Sensei. But I'll trust you with my power, for now.

Lobby.Transcription: I've been waiting, Sensei. What are your orders today?
You look busy. Well, I guess adults are like that.
What's going on? I can help you...if you want.
I'll do what you ask. Just say the word.
If there's anything you want, tell me.

I'm not very good at making small talk.
If that's your order, I'll follow it.
Sensei, do you really think I would be an adept entertainer?

I never understood why people celebrate birthdays.
But, I think...I'm beginning to.
I'm...glad you're here.

I still don't know why we celebrate birthdays.
If we were never born, we wouldn't have to mourn death.

Oh. Mourning is like a disease.
...Sorry. I didn't exactly want to talk about this.
...Thanks.
Another year gone. I wonder what the new year will bring.

...Sorry. I'm not used to this kind of atmosphere.
I don't want to ruin the mood. I'll be quiet.
Sorry, but I'm not interested in playing.

...What? I have to choose between a trick or a treat?
...Is that an order?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Heehee... Finally, I made it. It's gonna be really hard, right? But I've learned that's just life... I'm Hiyori. Nice to meet you...
Heehee... Excuse me.
There's a lot of nice household furniture here...
This looks nice. That's nice too... Everything is nice...
Heehee... Sorry to inconvenience you. Excuse me.
I have a good feeling about this...I think...maybe not...
I know that you're trying to make me work as your servant. Heehee...I have no choice, so I'll accept.

Lobby.Transcription:
Wh-Whoa?! Welcome, Sensei...
I-I've been waiting...!
Heehee... Yes, I'm sorry to say that I'm on duty today.
Please tell me if I can help you...even I must be able to do something...

Is there anything else I can do...? We've just kinda been hanging out...
Anything harder I can do...?
Huh? Really? I can just stay right here?

I've read up on all kinds of things in magazines...
Heehee. Maybe I can be helpful...

Work is hard, but...
Life is supposed to be hard, so it's okay.

S-Sensei! Happy birthday!
You must have suffered many difficult things until now, right?
That's amazing. Incredible.
It's hard for me too...but I'll try my best.

Suffering is inevitable for human beings, right?
Heehee... so that means I've been living a full life for a long time now.
Huh? That sounds strange?! R-Really?

Another year is passing by.
I wonder how much suffering is waiting in the new year. Heehee...

I learned about Christmas in a magazine. I'm ready.
...Huh? Why are you running away?

Heehee... Losing candy or being tricked... Both are painful.
Painful choices are what symbolize life, don't you think?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
My name is Hakari Atsuko. Sensei, can I help with anything? Please.
*rustle* *rustle*
Hmm?
It is a little untidy...but not bad.
Hmm. So...this is what a normal conversation is like?
Flowers would look good...here.
I gave up thinking or making decisions for myself. I just thought that life was my fate. But from now on...it'll be different. Thank you, Sensei.

Lobby.Transcription: Great job, Sensei.
Welcome.
Please inform me if I can assist you.
Can I decorate this with flowers too?
Tell me anything you need or want.
So this is what being on the roster means. I've always wanted to try this.

Happ-yyy birth-dayyy toooo youuu!
That's how I learned it. What's that look on your face? Did I do it wrong?
Birthday? ...Yes, I've heard of those before.
And I know it's important to express gratitude as well. Thank you.

A new year... Hmm. The years go by quickly.
What a special time... What will the new year bring us?

Holy Night... Yes, I believe I know of the concept.
I wish there were flowers that fit the occasion. I'll find some next time.
Candy? For me? Thank you...but why?

Normal.Transcription: Heehee. Blue Archive!
Even under the scorching sun, or in ice-cold water...I'll follow you anywhere. So this summer, please don't leave me, my darling ♥
This place is cool. Heeheehee... ♥
This outfit... I can't wait to show you...
*sigh* ...Where are you now...?
It's kind of noisy here...
I feel a gaze... Could it be from Sensei? Heeheehee...
You prepared this for me...? I swear...if anything ever gets in our way, I will destroy it no matter what. Heehee, heeheehee... ♥

Lobby.Transcription:
Oh, Sensei. Welcome.
I've been waiting for you. A day feels like a thousand years! ♥

Welcome, Sensei. Preparations are complete.
Okay, just let me know.
Heehee, heeheehee...

You can tell me anything.
Yes, "anything." ♥

During summer, everyone lets their guard down and gets excited...
So, it's not an exaggeration to say that anything can happen!
Heehee...

Can I move just a little closer to you? ...Huh? Really?
O-Oh...?!

Oh, um, that's...
Oh, o-okay... E-Excuse me...

I've been wanting to take a walk with you, but...
It's too hot today, so it'd be best to wait until the sun goes down.

The days are longer in the summer, which doesn't help.
When will I be able to take a walk with you...?

You're asking if wearing a mask during summer feels stuffy?
Heehee, it's okay. This mask is made specially for summer. ♥

If you want...I'd be happy to show you what's underneath...
...Heehee, how is it?

Because you were born on this day, I was able to meet you.
When I think about that, I realize how special a day like this is...
I wish you a happy birthday!

Are you asking about my birthday?
Oh, I feel like I'm about to pass out... Not because of the heat, but because I'm so happy...
Sensei, thank you... ♥

Heehee. Happy New Year, Sensei.
We're spending time together and making memories again.

Merry Christmas... Darling ♥
On a day like this, wearing something special... Just you and I...
I'm so excited about today... Heeheehee.

Trick or treat, Sensei!
Huh? A Halloween mask...?
Th-That's... If you're asking if I have one, I guess I should say I do, but...

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
We're finally at the beach! Sensei! Let's enjoy it!
Everyone looks like they're having fun!
Huh? That's...
It's crowded!
Should I sit down and rest?
It's so nice and cool here...
Wow! Thank you! I appreciate you so much... I'll try my best to be more helpful to you!

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei! What should we do today?
Oh, Sensei! I've been waiting for you. ☆
Summer is hot...but it's also full of exciting things!
Don't you feel excited just hearing the word "beach" for some reason?

...Hmm? Sensei! What is it?
Is there something wrong with my swimsuit...?
By the way, Sensei. Do you know how to swim?
I wanna relax under a beach parasol! ☆

Happy birthday, Sensei!
Today is a special day. Should we play at the beach?

Today is my birthday! Let's play all we want!
Do you like beach balls? What about crushing watermelons? ☆

Happy New Year! ☆
I'm always grateful for you. Let's do lots of fun things this year too.

Merry Christmas, Sensei!
A day like this doesn't come often! Should we drink something together? Warm or cold, whatever you want!

Halloween...
Since it's been a while, how about we put our courage to the test?

Event.Transcription:
Welcome to our resort! 
Heehee! ☆
Summer! The beach! This is a vacation site for sure!
Yes! ☆ Sensei, did you call me?
It's a little hot. Are you feeling okay?
Heehee, I got excited for some reason.
It's nice to sweat it out like this sometimes. ☆
I'm slowly getting warmed up!
Let's push a little harder!

I'm so satisfied!
Did you enjoy it, too?

Ta-da! Welcome! ☆
...Or whatever. Heehee, did I look too excited?
Heehee. What's gonna come out?
If you keep doing that, I'm gonna pick one myself!
Hahahaha! It tickles!
Wow! I knew it, Sensei!
Wow, amazing! Should we pick again?
It could be...something incredible!
It's time to organize!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
I-I'm Okusora Ayane. H-How do I look? I feel kind of embarrassed.
Wearing this makes me feel a little shy...
I wonder where everyone is...?
Let's see where I can relax...
Hmm? What's that...?
I feel good for some reason.
This is so great... I always feel like I owe you. I'll try my best to repay you, even if it's little by little!

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei!
Oh, Sensei! I've been waiting for you.
Hmm...? Wh-What's wrong?

Hm? My appearance?
U-Um...I wanted to get into the summer mood...
How is it? D-Does it look okay...?

I'm always thinking about what has to be done next...
It's an interesting feeling to be relaxing like this.
Wearing something like this makes me feel lazy.

Happy birthday, Sensei!
I'm so glad that I got to see you and spend some relaxing time with you.
S-Sensei... Um... Today...

Oh, thank you. I was already having a blast. I didn't expect I'd get a birthday wish too...
What a luxurious day.

Happy New Year!
I hope you have loads of fun this year!
Merry Christmas! P-Please react well or I'm gonna be embarrassed...

I see. They're all wearing interesting clothes for Halloween...
N-No, that's not why I'm wearing this outfit...

Event.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. I'll prepare everything!
I've been waiting for you, Sensei! Let's work hard together!
Sensei...? What's going on...?
Wh-What's wrong? Is there a bug somewhere?
Hmm... Sensei, did you call me?
S-Sorry. But when you look at me like that, I get embarrassed...
Come on! Let's do our best!
I think we just need to push a little harder. Let's do this, Sensei!
Cleanup is also important. I'll help you!
I've put together a task list!
That's it for the task list.
It's enjoyable to achieve your goals one by one.
It's enjoyable just organizing lists with you for some reason.
Yes, thank you for your hard work!
I knew I could count on you!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
*yawn* Oh, Sensei! We should go slow on a day like this!
Everyone looks great. Being relaxed is the best.
Let's see where I can lie down...
Where's a good spot...?
...Over there?
What's this...?
You'd even do that for me...? Seriously, you're so weird. Well, I guess I don't mind. I should work a little harder!

Lobby.Transcription: Hey, you're here, Sensei. If you don't mind, let's take it slow today.

Sensei, welcome!
...Huh? Me? I was just resting here.
Are you really gonna make me work while I'm wearing something like this? Heh~

You're busy as usual, Sensei.
...Can I help you with this?

...Huh? Do I want to rest? I mean, yeah, but...
It's awkward to just watch you work.

Let me know anytime you're tired, Sensei.
Instead of a pillow, how about this tube?
What's gonna happen today?

Happy birthday, Sensei. What do you want for your birthday?
...You'll be happy with anything I do?

...Oh, right. It's my birthday.
Thanks, Sensei. I'm happy that you remembered.
Heeheehee.

Happy New Year, Sensei!
I hope a lot of good things happen to you this year.

It's loud outside. ...Well, it's Christmas.
Umm... I actually don't really mind it.
...Still, I shouldn't go out like this.

Lots of people are wearing interesting outfits.
...Huh? Why are you looking at me like that?
I'm not wearing this for anything like that!

Event.Transcription: Oh, Sensei. Great work!

It's so hot! I'm feeling parched in this heat...
It's hot, even when I'm not moving at all...

Sensei! Is it okay if you play hooky with this old grandma?
Really? Won't you get in trouble?
Hahaha... You're not gonna gain anything by doing that!

Are you tired too?
Should we take a nap over there?
I'm sleepy!

Should we get going...?
Heh... I'm feeling lazy...
We don't have a lot of time now. Shall we make our way over? Preferably at a leisurely pace.

Sensei, are you still busy?
Ugh... I guess there's no way around it. I'll help you out.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
The Beach Shack represents summer! The Festival Department never stops working, even overseas! Let's go!
What would be good as a main summer product...?
Operating a franchise is so hard. It's just meeting after meeting...
I have a feeling it could be used for the next festival...
I want to make Momoyodou home to the best tea house in Kivotos!
I have a great idea! Yeah!
You're always so considerate of me... Thank you, Sensei. As long as you're here, Momoyodou will keep evolving! Did that sound cool?

Lobby.Transcription:
Oh, Sensei. Welcome! It's hot today.
Here, have a drink!
...Yeah, it was flowing well.

*sigh* It's so hot...
You're here, Sensei! I've been waiting for you!
When I'm at the Beach Shack, can you please come see me there?

Momoyodou will always be with you!
That's a good phrase, right?

Huh? You think this swimsuit is cute? It looks good on me?
Again... You're paying lip service because I'm the owner of Momoyodou...
What? Really? You're being serious?
S-Seriously, don't act like you mean that at a time like this!

Is it hard to manage multiple shops?
Umm, well, yeah. I guess.
...If I said it was hard, would you help me?

When I'm with you, I feel like I'm at a summer festival.
...Heehee, if you're not sure, you don't need to know yet.

Happy birthday, Sensei! 
Just in time, a special limited birthday menu came out at the Momoyodou summer house. What do you think? 
So...it's exclusively for you, Sensei?

My birthday...? Ugh... You got me. I lowered my guard...
Huh? Oh, don't worry. It's not that I don't like it!
...Heehee, heehee.

Happy New Year! Time flies. I feel like summer was just yesterday...
Great! Anyway, let's keep moving forward this new year!

Momoyodou for summer! Momoyodou for Christmas! The festival must go on all year around!
So, let's go! Sensei!

Trick or treat!
...I-I'm just kidding! You don't have to get me anything!
W-Well, either way, I'll be grateful...

Event.Transcription: Hello, Sensei! Welcome to the Beach Shack version of Momoyodou!

Huh, Sensei?! Preparations aren't done yet...?!
P-Please come this way for now!
Did you find what you were looking for?
Momoyodou is going to keep evolving! Let's work hard!

It's not easy to manage multiple shops at the same time...
Well, but it's fun!

Oh? Sensei! I'm not for sale!
Not only that, but these are business hours...

It was confusing at first...but a crisis can be an opportunity!
We'll promote Momoyodou further with this opportuinty!

Heeheehee...It's been going as planned so far...
Oh, Sensei! Welcome! Everything has been going smoothly thanks to you!

This plan ended up in failure, but...
I won't give up anything to achieve my dreams!
I've been preparing various things that might be helpful at the beach!
If you have any products you don't use, I'll exchange them!
Yes, yes! Did you call me?
A good item for a good price! That's fundamental for a good business.
Thank you for coming!
Oh, good choice! I recommend that one too!
How was your shopping experience? Word of mouth is important, so please spread the word!
Yes! Here! Thank you, as always!

Unfortunately, the Beach Shack business has ended...
...But! It's okay. The joyful memories will live on!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
My lord, it's summer! We're on the beach! Can you play with me?! Nin nin!
What should we play next? Watermelon crush? Water guns? I'm excited about everything!
Izuna... On the lookout! ♪
I wonder what the president and Tsukuyo are doing right now.
The Izuna-Style Ninjutsu: Summer Version is complete! I should consider a winter version, too.
AC is so wonderful! I can't believe it can keep me cool in this heat! I-I mean, a ninja can withstand this kind of heat without a problem!
You prepared a summer ninja tool just for me! I'm so happy, my lord! I'm gonna do my best to live up to your expectations! Heeheehee!

Lobby.Transcription:
Heeheehee! Welcome, my lord!
This summer, I'll protect you as I always do, my lord! Nin nin!
My lord! I've been waiting for you! What should we do today?

You're working so hard, even on such a hot day, my lord...!
Though I'm unworthy, I'll support you!

Umm, is there anything I can do for you, my lord...?
Oh, how about I use Izuna-style ninjutsu to defeat this heat?!
Ninjutsu Breeze technique! *blowing*

Watermelon crush, sand castle building, and most importantly, shaved ice!
I have so many things I want to do with you this summer!
I saw in the ninjutsu codex that it's good to learn the CPR technique just in case there's an accident at sea!

So, my lord, can you help me learn CPR?
...Oh, are you not available right now?
Okay! Then I'll wait for you right here!
When we have a chance next time, I'd love to play at the beach with the president, Tsukuyo, and you, my lord!

Happy birthday! My lord!
Today is a special day! Let me take care of everything!
I'll make your day even more spectacular than the greatest summer memory!

...Huh? Yes, I got it!
Then, first I'll do my absolute best to sit next to you! Nin nin!

Right! Today is my birthday!
Heeheehee, thank you for remembering!

It warms my heart to hear you wish me happy birthday!
...I'm so lucky! Thank you so much!

Happy New Year!
I can't believe I get to welcome the new year with you. I'm so moved!
This summer, and the next one! Let's have lots of fun together!

It's Christmas, my lord! I can't believe I get to spend time with you today. 
It's gonna be such a special day for me!
Um... What do you think, my lord?
...Really? Heehee, I'm so happy.

It's Halloween, my lord! Does it look like I'm wearing a Halloween costume?
If it does... My lord! Trick or treat!

Event.Transcription: My lord, here! Over here! I've got a spot for us here!
Oh, I've been waiting, my lord! I'm ready for your command!

The Beach Shack is the base for this mission!
The word "base" makes me feel like a real ninja!

Hm hm hm. ♪ The Beach Shack is full of all kinds of food!
What do you like, my lord? Shaved ice? Takoyaki?
I like to eat anything as long as I'm with you, my lord!

She always faces dangers and problems head on...
Is it possible that Shizuko is...a ninja?

Let me know if you need anything!
I'll get it done in a flash, like a ninja!

This time, many people are working together with us, my lord!
It's boisterous and fun, my lord!

*gulp* We've already come so far for this mission...!
I'm gonna work hard to prove myself to everyone! Nin nin!

So much has happened this summer that my head is spinning!
...But every day was so fun! Heeheehee! Thank you, my lord!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive?
A moment ago...I found a crab walking on the beach. Sensei, do you wanna go see it together?
So cool!
Wow, this is...ice cream?
Let's make a house for the crab around here!
Handkerchief, check. Trowel, check... We can make a sand castle with these.
I wanna play in the sand with everyone at the Yin-Yang Club.
Is this for me? Wow, thank you! Next time I'll give you something. I hope you're excited!

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. What brings you here today?

Sensei, long time no see.
Huh? You don't think it's been that long? What's a long time then?
This summer, I want to write better haiku...

I wrote a new haiku. Wanna hear it?
Okay.
Ice in midsummer The cold feels so delicious Underneath the sun

Waiting for summer Exploring for something more The sparkling of...
Huh? What am I looking for?
...What do you think?

I hear that people shine when they work hard.
I wonder where that shine comes from?
...The forehead?

Is today your birthday, Sensei?
Then happy birthday! Sensei, because of today I was able to meet you and get to know you...
Yeah, it's like a miracle!

My birthday...? Thanks, Sensei.
Oh, by the way, President Niya asked me to bring you. They're gonna party to celebrate.
...Oh, my birthday party? Really?
Happy New Year! I'll be counting on you this year too, Sensei.

Sensei. Merry Christmas.
Was I a good kid? If I was, Krampus wouldn't exist!
Huh? It's a little different?

Trick or treat!
Which one do you want? "Trick"? Then, I'll take "or."
...So who's gonna take "treat"?

Event.Transcription:
Oh, I've been waiting for you, Sensei.
...Huh? Why was I waiting?

Welcome to the Beach Shack!
...Is that right?
Everyone else seems busy... Why don't we play?

Come to think of it, Kaho said that whenever I'm in danger,
I should just throw a grenade.

Oh, it's actually for heatstroke prevention...
Here's the matcha ramune.
Why don't you try it?

Sensei, did you call me? I was just about to call you, too.
What a coincidence!
Everyone seems happy! Being happy and healthy is great.
Everyone is working hard. I should try harder.
Huh? Is it already over? Then, Sensei, let's play in water together!
There's so much to do! You're in trouble, huh?
Oh, Sensei. I received something called...a goal list. Do you want it?
Wow, amazing...
Sensei, great job. You did well.
Is poking also part of the task? Then I'll poke you too, Sensei.
President Niya said I shouldn't slack off.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive
Saori of the Arius Squad. I owe you a lot. I'll do what I can to repay my debt. Looking forward to working with you.
Hmm...
I still haven't adjusted to places like this...
What's this...?
I don't quite understand though...
I think I get it...
How...can you trust me? After all that's happened... Aren't you worried I might betray you? I don't understand what you're thinking...but I'll do my best to not let you down.

Lobby.Transcription: I'm ready to assist wherever needed, Sensei.

I've been waiting, Sensei.
What's with that reaction?

Is this helping?
...Okay. That's all I needed.

What is the point of life when it has no inherent meaning?
I can't seem to figure it out.
So... I'll continue to struggle. Not in vain though.
Your orders, Sensei. That's my purpose.
Is it okay that I'm still alive...?

...I heard it's your birthday.
I'm sorry... What do you say in this situation?
If it weren't for you, I wouldn't be here.
So... I'm glad you were born.

I've never really had "happy" birthdays before...
So... I don't really know how to react to a birthday greeting...
I don't know if I've earned the right to a happy birthday yet.
I wonder if I'll ever feel like I deserve it...

A year has already passed. This world is as cold and painful as ever...
But regardless, the days continue on...

A holy night... Though it doesn't feel different from any other night.
After all, labeling one day as "holy" doesn't alleviate any of the suffering in this world.
Everything is in vain.

I'm not especially interested in festivals.
I don't understand the meaning behind them.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
SRT Academy, RABBIT Squad's Kazekura Moe. Heeheehee... I'll be your support.
Should we designate this as our new base?
It's...weirdly safe here.
Need...more candy...
Something important, like a launch button, might have fallen off...
Heehee...
RABBIT Type 224 pistol received... Um, it's kinda small though. I need a little more ka-boom!

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. You look busy as usual. Heeheehee.
Oh, it's you, Sensei! You seem busy these days.
I've got to replenish supplies for the RABBIT Squad....
Nom nom... Sugar is important. I can't give it up!
Ah... I wanna eat the inarizushi she makes...

Seriously... Why are candies not included in the basic supplies?
Sugar is like the fuel that keeps the operator going.

Aren't you a busy bee. Need help?
You can count on me! Mostly... Heeheehee.

Happy birthday, Sensei. On that note...
How about we have some extravagant fireworks to celebrate?

Birthday cake? No, no. Birthday fireworks is more like it.
Yeah! Something flashy! Something that goes ka-boom! Heeheehee.

I heard that Shanhaijing Academy has a custom where they set off fireworks to drive away demons...
I've never heard of a more beautiful custom. Heeheehee.

This Christmas I'm gonna eat turkey with RABBIT Squad members.
Huh? At the park where we always stay, of course.
Hm? The Fire Safety Act...? What's that?

This jack-o'-lantern... Wouldn't it burn more nicely if I put in some white phosphorous powder...
*pant* *pant*

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Trinity General School, After-School Sweets Club's Kyoyama Kazusa. Um, thanks for having me.
It's a cute place... Not bad.
Can we...sit here?
It looks kind of delicious...
It's relaxing. I like it.
You designed this, Sensei?
Oh... I didn't know why you were giving this to me... But I guess I'll be able to help you more from here on out.

Lobby.Transcription: There you are, Sensei. What's on the schedule?
I've been waiting. Okay, let me know if there's anything I can help with, Sensei.

Let me know anytime you have something going on.
Oh, but I'm not good at reading complex sentences...so I'll pass on that.
It's comfortable here... It makes me kinda sleepy.
Sensei. Let's eat something, okay? Should we go out and get something?
...Huh? What am I doing? I'm watching you work.
A story from my middle school days? ...I'd rather not.

Happy birthday, Sensei. I didn't get anything, but...
Um, how about we take a walk together?
Oh yeah, my birthday... Thanks, Sensei. I'm glad you remembered.

Happy New Year, Sensei. I'll be counting on you this year, too.
I don't feel like things will change much, even when the new year comes.
...But I don't think that's a bad thing.

So, it's Christmas...
Do you have plans later? Actually, I prepared something...
Ugh... Halloween... I hate how loud it gets.

Event.Transcription: Hey, Sensei. Let's get it done.
All right, let's hurry. There's a lot to do.
Is it going well? ...I should hope so.
This should be the last spurt. Are you still okay?
Cleanup is also important. Is there something you haven't finished yet?
Huh? What's going on?
You don't have to worry, I'm not going anywhere.
...I said it tickles.
Ugh! Stop it! Do your work!
Let's see. What's gonna come out?
Okay, let's spin!
Hm? Are you sure it's okay for me to spin instead?
Sensei. Look at this! Not me!
Oh... That's pretty awesome! Congratulations.
Yeah. It looks like a good one.
Something that looks special...
Take a look and see if there's anything else you want to exchange.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
I'm Kokona of the Disciplinary Support Department's Plum Blossom Garden! N-No! I'm a full-fledged instructor!
What...is this?
There sure are a lot of weird items.
I want to put this in the Plum Blossom Garden, too.
Where did Shun go...?
It'll be good for educating kids.
Sometimes strict, sometimes kind. Things a good teacher keeps in mind. You do your best, and when you do, I think to myself, "I can too!"

Lobby.Transcription:
Welcome, Sensei! N-No, I wasn't really waiting...
Well, I guess a little...
How can you make a lady wait? You've lost points!
Yes, I'm looking forward to working with you today.
I know how to teach a class. Do you wanna take my class?
P-Please don't call me Kokona without my title! I'm not just some little kid, you know?!

What's going on?
You called me just because? What the...
Ack! D-Don't poke me! Hmph! I'm not a little kid.

Happy birthday, Sensei! Aren't you proud? I remembered!
...Do you know my birthday, Sensei?

My birthday... You remembered.
Heeheehee. Thank you.

Happy New Year, Sensei!
I'll be working hard as an instructor this year, too. I could really use your support.
I'll be counting on you this year again!

Christmas... Will Santa Claus come again this year?
N-No! I'm an instructor. So it's not like I'm looking forward to it or anything...!

Halloween sweets?
I-I'm the one who'll be giving them out because I'm an instructor!
But it's not like I don't like sweets...

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Millennium's Cheer Captain, Shiraishi Utaha. With ice-cold reason or fiery hot passion, I'll never stop cheering for those I care for.
A space brimming with passion.
Cheers up high! Don't be shy! If we try, we'll reach the sky! ...I'll have to iterate on this cheer.
A game this big is the perfect opportunity for a cheer that's even bigger!
(Heehee, I'm giddy just thinking about this cheer.)
We need more...spirit oomph.
Being filled with passion  is a meister's fashion. Without inner motivation, we'd be stuck in stagnation! ...This is how I wake myself up now.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. If you need support in the form of a cheer burning with unmitigated passion... I'm always ready.
Sensei, the first step to cheering for others is cheering for yourself!

Whether you're healthy or sick, energy is the best medicine.
Especially if you need to kick-start your creativity.
Feeling down? I see that frown. Your mood'll rebound, just hear my cheer resound! ...I'll try again later.

As long as you're here, Sensei...
I feel like I can do anything.
Being a meister sometimes means cheering on for your machines. Don't get us wrong, we think on them long, but whatever we make might have a mistake! ...Maybe our new club motto?

I'm glad I get to see this side of you, Sensei.
What do you think? Do you like it?
Oh, Sensei, today's your birthday, right?
Today's importance certainly warrants a special cheer only you can hear!
My birthday? Time really flies.
Thank you, but today doesn't feel particularly special.

Thanks to you, Sensei,
every day feels like a celebration.
Thank you, Sensei.
Today's a new year. Let's start with a cheer. Some energy we'll ignite by chanting with might! ...Wait, should I have created some sort of cheer-amplifying device?
Santa is so dedicated. I wonder if he has someone who cheers him on.
...Perhaps the dreams and wishes of children are the cheers he hears.
The explosion of certain pumpkin lanterns...of all the pumpkin lanterns in the lounge... Let's just say it wasn't an intentional design choice.
I just thought that the pumpkin lanterns would sparkle extra bright at 60 frames a second. I was technically correct.

Event.Transcription: Let's do our best to make this Kivotos Halo Festival as great as possible!
The energy is palpable...

Millennium's honor is at stake.
Of course the Engineering Department will help.
Good to see that the Kivotos Halo Festival preparations are going well.

It's almost time for the Kivotos Halo Festival.
I'm already getting excited. Hopefully I don't start prematurely cheering.
Well done, Sensei. I'll be waiting by the cheering event stage.

My cheers still need fine-tuning...
But in both cheering and engineering, trial and error need adhering! ...I'll do my best.

A request received will be a design achieved!
That is the eternal motto (WIP) of the Engineering Department!

Come to think of it, I haven't seen the Seminar's resident perfectionist anywhere...
I hope she isn't sick or anything.
(In fact, I hope everyone will enjoy the festival to the fullest...)

I get that we're not an athletics club,
but I didn't think Kotori and Hibiki would be this out of shape...

There's only one way to get fit. The Engineering Department's next undertaking should be...
designing an exercise robot. That'll do it.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
I am Ushio Noa, Seminar's secretary. I look forward to your support, Sensei.
(This cafe feels like a fantasy...)
(It makes me want to let my worries fade away as I lose myself in the dream.)
I would love to bring this furniture to the Seminar lounge, heehee.
The way this space is structured and put together is very impressive.
Yuuka would love it here.
This conversion kit is so interesting. It makes me want tinker around... Whoops.

Lobby.Transcription:
Welcome, Sensei.
Have you checked today's schedule? Should I add a morning check to your daily routine?
Heehee, aren't you a bit late, Sensei?

Look at me that way all you want, it won't make you any less tardy.
You can, however, be less late in the future. I would appreciate it.
*staaare*
Oh, don't mind me. I'm just...observing.

Anything interesting on your mind?
Please let me know so I can record it immediately.

The poetry I wrote...?
I submitted it to The Millennium Prize.

Everyone read it...
but no one gave me their feedback.
Strange, isn't it?
Yuuka, you're so expressive! It's never boring when you're around.
But it means I can't help but tease you, heehee.
Curiosity is the driving force behind scientific development, but it can also be the driving force behind distress.
It's a bizarre sensation. Fear being dragged forward by desire...
Happy birthday, Sensei.
On a calendar, it looks like just another day...
But for you, at least, I hope it feels even a little more special.
I don't see much meaning into keeping track of the day of one's birth, but...

it's nice to be remembered by others.
Thank you for thinking of me.

Happy New Year.
I look forward to filling out this year's calendar for you, Sensei.

Christmas...
It's not a special holiday at Millennium School,
but it certainly feels special today.

If you have some time after work,
why don't we add dinner to tonight's schedule? Heehee.
A special day to remember the oft forgotten dead...
Records aren't just bureaucracy, they're safeguards against being overlooked, and people should never be overlooked.

Event.Transcription: Hmm. According to my notes, we're scheduled to prepare for the Kivotos Halo Festival now.
We'd better hurry. We don't want to be late to the opening ceremony!
(Hmm... Next on the agenda is...)

The atmosphere in the air tells me the Kivotos Halo Festival is near. Well, that and my calendar.
Let's do our best until the very end.

Thank you for your hard work, Sensei. Everyone has really given it their all...
I'm sure this year's Kivotos Halo Festival will be amazing.

All eyes will be on us during the festival,
so we need to do our best to showcase the true value of Millennium!

I'm not that athletic...
But at the end of the day, this is part of Seminar's duty.
(...I guess not everyone is that hyped for the festival...)
I am absolutely, 100% certain that, without fail, Yuuka is going to nag my ears off.
Heh heh... I'm already picturing Yuuka's flustered face.
Here, this is a list of tasks that must be completed in preparation for the Kivotos Halo Festival.
Just in time, Sensei, for me to ask you for help.
Oh? Why can't I do it?
Haha. Oh Sensei. I'm busy already of course. I could do it later but...
I learned a lot. Well, you are a teacher.
I admire reliability.

Normal.Transcription: B-Blue Archive...!
Sensei... Um, uh, wh-what do you think? This is my first time making a cheerleader outfit... It's not too bad, right?
Anyone here need, um...cheering?
This rowdy atmosphere... I think I like it.
Who knew cheering was so tiring... I hope my voice can take it.
Hmm... Maybe I should tinker with this just a bit. Or just a bit more than a bit. Or...
I-Is this fine? Or...maybe here? Wait, is that better? Or over there?
Thank you, Sensei. I'll keep showing you things you've never even imagined.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome back, Sensei. Do you want a cheer? Something modded? Or...
Sensei, let's stay motivated! If you need more energy... Well, I've been practicing my cheering for a reason.
Sensei... Are you worn out? Do you need some... Okay, hold on... Don't be tired! Feel a-admired! Please be...inspired?
I want you to rely on me, Sensei. Not just with engineering, but with other things too.
This isn't a sports field, so this outfit... It's a bit...

It's so strange.
I usually don't mind revealing outfits...
(...Maybe Sensei makes me self-conscious?)
Let's go, Sensei, let's go! I'm always grateful for you, Sensei, and I wanted to express that!
Today is a special day, and I'm motivated to make it even more special.
Sensei! Happy birthday!

Sensei, today's my birthday.
And for my birthday present... I want to be cheered on by you!
Happy New Year, Sensei! Um, let's see... New year's nearing, I'll keep cheering and engineering to help y-you shine so...so... I forgot my line!
Christmas already... Maybe I should make seasonal cheer outfits...
Oh, it's Halloween! No wonder it's so festive outside.
Huh..? Me? Th-This outfit wasn't made for that...

Event.Transcription:
Dressing like this is a bit...
I just need to keep in mind that this outfit is for the sake of the Kivotos Halo Festival...
Heehee, I'm looking forward to such a fun festival.
(I can't seem to get comfortable with cheerleading no matter how much I practice...)
Preparations for the Kivotos Halo Festival are almost set. Just one last push...

Thank you for all your help, Sensei.
Whatever happens, our cheers won't let you down.
S-Sensei! Sensei! You're o-our star! Time for g-gunplay... We'll go far!
I did make the outfit, but...maybe... Do people...not like it?
...The back?

Hmm... Not now.
But I'll explain more later...
The important thing is to ignite people's sense of romance and get their passion burning.
Welcome, Sensei. For now, we need to gather supplies needed for the Kivotos Halo Festival.
Anything we need for the Kivotos Halo Festival should be brought here.
Hm? What's the matter?
Cheering... I'll cheer for you later, I promise. Right now I'm still a bit...
Good job. Thank you for helping.
It's just a small token of my appreciation. I hope you like it.
This... Anyone would love this.
You helped out a lot. Thank you, Sensei.
Thank you, Sensei. If you have anything leftover, I can exchange it for you.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive
I'm Akane, Master's maid... Or, I suppose I'm Master's pet bunny now!
Everything is so organized. Truly, cleaning is what keeps life manageable.
Welcome. I assume your order is...black tea? Heehee.
Master, you need to know... You are a special person.
Is there anything else that needs taking care of?
Can I commit to the way of the bunny as I hop alongside Master...?
This will help me to become an even better bunny.

Lobby.Transcription:
I've been waiting for you, Master.
Akane is a loyal bunny to Master and Master alone.
Boing, boing!

Are you back, Master? Everything is set and ready.
I am nothing if not an industrious little rabbit.

Is it fun being...a rabbit? Heehee. I guess...
Does it look fun?
If there's anything you need, never hesitate to ask. Don't leave me waiting.
The time I've spent with you is irreplaceable.

There is no better cleaning equipment than a bomb.
Kidding, kidding... Please don't stare at me like that, Master.

I believe that a bunny is the perfect form for an operative.
And an even more perfect form for a maid.

Happy birthday, Master!
Starting today, you can expect special bunny bonuses!

What is a special bunny bonus?
Hahaha, I wonder...
Don't worry. Bunnies are too cute to be scary. Especially this one...

My birthday? You remembered?
Thank you, Master. I'm jumping with joy!

Happy New Year, Master!
It's already a new year! I wish only the best for you, Master.

It's Christmas, Master!
Every day is special with you, Master, but today feels particularly special.
Could you stay and comfort a cold bunny?
Oh, it's Halloween. I guess my outfit will blend right in.
Trick-or-treat? I'm more of a trick-and-treat person.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Haha... All preparations complete. There won't be a single error in my calculations today!
I'm feeling a little drained... I wonder if now's a good time for a break.
If you don't start taking care of your physical fitness...
This is an interesting cafe. Also, very unexpected.
I already knew this, but wow... Exercise is not easy...
As long as we don't go completely bankrupt, we'll be fine. I hope.
This is surprisingly...suitable and reasonable for exercise. Thank you, Sensei.

Lobby.Transcription:
Welcome, Sensei. I've been waiting for you.
Come now! There's a mountain of work that needs doing!
You're late!

I'll let you off the hook... But only this once!
You have to arrive on time from now on, got it?

I've heard that sometimes all it takes to change your mood is a different outfit.
I'm not actually sure of that, but...
...While I have it on... What do you think about this outfit?

As a treasurer, and as an athlete...
...all I can do is my best.

This outfit...is a refreshing look?
Wh-Where did that come from?!
Well, um... Thank you, Sensei...

You like my ponytail?
Y-You're always just...saying things like that!
...Doesn't mean I don't appreciate hearing it, though...

When you really think about it...
Physical education is just another STEM subject that can be scientifically analyzed.
Maybe not in the middle of a run... Or while lifting weights... But outside of that, exercise is nothing but science.

Sensei. Happy birthday.
If we take your date of birth and just do a little math, you're...
Haha. Don't worry, I'll stop there.

Sensei... Do you remember?
Today is my birthday.
I left my schedule empty for today.
What about you, Sensei? What does your schedule look like today?

Happy New Year, Sensei!
Here's to another great year together.
I was wondering... Do you want to start off the year with a run?

I don't really understand why some people get so excited for Christmas...
But thinking of a Christmas with you, Sensei...
It starts to make sense.

A day of costumes, tricks, treats... Wait, treats?
It's just a day of calories, then!
I-I'm not going to let down my guard just because I'm wearing workout clothes!

Event.Transcription: Welcome to the Kivotos Halo Festival! Tremendous work has gone into preparing for this day!
Though I'm part of the Executive Committee, I'm also planning on participating in a few matches.
You'll be rooting for me out there, right Sensei?
I only realized this after field day began...
But I'm so much busier than I thought I would be... In so many different ways...
We're in the second half now... Keep your guard up until the very end!
I guess that marks the end of the Kivotos Halo Festival... Thank you, Sensei, for your hard work.

Oh, if it's okay with you...
Would you like to go to the after-festival bonfire together?

Physical condition? Check. Equipment? Check.
My plans for the Kivotos Halo Festival...are airtight!
That group of students seems a little shady...
Hm? The star on my cheek?

Maki drew it on for me!
It's a festival, after all. So she offered to do a little face painting.
Hmm... Is it too much...?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
The path to a sound mind begins with a sound body... May that path be lined with blessings.
Wow... What a fantastic place.
Do you think there might be...someone in need?
Shall we take a quick rest?
My body feels lighter than usual... It's a good feeling.
Heehee.
Like a starting pistol going off at the beginning of an event, I pray this weapon will be used to bring about joy...

Lobby.Transcription:
You came, Sensei!
I hope your day will be a wonderful one.

Welcome, Sensei.
I've prepared some cool, refreshing water for you.
Would you like some?

Today, I won't be acting as a Sister...
Rather, I will be acting as an athlete.

Maybe it's because I'm not wearing my Sister's habit...
But I can't help but feel a bit awkward.

Sensei...
If it's okay with you, could I stay with you a while?

Blessings be upon you, Sensei...
You can always pray regardless of your outfit!

This outfit is a little more revealing than I'm used to...
I admit, I'm a little embarrassed...

Happy birthday, Sensei!
Could it be that...you're someone in need today?

B-Birthday...? You remembered...?
I-I'm... Th-Thank you...!

Happy New Year, Sensei!
Should working out more together be our shared resolution?

A truly holy night.
If you're comfortable with it, would you like to join me in prayer?

What a busy, boisterous day.
I can't help but be in good spirits.

Event.Transcription: Sensei! Over here! The games are about to begin!
I've been waiting for you, Sensei! Shall we get going?

You've all done so much to make the festival so amazing.
I'll be sure to match all your hard work!
Let's do our best until the very end!

Thank you for your hard work, Sensei!
You never know when someone might be in need of help...
Let's look around a little more.
Is there anything I can do to help?
...Sensei? ...What is it?
I-If you keep calling my name like that... I'm going to get embarrassed...
Hello, Sensei. Are you looking for anything?
If it's all right with you, would you like to take a look around?
M-Me...? I was just thinking I'd like to be helpful...
I-If you keep staring at me like that... I'm going to get all flustered...
I'll get it ready immediately.
Is there anything else you need?
Is that what you've settled on? Got it.
It's nice to be prepared.

The games have concluded, but we have plenty of supplies still!
If you don't mind, could you help me organize these?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.

Ah, Sensei. I didn't expect to see you here. Hanekawa Hasumi of Trinity General School's Justice Task Force, reporting for duty. As of now, I'm representing Trinity on the Executive Committee. I look forward to working with you.
...It's certainly well-organized.
...Is it weird to be wearing this outfit outside the stadium?
Huh? Is that...?
I don't usually feel this way, but I have the urge to go on a run all of a sudden.
(Ugh... A diet's worst enemy...)
Thank you, Sensei. I feel as if I've earned the championship banner. As long as you are with me, I can't lose. If it's okay... I'll continue to lean on you, Sensei

Lobby.Transcription: I've been waiting for you, Sensei. Today's game schedule is over here.
Welcome, Sensei. How has your day been?

Maybe it's just because this outfit is so much more comfortable to move around in compared to what I usually wear...
But I'm always in a good mood when I'm wearing this.
I shouldn't let myself get too excited... Which means letting myself get a little excited should be okay...
I'm a bit hungry... Hopefully it's just because I've been moving around so much today...
Exercise is good for more than just your body. You can't have a sound mind without a sound body.
If you want... Would like to try some of the honeyed lemons I made?

Happy birthday, Sensei.
I'm positively elated to be spending a day such as this with you, Sensei.
...Are you looking for something?

...My birthday?
I've been so bogged down by work that it completely slipped my mind.
Thank you for remembering, Sensei.

Happy New Year, Sensei.
My resolution this year is to continue focusing on my body and health.
A very merry Christmas to you, Sensei. If you were free, I was thinking we could go somewhere together tomorrow?

Does this outfit look...too Halloween?
If that's how you feel, Sensei, then I suppose...

Event.Transcription: I've been waiting for you, Sensei. Are you ready?
The games are about to begin. Let's get going, shall we?

Everything is in full swing.
I think it's safe to call this Kivotos Halo Festival a success... Don't you agree?

We're entering the final stretch of the Kivotos Halo Festival.
Let's make sure to finish strong.

The Kivotos Halo Festival was a massive success thanks to you, Sensei.
Thank you for all your hard work.
S-Sensei?
If you keep staring at me like that...
It's about time we started heading out...
Is there something you need?
You want to take a look at the match records?
I have a summary right here. Would you like to take a look?
For now, this is all I have to show you...
Is there anything else you'd like to see?
Got it. What an excellent record.
This... This might be a new record.

Normal.Transcription: Blue...Archive! Haha!

Allow me to introduce myself. I am the president of Veritas and of the Super Phenomenon Task Force, the delicately chic and beautiful super genius hacker of Millennium, the one and only Akeboshi Himari! Try to contain your excitement, Sensei.
(Isn't this room a bit... chilly?)
There are so many people here... It's so draining...
Hey, look at this. Seems like it might be fun.
Haha! With this much space, we could have a picnic with everyone in Veritas! Even Eimi could join!
Not bad. But it could use a few more...amenities. Shall we do a little tinkering here?

Wow, I didn't expect to receive such a valuable gift. Is there anything you want? As the super genius hacker of ethereal beauty, I can make anything you want come true... What? You can always rely on me...? O-Oh, is that so... Thank you...Sensei...

Lobby.Transcription:
You're here, Sensei! I've been waiting for you!
Shall we dive into it?

Weighed down by work, Sensei? Have no fear! As Millennium's leading beautiful super genius delicate hacker, I am at your service!
What? No welcoming applause? Not even a golf clap?

I am the alabaster-white, ever-blooming fragile flower of Millennium and holder of the prestigious yet mysterious Omniscience degree. To think that a multifaceted super genius hacker such as myself would be helping with your work...
You should consider yourself lucky, Sensei. Incredibly so.

My self-introduction is a little different each time?
Haha! You've noticed! Yes, every introduction has something a little special.
And every introduction is equally true.

After all, it would be impossible to list all my virtues in a single go.
So I have to change it up to include everything important about me.
Despite how self-evident it all is, conveying the entirety of my excellence... It is a truly daunting task.

I often hear slanderous remarks aimed at Veritas, accusing us of being nothing more than oddballs and geeks. It's such a shame.
How could they possibly think that in the face of my once-in-a-lifetime beauty?

When I assist you like this, I always learn something new.
I had no idea you had such a wide range of responsibilities and tasks, Sensei.

...Zzz...Zzz...
Bwa?! N-No! I wasn't sleeping! I was...meditating?
...Yeah. In fact, I was actually immersing myself in liminal space between REM sleep and non-REM sleep. That's what it was, yep.

Oh! Happy birthday, Sensei!
I can't believe that you get to make your special day even more special by spending it with me.
Aw, you don't have to hold back. I know that you're secretly thrilled, haha.

You knew it was my birthday? Thank you.
...Of course, I'm happy to be congratulated by my fellow club members.
But to be congratulated by you, Sensei... It's a special type of feeling...
...Haha. It's fascinating.

Oh, wow... It's already a new year. Happy New Year!
The moment where the past year meets the coming one... Sharing that moment together...
Heehee. Not bad, right? Here's to another great year together, Sensei.

So... Christmas...
Definitely a day for celebration.
Haha... In that case, how would you feel about catching a movie together, Sensei?

Halloween? Underclassmen are always particularly fond of it.
If I remember correctly, they say it's the perfect day for tricks.
I've decided. Sensei, let's get everyone together and have ourselves a great big junk food party!

Event.Transcription: It's time for the Super Phenomenon Task Force to begin its mission.
Heehee. I've been waiting, Sensei.
We're currently analyzing the data, so please wait just a little while longer.

Hmm... This is interesting.
How did this...?
Decagrammaton is certainly a tricky opponent.

This could be dangerous.
Heehee. But that just makes it all the more interesting.
I've secured new data.
Now, let's take a look at what it contains.
It appears that the next objective has been determined.
Time to proceed to the next stage.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Oh, Sensei. Let's have a drink before work Heehee... Don't worry, it's not alcohol.
Look how cute all this is.
That's...?
This is the perfect temperature for fermentation.
It's warm here... I want to stay here a little longer.
Mix a little bit of this with a little bit of that...
This grenade launcher is nice for lighting fires, but it's kinda awkward for hunting... I guess I could chase a bear away with it though.

Lobby.Transcription:
Welcome, Sensei. I have a minute for you, yeah.
Do you want to talk?

Welcome, Sensei. You look awfully tired.
A sip of this will help, trust me.
The sun is out at Schale. I love how it feels.
If I space out like this, I might fall asleep...
Hm? You need help?
Maybe I'll invite you next time!
Hmmm hmmm hmmm. ♪
Why did I put alcohol in the kompot?
Huh. I don't know.
It was such a long time ago. I don't remember. Heehee.

Happy birthday, Sensei.
How about some kompot to celebrate?

Oh? It's my birthday today?
I don't really have any huge requests, so don't worry about it. Heehee.

Happy New Year, Sensei.
How about some gamju to celebrate the new year?
...Huh? Absolutely not?!
Merry Christmas, Sensei. Is there anything you want?

Me?
Nope. Not an option.

I'm craving pumpkin juice...
Not fermented, of course.

Event.Transcription: Awesome, it's Sensei. Can you help us out at the hot springs resort a little?
Do you have a moment? Before we go in the water, let's warm up a little.
Nodoka is working so hard!
Heehee. The mors came out perfectly this time.
Oh? Are you saying you want to take a bath with me?
It was a joke. You didn't have to react like that.
Good job. Do you want a sip of mors?
I see...why you're so popular with everyone, Sensei.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Merry Christmas! I'm Serina of the Remedial Knights! I hope you have a very special Christmas!
Be sure not to catch a cold!
Is a first aid kit an appropriate gift...?
What kinds of gifts do good children like?
Don't push yourself too hard. Health always comes first.
I wish you the best of health!
Oh, thank you. But, Sensei, haven't you heard that Santa doesn't give presents to children who cry? So, no crying!

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei! I'm Santa today! Heehee.
You're back, Sensei! Merry Christmas!

Have you thought about what to get the children this year?
We can figure it out together. Heehee.
Santa is an important tradition, for the children's sake.

If... If I was the real Santa...
Perhaps I could be more helpful to you.

You called? It's me, Serina!
I'm Santa today.

Let me know anytime.
I'm always ready...

Happy birthday, Sensei!
I hope you're excited to open your gift.

M-My birthday...?
Oh, gosh. I've been so busy lately it slipped my mind. Thank you!

It feels as though Christmas just passed...but it's already New Year's Eve.
Happy New Year.
Other people's smiles bring me joy.
It's Christmas! How do I look?

People thought I was dressed for Halloween when I was walking around.
It's not a Halloween costume though...

Event.Transcription: Sensei! It's Christmas!

My heart is racing. I'm so excited.
I hope to deliver everyone the gift of happiness.

Do you have any plans for Christmas?
If you...don't mind...maybe the two of us...
O-Oh, never mind. It's nothing!
Yes! It's Santa Serina!
Is there anything I can do to help?
This Christmas, please call Santa Serina!
Sensei? What's happening?
This way for the Christmas donation charity!
Please consider donating to those in need!
Sensei, please let me assist you.
I hope Hanae is okay...
Thank you. This is for you.
Merry Christmas! Have a wonderful day!
This is so precious... Are you sure you want to donate this?

The Christmas donation charity is over.
Please make sure you didn't forget anything!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Merry Christmas! Surprise! You get me instead of Santa!
Hi! It's Hanae, Santa outfit edition!
Does anyone need surgery...or a gift?
This Christmas, the Remedial Knights are ready to serve you!
Where...is the chimney?
There's a Christmas charity event where yours truly is gonna sing along with everyone!
All right, I'm ready!

Lobby.Transcription:
Sensei, Sensei! Do you want anything?
I'm Santa, so I wanna give you a gift!

Sensei, you seem busy these days! You even went home late today too.
I know! I can operate on you to help with your fatigue.
I'm feeling really good today, Sensei! How about you?

You can come see me whenever you're not feeling good!
I'll gift you some surgeries and injections!

You gotta be careful for frostbite in the winter...
Otherwise, your affected limbs might have to be amputated!

My heart's beating so fast in anticipation for Christmas!
I hope you're just as excited as I am, Sensei.
Sensei, Sensei! For a Christmas gift, what do you think about a huge bunny doll?

Wow, happy birthday!
Yes, I put a gift inside of a gift! Isn't it cool?!
Hmm... It reminds you of matryoshka dolls?

It's my birthday! For my present...
I want Sensei! Heeheehee.

Sensei, the new year is already here! Happy New Year!
...Am I still allowed to wear my Santa outfit after Christmas is over?

Sensei! It's Christmas!
I wonder if Santa will come again this year.

It's Halloween! One of my favorite festivals!
But...festivals mean lots of people who need medical help!

Event.Transcription:
Sensei! It's finally here! It's Christmas!
Christmas mode, activated!

Sensei, is there anything you want?
I'll write a letter to Santa Claus!
Sensei? Is something wrong?

Why... Why're you looking at me like that?
Do I look weird?
What's wrong? Did you forget something...? No, that's not it?

Ack...! Why do you keep poking me...?
If you don't stop, I'm gonna poke you too, Sensei!
Let's keep it up, Sensei!

We're almost there! It's rewarding, but...
It's a little sad too, you know?

It's time to wrap it up.
I'll help you clean up!
The Remedial Knights are hosting a charity event right now!
Welcome, Sensei! Do you wanna draw some lots?
Huh? What's wrong?
Today, Santa Hanae is delivering happiness!
Wow, you won!
Heehee. I hope you like my gift.
Woah...! I didn't expect to find this in here!

The charity event is over!
If you still have a lottery ticket, I'll exchange it for you!
I'll show you today's work!
Let's tackle it step-by-step!
This list... Is this right? Wh-Which one...?

There's so much...
I wish I could perform surgery on this.
Amazing! I knew I could count on you!
Great work, Sensei! I'm so happy!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Heh heh, Happy New Year. I'm prepared with a floral furisode and an open mind. Let's find some intriguing new food to try!
True epicurianism involves all aspects of life.
Location and dress are essential elements of fine dining.
Special dishes are common this time of the year. Heh heh, I'm quite excited.
I've worn furisodes quite frequently, actually.
I hope we find food that's truly worthy of savoring.

Special foods that you only eat once a year make a holiday seem magical. With this experience, I'm getting closer to true epicurianism, and...closer to you, too, Sensei. I truly always appreciate you.

Lobby.Transcription: Heh heh heh, welcome, Sensei. Have you enjoyed any epicurean experiences today?
How are you, Sensei? Why don't we look for a fine dining experience for the New Year?
Sensei, do you like furisodes? ...Huh? What about me? You think I look good in one? Heh... O-Of course I do!
Hm... Suddenly, I'm craving something warm and soft to eat. Could it be because I'm talking to you?

Osechi are typically all boiled foods.
However, it seems these days that's not always the case.
My opinion? I think either way is delicious.

What's more appetizing than seasonal food? For the New Year, we could have osechi, ozoni, oshiruko...
Oh... Now I'm hungry!

The value of gourmet food is universal.
...You agree, right Sensei?

Sensei! It's your birthday today. What would you like to eat?
I'll make us reservations at a restaurant that I'm sure you'll enjoy.

Oh! You're celebrating my birthday...? I'm so happy.
Heh heh heh, please go out to eat with me today.
As long as I'm with you...every meal will be gourmet.

Happy New Year, Sensei!
It's New Year's Day! I've changed into my furisode to celebrate.
It's very important to wear the proper outfit to enjoy a celebratory meal.

Sensei, how's your Christmas going? Everything I eat today tastes especially sweet and warm.
I think...that's all thanks to you, Sensei. Heh heh...

Happy Halloween! I brought a delicious pumpkin pie with me today.
Would you like a bite, Sensei?

Event.Transcription:
Sensei, welcome. Oh... You're working on New Year's Day? It's important to take a break sometimes.
Okay, let's enjoy a cup of tea together.

Heeheehee. It's nice to see you on New Year's Day.
I'm always ready.
Heeheehee. Sensei, did you call me?

Please stop tickling me!
I didn't know you liked to goof around like that.

Furisodes are inconvenient for sure.
But this is all in the efforts of gastronomy.

To find the ultimate taste experience, my resolution must be unshakable.
...No one can stop us. Heeheehee.

It's a bit of a complicated situation, but...
...My passion for gastronomy won't be affected by something like this.

I hope we all do our best.
I taste food using every ounce of my passion and sincerity.

Time flows on...and events are forgotten.
But as long as you and I remember our moments together... I'll be okay.
Yes, I'm sure.

Sensei, are you here to pick an omikuji too? This way.
Heeheehee. You don't have to be so tense.

Heeheehee... I've never done this before.
It's kind of fun.

Did you find what you were looking for?
Heeheehee... Maybe it's closer than you think.

It's important to take it easy sometimes.
Like when you start with the dessert during a full course meal.

Oh, you picked the Great Blessing! Incredible, Sensei!
Since you picked the Great Blessing, you'll receive a special prize.

You got a Blessing. That means luck is coming your way.
I hope you have a great New Year.
...You got a Modest Blessing. The prize for Modest Blessings is here.

Small Blessing... That's not bad.
To bring great luck, they say you need to work on the small things first.

A Future Blessing means you're likely to be lucky down the road...
So it's a good sign. Okay, this way.

It's okay. The result of the omikuji shows your current luck.
They say it can turn into good fortune later...
Huh? You feel happy and sad at the same time, because I comforted you? I-I don't understand...
Sensei, they're still serving omikuji. Please don't forget to pick one out.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
I hope everything goes smoothly for us this year. Did you try any New Year's Eve noodles?
Precise measurements are important when cooking.
This kimono...is pretty.
What was my first wish for the New Year?
I hope for the peaceful days to continue...
Maybe I can take a little break here...
It's so strange. When I'm with you, I feel like I can do anything. I'll try my best again this year. Please watch over me.

Lobby.Transcription:
Oh, Sensei! Welcome.
Are you hungry? Can I make you something?

Please come in! I'll warm up some food.
I made it with love.

Wh-What do you think of my kimono?
I hope you like it...

I was nervous about wearing a kimono in front of you, but...
Now I'm glad I did.

Did you know your hard work is very inspiring to the students?
To me as well, of course. Heeheehee.

Osechi is a lot of work to make.
But that's what makes it worth it in the end.

I feel so relaxed with I'm with you.
I should get going, but...
Huh? You want to stay with me a little longer?

Today's your birthday, Sensei! Happy birthday!
I'm glad I got to celebrate with you!
What dish would you like today?

Wow... My birthday... You remembered.
Thank you...!
Just hearing that from you makes me so excited!

Happy New Year, Sensei.
It's New Year's Day, so I put on my kimono.
I made osechi. Will you join me?

It's Christmas... The year is almost over already.
I was thinking of hosting a small party... What do you think?

The Halloween season is so fun and energetic.
I wish we could eat the jack-o-lantern later...

Event.Transcription:
Hello, Sensei! What's your New Year's wish?
I wish you good luck!
Aren't you cold? Would you like some warm food?
Yes, Sensei? What's going on?

This scooter helps in many ways.
If I lose this too, whatever will I do...?

Besides osechi, I wanna try making other New Year's foods as well.
Oh, but... If I eat all of that, I'll definitely gain weight.

I don't know if I'd call it a New Year's wish, but...
I hope the cafeteria does well this year...

Yes... This is the time to show off my cooking skills!
I'm gonna try my best. Come watch me!

It's become such a big deal, somehow, but I'm not gonna change my approach.
All I can do is try my best.
Also...it feels so good to have you by my side!

I'm glad it ended well.
Um... Sensei? Did you enjoy my food?
Sensei, welcome. The market owners prepared all manner of products.
It's my first time at the shop. Heeheehee.

You worry too much.
I'm pretty good at managing inventory.

Huh? A special School Lunch Club dish?
If you want...I can make something for you.
Okay, please give me a minute.
That's what I recommend the most!
Oh... Yes. You mean this?
Did you enjoy it? Please come again!

Both the festival and the cooking contest are over.
I have to prepare for tomorrow...but you should take your time and look around.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Happy New Year, Sensei! Let's go find something delicious!
It's...a nice place... Or maybe fun would be a better description.
I smell something mouth-watering...
I should be careful not to get it dirty.
I always get interrupted just when I'm about to eat something good...
It's okay, I'm sure it'll grow! It still has potential!
I've become stronger... I'm only gonna say this once, so listen! Um... Thank you for everything, Sensei. I appreciate it.

Lobby.Transcription:
Welcome, Sensei! Let's finish work quickly and go eat something yummy!
I'll help you!

Seriously, Sensei, where have you been? Oh, why I was waiting? Because you...
Wh-What am I supposed to say?!

Did you fall in love with me because of my kimono?
O-Of course. Do you think I'm a glutton?
My favorite osechi dish? Hmm... It's hard to pick just one, because they're all so good!

Hey~ How long are you going to be working?
Hurry! Hurry! Let's go somewhere!
*sigh* I wish I knew how to cook. Then we could make something at home.

What's wrong? Are you feeling lonely?
I-I'm not saying I am!
Heeheehee. Today's your birthday, Sensei. Let's go out and celebrate!

You didn't forget my birthday, did you? Let's get ready and go out!
Heehee... What are you gonna buy me today?

Happy New Year, Sensei! What? Th-This outfit...?
B-Because it's New Year's Day. Wh-What do you think?
You think I look good in it? It's cute...?
S-Stop! Th-That's enough!

There's a lot of delicious Christmas food! This time...
I hope I don't get interrupted.

Halloween is kind of weak compared to other festivals... Maybe because it's so focused on pumpkins?
Well I don't mind, because they're still delicious!

Event.Transcription: Oh, you're here, Sensei! It's loud outside. Should we go check it out?

There are lots of delicious foods on New Year's Day...
I can't help but spend a lot of money.
Oh, what's up, Sensei? Oh... Did you wanna talk to me or something?

Seriously, don't poke me like that! You're messing up my kimono.
Cleaning... That's not the problem!
I like hakamas better... They're more comfortable to move in.

Braid my hair up, too...?
There's no way I can pull that off! No way...

I have a feeling it'll get annoying...
My intuition is pretty accurate...just always in the exact opposite direction...

I had a feeling it would turn out this way...
But since you're with me, Sensei, I'm sure it'll work out somehow.

Oh, I'm so tired. I'm glad it all ended well.
The osechi was good. It's been a while since I've eaten so much!

Is everything here for you? That's a lot of work...
Well, let me know if you need help.
I guess there's no time to relax. Good luck, Sensei.

Huh? Did you call? Are you gonna buy me something?
Heehee. Just kidding.
It's not that I don't like loud environments. If I didn't, then I wouldn't be able to get along with the Gourmet Research Society.

See? You can do it, too.
Heehee. I've always wanted to say that.

Honestly, I don't think I can do something like that.
Not bad.

Are we done for today?
Then let's go get something delicious!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
I'm Aomori Mine, Remedial Knights captain. Does anyone need medical assistance?
I'm keeping an eye out for people who are ill or injured.
This place is so calming.
It's a lovely spot for a tea party. Shall we?
Taking breaks is important for your health. The Remedial Knights aren't exempt from that.
Drinking black tea after a meal is a boon for health and beauty.
Thank you so much for your kindness. I'll do everything I can to be helpful to you.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei. Let's work together towards peace in Kivotos, as always.

Sensei, what's wrong? Did something happen?
Please don't worry about me. I'm used to waiting!
Does anything hurt? Please call on me any time you need help.
You certainly seem busy. I can help with anything you need.

If you're tired, just say so.
I'll take care of anything you need, like black tea or snacks. If you want, you can even use my lap for taking a nap...

The ideal situation is one in which the Remedial Knights aren't needed at all.
I hope we'll continue to see such peaceful days.

The Remedial Knights' building is decent, but this place...
Hm, maybe it's time to relocate...
Oh? No, no, just talking to myself. Don't worry about it!

Happy birthday, Sensei.
I've put together a first aid kit that can take care of a plethora of injuries. So? What do you think?
It's the thought that counts? I...see...

You remembered! Thank you...
I'm so happy.
If it's okay... Can I ask you to spoil me today? Heehee.

Happy New Year.
Okay, Sensei. Shall we?
I'll still help everyone who needs medical attention this year.

I've heard it said that Christmas is a day for giving gifts to show your appreciation.
Um... Sensei. In that case, what kind of a gift would you like?

Every Halloween, people always come up to me to tell me how nice my "knight costume" is.
But...this is just what I always wear! I don't appreciate hearing it year after year.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive! ☆
Don't worry, I, Misono Mika, have finally arrived! Oh, we're already well acquainted, so let's skip the formalities, okay? I'm looking forward to working with you, Sensei.
Hmm, it's a bit tight...but I think it'll be okay anyway!
Hahaha! What's this? So silly!
You know, I used to have something like this before...
Well, I don't think I'll be bored around here.
Hm, I guess Sensei isn't around...
I'd never say no to such kindness from you, but this might cross a line. Not that it matters to me, but...Sensei, are you gonna be okay? ☆

Lobby.Transcription: Oh, Sensei! You're back! You kept me waiting, you know!
Welcome! Don't worry, I was perfectly well-behaved while you were gone.

It's a beautiful day, isn't it?
It seems like a shame to spend it cooped up inside.
...If it's all right with you, let's go for a walk after work?

Is this how student duty is supposed to be?
I mean, I didn't really know what to expect, but...
Well... I'm not really bored or anything!
If you need help, I'm at your service! You can count on me to do my very best.
Oh... I see. That's how you look when you're working.

Happy birthday, Sensei!
