Should I sing Happy Birthday to you?
Huh? Are you embarrassed?

Oh... How did you know it was my birthday?
Yeah, um... Thanks...
Hahaha, it looks like you got me.

Happy New Year, Sensei!
I might not deserve it, but I'm still looking forward to the New Year with you. ☆

Tonight is a holy night, Sensei.
Do you have any plans today?
Then, if you don't mind... Let's spend it together.

Happy Halloween! ☆ Did you hear? Some of the stores have limited-edition accessories that are only available today!
We could go shopping, or something like that?

Normal.Transcription: Bluuue! Archiiive! ♪
Yay! What do you want me to work on? Where should I dig? I can excavate whatever you want!
Wow! So this is your...?
Hm...is this really the hot springs?
Well, since this place is yours, I'll make it an exception.
Huh? Is that...? *gasp*
There sure are a lot of people! It's bustling. I like it!
What? You're giving me this? Why? Um, I don't understand... But I guess I'll just keep working hard! Hahaha!

Lobby.Transcription: Hi Sensei! Welcome! What should we do today? Do you want to build a hot spring?
I've been waiting for this moment! Say the word and I'll get started!

Hmm... What should I do here?
Do you need to be warmed up? Or...

What do I do in my free time? Uh... I dunno...
Oh! You were looking for work!

I hate when things get complicated. You can't just ignore the problem, either...
That's why I like to get rid of things and start all over!

Are you hungry? Do you want me to make you some ramen?
Huh? Tools?
I'll use this! ♪

Adjusting the output? Hm... I dunno...
It'll work. Probably...I think! I've never tried!
Happy birthday, Sensei! It's so hot out today!

Oh yeah! Today's my birthday! Hm... What do I want as a present...?
How about an excavator?

Happy New Year!
My wish for the year...is more hot springs to build and more land to dig!

Isn't today the day nice kids get gifts?
Oh! That's so exciting! I wonder what I'll get.

There's a bunch of people outside...and they look like weirdos.
Maybe it'll make it easy to escape from the Prefect Team today!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
I'm Ogata Kanna of the Valkyrie Police School Public Peace Bureau. Leave criminal interrogations to me.
The coffee here...smells pretty nice.
I'm tired...
The new Cottontail Detective series is at a place like this...?
Ugh, I got a message from the Defense Office.
I'm hoping for a peaceful day in Kivotos!
Come to think of it, there was a time I couldn't handle this gun very well. Now that I'm used to it, it's a shame there's not much of a chance to use it these days...

Lobby.Transcription:
I've been waiting, Sensei.
Let me know if you ever need the power of the Public Peace Bureau.

...Was there an incident?
Please wait a moment. I'll request a warrant.

A lot of documentation is needed for a Public Peace Bureau dispatch.
I sometimes envy Schale's ability to execute quick responses.
I don't have the ability or authority to take care of this, but...
I'm going to make some coffee. Would you like a cup?

The students at the Public Safety Bureau make for good police, but...
They're too inexperienced to deal with the heavier crimes...
I don't like donuts very much. They make my hands too messy.

About the Feral Hound nickname...
Umm... I'd prefer it if you didn't call me that in front of others... It's embarrassing.
Today's your birthday. Happy birthday.

As a public official of Valkyrie Police School,
I'm not in a position to give you gifts. However...
If it's okay with you, I'd like to take you to lunch at my favorite restaurant.
Oh... Today's my birthday.

The staff's been talking about it since this morning.
I thought they were discussing the criminal we arrested yesterday.

I hope you have a happy New Year.
I hope we get to meet for occasions other than investigations this year.
...Are you working overtime again?
Unfortunately, I'm on duty today.

...It's Christmas, so...
How about a sweet latte, instead of just black coffee?
I'll bring it right away.

Halloween...
It's a troublesome time that can hamper our investigations.

If a criminal hides in a group of people wearing costumes,
it becomes difficult to locate them. Masks ruin facial sketches.
It is troublesome.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
I'm Utazumi Sakurako of the Sisterhood of Trinity General School. May you have a blessed day today.
So, Sensei, this is the place you worked to create?
It seems to have welcomed many different sorts of people.
It's quite different from the cathedral.
Although...I certainly wouldn't mind visiting once in a while.
It may be different, yet I feel at peace here.
You're so generous. Thank you. I hope I can repay your kindness one day.

Lobby.Transcription: I've been waiting for you, Sensei. May you be blessed, today and all days.
Oh, Sensei... I was praying for you just now.

I'm supposed to assist you at Schale...
It's different from my usual work, so I'm a bit nervous.

Work at the cathedral?
It's okay. I've been organizing my schedule.
Yes, Sensei. If there's anything I might be able to do...
Anything regarding the cathedral, or any other work...please let me know.
You seem tired. Is there anything I can do for you?

Today is a special day. I am full of gratitude.
That's how I feel too.

Thank you, Sensei.
It's nice that someone's celebrating my birthday.

A year has already passed. It's time to welcome the New Year.
I wish great happiness for you in the New Year, Sensei.

Yes. Today is special, without question.
I hope you can feel it, too.

The day before a festival... Those are the busiest days.
No, I'm not saying I don't like it. The more the merrier.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive
Millennium Science School, C&C call sign Zero-Four. Asuma Toki. I promise perfect assistance.
What's this space for?
A cafe... I've heard of it.
Beverages containing sugar can be very effective for recovering from fatigue.
I can make tea. I'm used to it.
I'll make note of the interior here.
Thanks for caring... I've decided to provide complete personal protection for you from now on. Please leave everything to me.

Lobby.Transcription:
You're here, Sensei.
I've been waiting, Sensei. I'll be assisting you today.

Thank you for coming, Sensei.
What can I do for you?

Report for duty? At your command.
...Please gimme a reward when I'm done.

You rarely give orders, Sensei.
Does that mean I can do as I please?

Do I need a break?
I've been taking enough breaks, thanks to you.

I have a little bunny rabbit impression I can do.
*hop*
...Please hurry and compliment me.

Give me an order.
I'll do my best to honor the name of C&C.

Happy birthday, Sensei. *clap clap*
It's my job as your assistant to celebrate your birthday.

Huh? Birthday...?
Oh... Thank you for celebrating that.
You know actions speak louder than words, right?
Let's go out. I'll assist you.

It's the New Year.
I'm turning over a new leaf. I've upgraded to an updated maid version.
I'll be able to assist you even more efficiently now.
Please don't keep quiet. Hurry, respond.

I know what I'm supposed to say in this situation.
It's "Merry Christmas."
Then I shall shoot down the formidable flying enemy
known as Santa Claus, and return immediately.

To celebrate Halloween, I've activated my most powerful maid mode.
This is where you say, "You don't look any different than usual!"

Normal.Transcription: Blue, Archive.
How are you? I'm Kirifuji Nagisa, host of the Tea Party at Trinity General School. I'll do my best to assist you.
Heehee. How are you?
It's nice to have coffee like this sometimes.
(This place is full of students. I shouldn't let my guard down...)
Oh, those treats look so pretty.
(The chairs here look quite comfortable.)

I've been carrying this pistol because it's small and doesn't interfere when I'm making tea, but I'm not sure how good it is for self-protection. If something happens...I'll be counting on you, Sensei.

Lobby.Transcription:
How have you been, Sensei?
I was preparing tea while waiting for you.

Welcome, Sensei.
If you'd like, how about a cup of black tea before work?

Heehee. The weather is nice today as well.
How about we take a stroll after work?
Huh? Where did the cup warmer go...?

I'm so focused on the task that I keep forgetting this is the Schale office...
Excuse me.
There aren't eyes everywhere in the Schale office like there are in the Tea Party office. I feel more comfortable here.
So as to be a role model to Trinity students, I have to be aware of my surroundings.
(For some reason...I feel calm...and my eyelids keep closing...)
Tea Party tasks are usually desk jobs, so a quality chair is very important.
Why don't you get a new chair for your Schale office?
Happy birthday, Sensei.

I've prepared special tea leaves.
Please come to the Trinity terrace when you're done.

A birthday...gift?
Hmm, I don't really want anything specific, but...
If I could spend a day with you, that would be the best gift I could think of.

I wish you all the best for the New Year.
I'll be counting on you for your guidance again this year.

...This year is almost over.
Did you eat any Christmas cake, Sensei?
If you haven't yet, I prepared some Christmas pudding. Why don't you join me?

This is the limited edition Halloween pumpkin tea I got from Mika, but...
it tastes a bit strange...
...Huh? It's not pumpkin tea, but pumpkin soup paste...?
Mi—ka!

Normal.Transcription: Blue! Archive!
Is there anything fun going on? I, Kurosaki Koyuki, am here! Yahahaha!
Wow, there are a lot of interesting things here!
Th-This is a safe zone! No one can get me here, right?!
Oh, this place is the infamous...
By any chance...are loud people not allowed here?
*gasp* ...! I'm hungry.
No, um... Huh? Eh? Is this okay? Is it really okay? Sensei...do you...really trust me...?

Lobby.Transcription:
You came, Sensei!
I've been waiting for you for so long!

Yahahaha, Sensei!
...Huh? No, I didn't touch anything.
Maybe...?

Can I help you with anything?
Or should I just help you by not doing anything?

Calculations?
They're easy! Not that I like doing them, though.

Did you call me to find a password, by any chance?
I'm not your notepad!

Oh, did you tell my upperclassmen that I'm here?
If I don't let them know, they'll scold me later...

Huh? I'm not bored.
...Huh? I don't know. Why?

Happy birthday, Sensei!
I'll do anything for you today, Sensei.

Yup! Today's my birthday!
Yahahaha! I hope I'm lucky today. Otherwise, I'll be in trouble!

Happy New Year!
Argh! It's already the New Year!
Hmm? When the sun rises in the New Year, is it a new sun? Or is it just the same old sun from last year?

Merry Christmas! We can play all we want today!
Right?
A lot of people are wearing strange outfits today.

...Me? I-I've never...
I don't know if I have, or...have I...? Yahahaha...?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
What? It's New Year's. I just thought I should wear the right outfit to celebrate... Please keep looking after me this year too, Sensei.
I hope next year will be safe, too...whatever that means.
Hah. There's a lot to think about...
But I guess what I really want is peace and good health. Really, that's all...
I hope that everything that happens is stuff we can handle.
I actually...kinda like this outfit. It's not bad, right?
Sensei, am I really gonna be able to... No, wait. Nevermind. I'll make sure I live up to your expectations.

Lobby.Transcription: Hey, Sensei. Happy New Year.

Wow, you sure have it rough. Trouble right from the start of the year?
Um...it just doesn't seem like anyone else's business.

You think I'm...even cuter in a kimono?
Hmph. Don't say stuff you don't mean.

Hah. That's more than enough teasing out of you, Sensei.
Wait, you...you mean it? Um, okay... I-I guess that's fine then...

About Problem Solver... Don't worry. It's nothing big.
I hope there aren't any...incidents...this year.
What's wrong, Sensei? I can help you with whatever.

Even if it's not official business, if it's something you need, I'd try...
Um, nevermind! Forget about it. I didn't say anything.

Happy birthday, Sensei. What do you want as a gift?
Do you want any music? I've got a whole bunch.

My...birthday?
I didn't expect you to remember. Uh, not that that's bad. Actually, it's kind of nice to hear you wish me a happy birthday...
So, uh, thanks.

Happy New Year, Sensei. I hope you have another great year.
...Pocket money? Really?

Oh, it is Christmas. New Year's is coming up soon, isn't it?
All in all...how was the year for you?

Halloween always gets a little rowdy.
Not that I dislike that kind of vibe.

Event.Transcription: Good job, Sensei. Nice to see you here.
Did you make a wish?

Things don't always turn out like you want...
But that doesn't mean you should stop dreaming. That's what I think, anyway.
So... I hope the new year is full of peaceful, happy days for you.
So...you spent all the money you saved for the new album on an offering? That's what you're saying?

I guess I went a bit overboard, huh...
But it's not too much to pay to see the boss smile.

Haruka's seemed really overworked lately...
I wonder if she'll be okay.
(...The Kurokame Gang. I have a bad feeling about this.)
This seems like trouble, right from the start...

An offering thief...
Ugh...this seams like a pain. I don't really wanna...
But it's the boss' orders, so there's nothing I can do...

Hah. Well, that was a disaster.
And I even had to face off against that weird robot...
Oh well. At least it wasn't boring.
Good thing you're here, Sensei. There was something I wanted to ask for your help on.
Sorry, I know it's annoying to be asking this right after New Year's, but...do you think you could make a little time?

Haha, it's weird for Problem Solver to ask Sensei to do a job, and not the other way around, right?
But this the whole thing is a bit weird.

Sorry. I'm not like Mutsuki... I'm really not used to this kind of place.
Um... I'm just not sure what to do with my face right now...
Thanks for your help. Here's your payment from Problem Solver 68.
Thanks, Sensei. You really saved us...

Normal.Transcription: B-Blue... Archive...
Um, sorry... It's me again already... E-Even though the year's just started...
Ah, I-I'm sorry. Someone like me...shouldn't be wearing something so pretty...
S-Sensei...? Are they not here?
This is Sensei's, so... Why is s-someone like me here?
I-I think I stand out too much...
I wanna hide...
This year and next year, and the year after that...and even in the next life...! I'll get rid of everything that you don't like!

Lobby.Transcription:
H-Happy New Year, Sensei!
A-And you actually called me, on purpose... I'm sorry!
...Ah! T-Thank you!
Welcome, Sensei! Um, I-I've been waiting! N-Not that you need to rush for someone like me...
To celebrate New Year's...W-What should I do? What sh-should I explode...?
What can someone like me do here...

Um...p-plans? For the year?
Oh no. S-Should I have thought about it?!

I-I just want... This year...
I want to l-listen to what you tell me... And learn f-from it... That's my goal...
I-I'm sorry. It's always like this...

H-Happy birthday...
I wanted to say it quietly...so you wouldn't have to listen...

M-My birthday?! W-Why?
Why would you remember something so insignificant?

Happy New Year...! I-If it turns out...that it's a bad year for you...
I'll get rid of the year for you...

I-It's already Christmas...
I was wondering...does Santa get your permission before coming to Schale?
If not, I'll...
Ah... Halloween... I, that is... Th-This time, I didn't shoot...

Event.Transcription: S-S-S-Sensei? Oh! I-I'm sorry! W-Welcome!

...Heehee... I didn't expect to see you here, Sensei...
Um, n-no! I didn't mean anything in particular by that!
H-Huh?! W-W-What is it, Sensei?

What? You were just calling me...for no reason?
I-Is that so. Heehee...

To celebrate the New Year with everyone at the Problem Solver...and with Sensei...
Heehee... It feels...a bit special.

I'm know it's probably no fun for you...to be around s-someone like me...
Oh, that's...not the case? I-I see...
...T-Thank...thank you, Sensei.

I'm not totally sure... But it seems like something big happened...
...Should I destroy everything?

I think...Aru is having fun...
I'm relieved...heehee.

I guess things have finally calmed down...
But...I wonder...what was that robot?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive
My name is Kuwakami Kaho, the vice president of Allied Hyakkiyako Academy's Yin-Yang Club. I'm pleased to make your acquaintance.
Hm... This seems like an ideal location to establish Hyakkiyako's Embassy...
So, what space have you reserved for the Hyakkiyako merchandise?
Oh! Did I sense...just now...the presence of my idol...?
Heehee, it's quite raucous in here. It's not a bad atmosphere, though.
To see students from so many different academies... Truth be told, I'm quite impressed with Schale.
Oh! Such a lovely gift, and from you, Sensei? It's too much, but it would be rude to decline. I'll treasure it.

Lobby.Transcription: I've been waiting, Sensei. What's on your schedule today?

Yes, all the preparations have been completed satisfactorily.
Hyakkiyako and Schale... I hope we can work together like a team in a three-legged race.
You called for me, yes?

As the vice president of the Yin-Yang Club, it is my honor to be assigned a shift at Schale.
However, I admit, I do worry that I may not always be able to acquit myself well.

...Oh? You say I've always been a help to you?
Heehee. Thank you. That is a relief.

When I find myself experiencing difficulties, I know I can always draw strength from my collection of Chise merchandise.
...Shall I give you a piece, Sensei?

Schale is certainly admirable.
To think that you'd be able to host advantageous exchanges with so many students...
Heehee, I'll need to study hard myself in order to keep up.

Please visit Hyakkiyako's Yin-Yang Club one day.
I promise that you will find our skills as hosts without flaw.
And, in addition... Niya and Chise will be very happy.

Heehee, please receive my sincere birthday wishes, Sensei.
In fact, I am planning to host a one-night-only celebratory concert in your honor at Hyakkiyako.

Huh? What do you mean, too much? There's no way a mere greeting would be enough...
Oh, I really thought it was a good idea. Is it not? I see...

M-My... birthday?
...No, I'm just a bit surprised.

I'm unused to receiving birthday greetings from anyone outside of the Yin-Yang Club...
But I'm very happy to receive them from you. Thank you, Sensei.
Heehee. Happy New Year, Sensei! Thank you for all you've done for us this past year.

Merry Christmas.
It seems that Santa Claus looks quite similar to Namahage. So this year, we're planning on holding an exclusive event at Hyakkiyako with that as a theme.

Huh? You're saying it's totally different? A story unique to Hyakkiyako...?
I see. It seems the cultural differences were larger than I imagined.

Happy Halloween, Sensei!
It is important that we do not lose our culture to the appeal of Halloween. So this fall, Hyakkiyako shall throw beans and shout "Happy Setsubun!"

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Although I look like a maid now, in truth I am still Aris. Please continue to support me, Sensei.
Where shall I begin to clean?
This looks like a location that will trigger a side quest!
I have heard tell that this world holds places called "maid cafe."
A maid needs a master. My master must be you, Sensei!
My maid level has gone up! My stats while wearing this maid outfit have improved a bit.
This...this is a legendary holy sword, imbued with both my strength and Sensei's! Thank you! I will raise my maid level even higher to become a maid hero worthy of this!

Lobby.Transcription:
Welcome, Master!
Aris the maid is here to take care of everything!

Tell me anything.
For now, I am your maid, Sensei!

I am both a hero and a maid today.
So that makes me a hero maid!
A hero maid has to have all the skills of both a hero and a maid.
So that means it is an advanced class!

When I wear a maid outfit, I feel as if my cleaning skill level has increased!
Sensei, do you need me to clean somewhere?

I have heard that a maid has many duties!
Cooking, cleaning, laundry, destruction, ambushes, security and even world peace! ♪

I have heard that a calm mind is very important for a sniper.
Um, S-Sensei? When you pat my head like that...
Augh... I've lost my calm mind...

Sensei, what is on your task list for the day?
Oh, you're going to spend all day vegging out? As for me...
Yes! I will veg out as well!

Happy birthday, Sensei!
Tell me what the correct gift item is, and I will embark on a fetchquest!

The day I met you and my friends in the Game Development Department...
I will not ever forget that day, Sensei.
Sensei, I look forward to many more days together!

Happy New Year, Sensei!
What is my first task as a maid?
Is it truly all right for me to just spend time with you?

I know.
In games or in reality... Christmas is a time for events!

Happy Halloween!
Today is I have seen several people disguised as video game characters!
Or...is it that video games are becoming reality today...?

Event.Transcription: Please hurry, Sensei! It is a very special event!
My loadout is equipped! I am ready to go! What about you, Sensei?
I have worked very hard to clean and keep watch. I did a good job, right?

Uh... This got a lot more complicated than I expected...
But! Not to worry. I am a hero maid, and I am ready for anything!

That was an incredible adventure!
If I am in a party with you, Sensei, I am not scared of anything!

My maid level still isn't very high...
But I will continue to grind for it!

Sensei, please let me know if you see Neru anywhere.
Promise me, okay?

Cooking, cleaning, laundry... A maid must know many skills.
Will you join this quest with me, Sensei?

Um, you can hit me, but I am not going to drop any loot...
I am not a mob!

Welcome, Sensei!
Even watching a shop is within the capabilities of a hero maid!

We have many powerful items in stock for exchange!
But since it is you, Sensei... I think you could just have all of them!

Even though the event is over, the shop remains open!
However, it is only for a limited time! So do not tarry! Promise you will not tarry!

Welcome to Aris' Adventure Supplies!
We have many powerful potions and materials to aid you in your quest!

Oh! A smile, Sensei?
Right away! Momoi told me that smiles are free!

Bum bum bum! Item purchased!
I will give you an upgrade! One premium smile, coming up!

Ohoho... You have quite an eye for quality, dear guest.
What do you think? I memorized some lines for situations like this!

Oh weary traveler, is this your choice?
How is it, Sensei? I wanted to try that one out!

Inventory management is also a maid's duty!
I will work hard again today!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Hello, Sensei. It's me, Toki. Prepare to see the true power of an undercover agent.
A peaceful tea time... it certainly is relaxing.
This place truly improves one's quality of life.
If I had time and a budget... I too would like to create a place like this.
As an agent, it is forbidden to let one's guard down. But here...it is difficult to avoid.
I find I am reminded of many things when I visit. I don't necessarily mind it, though.
I have been told that sometimes, it is not a weakness to tell someone your honest feelings. In that case... thank you, Sensei. From the bottom of my heart.

Lobby.Transcription:
Hello, Sensei.
Today, I am on the shift as a bunny.
I look forward to working with you. Boing, boing.

Welcome back, Sensei. I've been waiting.
Let me repeat that, so you understand that it's important.
I've been waiting. Boing, boing.

I am a rabbit, and not a puppy...
But if you make me to wait like this...
I might make a mess.

What was it you called me for?
Is there an operation? Is it security? Combat? Destruction? Justice?
Huh? There wasn't a reason you called?

Schale duty is certainly interesting.
You seem busy, and yet you're not working...

It's not that I'm always eager for work.
I, too, enjoy killing time.
However... I'd like to be someone you can rely on, Sensei.

Sensei, please help. There's been an incident.
I've come down with a terrible case of boredom. It's extremely serious.

Happy birthday, Sensei.
Huh? Of course I remembered.
An excellent memory is a basic prerequisite for becoming an extraordinary agent.
Well, are you ready? We must celebrate.

It is my birthday. Thank you for remembering.
However, I am acting as an undercover agent right now.
However...it might be possible to celebrate, as long as we find somewhere inconspicuous enough.

It's already New Year's. Time certainly has flown...
Have you made any resolutions?
Tell me. I will ensure that you don't break them.

It's Christmas.
No, it's fine.
I'm not cold. ...Achoo!
You...*sniff*... You saw nothing.

Today is Halloween.
I have seen many people disguised like me today.
Is it possible that they're all aspiring agents?

Event.Transcription:
Welcome, Sensei.
Preparations are complete for the stealth mission.
Everything is ready. Awaiting your order.
It seems this place holds a secret.

I understand that you have been through a great deal, and may be experiencing some confusion. But please trust me.
You can always rely on me, Sensei.

Good. It all wrapped up satisfactorily.
I will simply consider this a learning experience in my path to becoming the perfect agent.
Yes, Sensei. What is it?

Ha... In these clothes, it feels really...
But the fabric is so thin I suppose that's inevitable...

You mean the bunny suit?
The strengths are different than the maid outfit. It's good in the right situations.

You think I look good in it?
Hm... Well, thank you. I didn't expect that...
Hello, Sensei. Today's tasks are ready for you.

It is important to consider every detail of a mission.
Let's work step by step today.

I understand that it can be overwhelming to be assigned a full schedule.
However, I am here to assist you, Sensei.

An agent and a mission go hand-in-hand.
...In other words, you are an agent now, too.
We have completed today's tasks. Good work, Sensei.

Even by my standards, this has been demanding.
You are certainly impressive, Sensei.
Hello, Sensei. Today's tasks are ready for you.

It is important to consider every detail of a mission.
Let's work step by step today.

I understand that it can be overwhelming to be assigned a full schedule.
However, I am here to assist you, Sensei.

An agent and a mission go hand-in-hand.
...In other words, you are an agent now, too.
We have completed today's tasks. Good work, Sensei.

Even by my standards, this has been demanding.
You are certainly impressive, Sensei.

Normal.Transcription: Blue...Archive...
It's me, Hanaoka Yuzu... Um, I look a little different right now because of...a few reasons. Thanks for your help...
I'm a maid right now... So maybe I should...clean something?
Is a maid that develops games...something people would like?
Ugh...I wanna hide somewhere...
For an infiltration mission...cardboard boxes are a necessity.
Welcome, Master. Um...like I thought, it's too embarrassing...
This... You must've gone to such lengths for this... I'm so happy! I promise to work even harder from now on, Sensei... You'll see!

Lobby.Transcription:
Eeek! W-Who?!
Oh, it's just you, Sensei. That's a relief. I mean, welcome.

I've been waiting, Sensei...
I'm happy that you're here.

I'm not very good at cleaning, but...
If you ask me to, Sensei...

What? You're saying I...look good?
Um, I'd rather you didn't make fun of me...
Y-You're not? You mean it? Then...that's just...
Why do people wear cat ears with maid outfits, I wonder?
Cats don't seem like they'd make good maids... If anything, they're more the master type...
This...may be a good reference for the game.
This frilly outfit...it's a bit embarrassing.

H-Happy birthday, Master.
I just thought I should try it once, since I'm a maid...

Oh, you remembered my birthday? Thank you.
It's all right. There's no need to do anything special.
Just being with you, Sensei... I mean, being with you, Master is enough to make me happy.
Um, I-I mean... As a maid, that's my official stance!

Happy New Year, Master.
...U-um, maybe it's better if I just call you Sensei.
I heard Santa comes in through the chimney.

It's too bad we don't have a chimney in the Game Development Department...
I'd like to try it, if I have a chance.
A chimney looks pretty cozy...

Halloween...
The streets are full of people in costumes, but...
It's not a holiday I care much about.
I'd never miss out on a game event.

Event.Transcription:
Sensei! Um...
Welcome, Master.

There's so many people here... I'm not used to crowds...
But this is sort of like a special event, isn't it?

Cleaning up, and hosting guests...
Ugh... I just wish there were fewer customers...

Th-There's big trouble!
Um, Sensei...help!

I still can't believe everything that happened...
But...thanks to you, it all turned out okay...

T-The chest... Where is the chest...? Without it, I...
Oh! You found it!
Thank you, Sensei.

Um...even though it was scary...
This whole thing might actually be good inspiration for the game I'm working on...
Sensei, will...will I do okay?

Ugh... I really want to go home and play games...
But I can't just sit here trembling... That's no good.
After all, if I don't try to do everything I can...

Normal.Transcription: Blue! Archive!
Hi, hello! Everyone's superstar savior, Uzawa Reisa, is here!
Oh, this is...a lot of people...
Should I just go...?
No, I have to push forward as normal!
I-I gotta stop... Everyone's gonna think I'm strange.
This seems like a really safe place!
I can't...really believe it. I'm really helping you, Sensei? I always hope I am, but...

Lobby.Transcription:
There you are, Sensei!
Uzawa Reisa, reporting for duty!

Oh! It's Sensei's grand entrance!
So, what's the plan for today?
You called me, Sensei? What did you wanna talk about?

Ah, was my voice...too loud?
Your head was ringing? Oh no! Sorry!

Hmm. Interesting!
I've noticed that when I come here, some of my tension just goes away!

Um, do you have an errand for me to run, maybe?
It feels a bit weird to just stand here...

Have no fear! No matter what happens...
I, Uzawa Reisa, will be by your side, Sensei!

Happy birthday, Sensei!
Since it's a special day, we should do something special! Ooh, I know! Let's go on a patrol together!

You remembered my birthday? Thanks!
A whole lot of people have wished me a happy birthday this year!

It makes me happy to have lived this long!
Even though... Well, it's true I'm only 15...

Happy New Year, Sensei!
I'll be counting on you for backup this year!

Merry Christmas!
Huh? A gift exchange?

Aaah! I forgot! I forgot!
I'm really not used to this kind of thing...
If there's no candy, I won't stand for being teased!
...Huh? Did I interpret something wrong?

Event.Transcription: Oh, Sensei! Over here!

The super-est superhero of the Vigilante Crew...
It is I, Uzawa Reisa! Hi!
Ooooh... Things are heating up!
The final sprint!
Let's keep trying our best until the very end!
Yes! I'm here on standby!
What is it? Whatever you'd like, whenever you'd like, I'm here for you!
An incident? Where?! Who?! I'm ready!
Um... Being still is...really difficult for me...
I found some stuff on my patrol today! Lemme show you!

In this line of work...I see a lot of lost stuff.
I sure hope they find their owners!
Is there anything you need more of? Lemme check and see what we've got!

Hm? What are you looking for?
Is it not here?

Okay! Just let me know if you need anything!
I'll go get it for you right away!
Oooh, I see, I see.
Hm! Yep, that's good too!
So, that's what you needed?
Okay! Here it is!

Oh! Hey there, Sensei!
There's a whole mountain of things to do!
So...I made a list! Let's check everything off together.
Huh? Sensei? What's wrong?
Concentrate! We gotta focus, okay?
Wow! I knew it, Sensei!
Nice! It's all going so well!

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive
My name is Akeshiro Rumi. I am president of Shanhaijing Academy's Black Tortoise Promenade. You can call me Rumi.
The decor here... I wonder how it would look at the Promenade?
The snacks here too... We could learn from this.
It's been too long since I've relaxed like this...
Let's hope our Genryumon friends don't try to pick a fight with me.
So peaceful... Yes, this is nice.
It's important to use weapons that fit well in your hands, whether on the battlefield or in the kitchen.

Lobby.Transcription:
Oh, Sensei. There you are.
I thought you forgot about us. Haha.

Hello, Sensei.
Making the president of the Black Tortoise Promenade wait... How bold of you.

This is Schale... Ah, sorry. 
I rarely spent so much time away from the kitchen. It's not what I expected.

To a chef, the kitchen is a battlefield...
Does that mean this is Sensei's battlefield?

Sure you have something I can use to cook here...
I was thinking about making something.

Food is important, isn't it, Sensei?
Don't skip meals, and don't eat just anything. Got it?

The reason I like cooking? Well... Cooking is always honest.
The more effort you put in, the better it tastes. The more you study, the more opportunities open up.
In a way... It's like you, Sensei.

I remembered, Sensei. It's your birthday, right?
That's why I made some long noodles for you. I also have some peaches for dessert. Make sure you eat everything!

My birthday...? Thanks, Sensei.
It's been a while since I celebrated it with anyone...
When you're the merchant guild president, it's easy to lose track of the days.

Happy New Year. I'll be counting on you this year too.
New Year means it's time for jiaozi dumplings! And kagami mochi! And steamed fish and rice cake soup and...
Huh? You think that your stomach will burst if you eat all that...?

Christmas... It's not a holiday that's very familiar to me, but I enjoy the atmosphere.
Today, I plan to make some tanghulu. What do you think?

Halloween... I'm not quite used to it, but I do know what it is.
Let's see... Should I try making some pumpkin mooncakes?

Event.Transcription: Oh, there you are, Sensei. How are you enjoying Shanhaijing?

I'm glad you didn't get lost.
The streets of Shanhaijing are complicated.
Those Genryumon guys never change. For better or worse.
Don't worry. The Black Tortoise Promenade—and myself—are on your side.

After all that, we're finished.
It's all thanks to you, Sensei. You haven't lost anything, have you? If so, I'll go find it.

My shoulders have been so stiff lately... I need a massage.
Maybe from Sensei...? *gulp*

Haha! Couldn't tickle the truth out of you, eh?
I can offer you one of the dishes I'm still studying, but...

I always provide the highest quality food to my guests!
And, well... If I'm still studying a dish, it might not be at that level yet.

Sensei, you are very important to me.
You're a customer and a colleague and...um...
Okay, I've said too much...

We're known for our food...
But the main work of the Black Tortoise Promenade is commerce.
You can leave product management to us.

Of course, product sourcing and distribution are important...
But so are presentation and the layout of your goods. Take your time and look carefully.

Things have been taken care of, but I plan on continuing the store for a while.
It's important to always finish your work.
Hm. What's wrong? Are you concerned about something?

Just let me know if you need anything.
...I'll buy the right one next time.
Thank you as always! It's been awhile since I saw the store. Haha.
Do you want that one? A good pick. Quality guaranteed!
Make your purchase before it's sold out. There's nothing worse than waiting for the next shipment.

As you probably know, Sensei, there's no such thing as a free lunch.
If a product you use or consume is free...
All that means is you've become the product yourself without even knowing!
Now, Sensei. It's time to test your luck.
Make a choice. I wonder what will come out.
Spend it all here or you'll regret it later.
This is just one of the many enterprises the Promenade is involved in.
As with anything, luck is important.
Amazing! What a surprise! Congratulations, Sensei.

This card is really rare. It's quite valuable.
I'm really happy for you.
Let's see here... The result is....? Well, it's still good...
Yikes... Well, well... Don't be too disappointed, Sensei. There's always next time.

Normal.Transcription: Blue, Archive.
I am Konoe Mina, executive officer of Shanhaijing Academy's Genryumon. I'll take care of anything or anyone that gets in our way!
They say every lost ship needs a lighthouse to lean on. Ah... F-Forget I said that!
The scent of tea hangs in the air... I'm not good at making it, but it came out pretty good.
A place where nothing moves, not even a muscle... That's what this place is.
The Shanhaijing Cafe is more like a tea house...
It smells good... Maybe I should relax a bit.
Amazing... It fits perfectly. Like it was mine all along. Heh heh. I'm all ready now. Shall we go?

Lobby.Transcription:
Oh, it's you, Sensei. To meet you in a place like this... This is a small world indeed.
Oh? You think I'd obviously meet you since we're at Schale...?
Y-Yeah...

I've been waiting for you, Sensei.
What does the world have in store for us today? I'm excited.

No person can live alone...
It's a cliche, but I don't hate it.

Humans should be wary of other humans... But humans must also trust their fellow humans.
Should I trust you, Sensei? Or...
Don't worry so much, Sensei. Everything will be okay by tomorrow.

Movies are a great thing. Especially those that have passed the test of time.
They don't survive because they are classics. They are called classics because they survived.

Sometimes I wish I could really be someone.
I don't care who it would be. Just anyone greater than me.
Perhaps, that is why... I enjoy movies.

Congratulations, Sensei. For what? Why! Your birthday of course!
My gift is...top 10 noir movies selected by me!
Let's watch them together!

Heh... Being wished happy birthday by Sensei. Not bad.
I can stand sitting around all day like some kind of desk jockey.
Hang out with me today!

It's a new year... Happy new year, Sensei.
Sensei, do you have a new year resolution?
Mine, of course, is to live an even more hardboiled life.

Is there a Christmas...festival?
The word festival seems to mean many different things.
...What's with the look? I didn't mean anything by it.

Is it Halloween...? That's a favorite for kids everywhere.
Maybe I should stop by the Plum Blossom Garden and pass out some candy...
Sensei, if it's okay with you, why don't you join me?

Event.Transcription:
Sensei? Hurry over to Shanhaijing.
Oh, and I suggest you steer clear of the Black Tortoise Promenade.

This is Shanhaijing.
Heh. Don't let your eyes wander too much. I'd hate for you to get lost.

This must the be doing of the Black Tortoise Promenade.
I can tell that much at a glance.

How did this happen...?
Ugh... I hate it when things get complicated...!

What an ending...I never imagined...
Well... I think things ended well. Good.

Oh? You got something to say? Go ahead.
There are some days when I just want to tell people what I really think.

Why?
We've still got business to finish.
And even if it's dirty business...somebody's got to do it.
Wasn't that a cool line?

Shanhaijing is noisier than usual.
Is it because you're here...?

If there's action to be had, we'll be the first ones to act.
So let's go.

Purpose. Duty. Operation. Misson. They all mean the same.
Don't worry. We'll take this one at a time.
When there are multiple missions, I take care of the simple ones first. That makes things go more smoothly.

If you ever feel overwhelmed by your tasks, let me know right away.
I will always be on your side, Sensei.
This would have been difficult for even a Genryumon member... I'm surprised, Sensei.
You really did it, Sensei! I knew I wasn't wrong about you.

You've been taking on difficult missions like a pro.
B-But...! Any Genryumon member can do that!

Normal.Transcription: Blue, Archive.
Civil engineering, construction, demolition... Contact us if you need workers. We'll even agitate for you!
The most important thing in the field is safety, above all else.
The architecture here... I'll just say it's not bad.
Leave it to our workers. This is nothing...
A 3-day work week... What a lovely phrase...
The pudding here seems...different from the pudding supplied by the secretariat.
Strong, trustworthy equipment is your best partner on a work site. In that sense... This rascal has never disappointed me.

Lobby.Transcription:
Stay safe today!
Let's aim for a new "No Accident" record in Schale!
You're late. This isn't sabotage, is it?

Sensei, I don't know what you're trying to prove
with this sabotage, but...
I like safety! Love it! I love no accidents!

When it comes to pudding, I love all flavors.
Custard cream, chocolate, even fruit...
...just not water pudding.
(What would be a good justification for our next coup d'etat...?)

Sensei, I think you've been working too late for too long...
You are getting overtime pay, right?

I wonder what our upperclassman is doing right now...
I hope our upperclassman is doing well.

Congratulations, Sensei.
Let us celebrate the birth of a new comrade today.
Heehee... Sensei, do you know what today is?

Yes! It's a day that we should celebrate with our all!
On this day, the people rose up and demanded freedom!

Huh...? It's my birthday...?
...I totally forgot.

This is the year we claim the Red Winter Academy Secretariat for the party.
We'll create a paradise for workers...!

Only distributing gifts to good kids...
This Santa Clause sounds like a dirty capitalist to me.
I once tasted a limited time Halloween pumpkin pudding...

It had a subtle sweetness that was oh, so luxurious...
I'd even work weekends for another taste of such a snack...
Eek! Wh-What am I saying...?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
RABBIT 1, outfit change completed. Undercover operation commencing.
(I want to take a shower...)
There's a delicious smell coming from somewhere...
(I should have chosen a cuter swimsuit...)
This is Sensei's... What am I doing...?
Sensei... Where could you be...?
RABBIT Type 31 SMG, acquired. The internal workings have been modified so it can operate underwater, but maybe we could also modify the exterior to be...more cute?

Lobby.Transcription:
Welcome, Sensei.
Preparations are complete. Whatever your command, I will complete it perfectly.
Welcome, Sensei. I've been waiting for you.
...Hm? Wasn't I cold, waiting for you in my swimsuit?
That wasn't a problem. Regardless of the situation, waiting for you is never difficult, Sensei.
So...this swimsuit... Does it look good on me?

I've only ever worn SRT Academy's standard-issue swimsuits before, so...
...This cute design feels a bit unnatural to me.
I'm pretty good at swimming, although Saki can still beat me...
Since I'm off-duty right now... I can help you with non-mission related things.

Could it be because rabbits don't like water...?
I don't think ever I've seen a rabbit-pattern swimsuit.

Maybe that means cows are good swimmers, since cow print suits are pretty popular.
A rabbit pattern would be really nice though...

Please don't hesitate to call on me for help.
I'll always be there for you, Sensei.

Happy birthday, Sensei.
I've...been pretty busy recently, so I wasn't able to prepare a gift, but...
Instead, I'll do anything you ask today. Anything at all.
Is it my...birthday?

Heehee...
I think I've already received my gift... So it's okay.

I'm looking forward to the new year, Sensei.
This year, even if we don't have a mission, let's go to the ocean...
...I'm sorry. Don't mind me.

Today is not the day for this outfit.
...Next time, I'll wear something more appropriate...

It's noisy outside...
I want to treasure the memories we made today.

Event.Transcription: Today's mission is infiltration and investigation... I hope we don't run into any trouble.
RABBIT 1, preparations completed. Sensei, your orders please.

I'm afraid I've upset the town residents...
What should I do?
Heehee... We really did this summer in full SRT-style, didn't we? It was more fun than a simple beach vacation, in a lot of ways.
Great job, Sensei.

I know we're here on a mission, but we are at the beach after all...
...Do you have some time for us?
When was the last time I had a shrimp sandwich...
(I shouldn't look too excited...)

I've made arrangements for our absence.
The students at the Valkyrie Public Safety Bureau will be watching Bun Bun while we're gone.

I have to admit, I get a little jealous sometimes...
It's just that... Bun Bun seems to like the Public Safety Bureau students more than us sometimes.
Welcome, Sensei. I've organized a list of things we'll need for the investigation.
...This is the target for today's undercover operation.
Yes. H-How can I help you?
Um... The fabric of this swimsuit is somewhat thin...
I-If you look at me like that... I don't know what to say...
I learned a lot. Well, you are a Sensei, after all.
Thank you for your assistance. You were a huge help.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
RABBIT 2, mission preparation completed. Remember your training, even at sea!
(This outfit really is uncomfortable to move around in, especially indoors...)
(Is..that edible...?)
Dressing like this for the next mission might not be a bad idea.
Could that be...the weapon I saw in the manual...?
Nothing to report! Continue patrol!
RABBIT Type 26 Machine Gun, acquired. Fully waterproofed, this baby won't malfunction even on the high seas. Of course, I still need to clean and oil it after every battle...

Lobby.Transcription: Hello, Sensei. I was just cleaning my gun.
Wh-Whoa! When did you get here?
I wasn't slacking off!

It's really hot again today.
Are you making sure everyone is taking preventative measures against heat stroke?

We need to be careful about dehydration. Drinking water is very important.
It's also important to get enough sodium.

I really don't like the ocean much.
Firearms malfunction more easily in that environment.
But an SRT student should be prepared for any situation.
I'm using a waterproof tactical map, meant to be used at sea.
Moe said to just use some waterproofed GPS equipment, but...
I don't want to do that. A paper map has a value of it's own.
(It would have been nice to come to the sea with everyone for a reason other than a mission...)
What did I do with my helmet?

This boonie hat is serving as my helmet.
This actually happens to be made of bulletproof fiber!

Happy birthday, Sensei.
I'll handle the busywork for today. Go home early and get some rest.
If you end up working late even on your birthday... That's just kind of sad.
...A birthday gift? I...don't really need anything...

If it's okay with you, let's have dinner together.
I don't care what we eat. Even just convenience store food is fine.

Happy new year, Sensei! What's your resolution?
As for me... I want to eat fresh fish at least once a week...
I-I mean... I'll work hard to resurrect SRT Academy!
Oh, Sensei. If you have some time in the evening, please stop by Kousagi Park.

Moe got a large turkey to celebrate Christmas, but...
It was way too big for RABBIT Squad to finish on our own.
Having a BBQ at Schale might be difficult so...let's have a party at the park.
Recently, I've noticed more pumpkin in the convenience store lunches other students throw away...
Does that mean...that the Halloween season I've heard so much about is upon us?

Event.Transcription: RABBIT Squad's first away mission! Heehee. ...Huh? No way! Y-You're the one who's excited.
This is a chance for SRT to show our stuff!
There's something...suspicious about this town. They're hiding something...

I really don't wanna help those jerks! Ugh.
But providing assistance to civilians is part of SRT's duties.
I'm glad the misunderstanding has been resolved. Now, there's no need to worry about a lack of shrimp.
RABBIT 2, preparations completed! We can enter at any time!
Well, I tried to dress like a normal tourist...
I don't look suspicious... Do I?
Hey... Sensei, is there something on my stomach?
I don't personally like seafood much. It's too difficult to preserve.
I do like dried seafood though, like dried squid!

Normal.Transcription: Blue... A-Archive...
R-RABBIT 4, reporting for duty. Should I...really be dressed like this...?
Everyone's wearing these amazing outfits...
U-Ugh...
Even though I'm wearing a s-swimsuit...no one is noticing me.
(What am I saying?)
Wh-Where did everyone g-go?
RABBIT Type 39 Rifle, a-acquired. Sniping on the ocean has m-many difficulties due to the w-wind and waves. But if it's within 1 km... I-I can do it...

Lobby.Transcription: Oh, S-Sensei...! I've been waiting f-for you.

I-I've been here for a w-while...
Y-You didn't forget about me, right...?

M-Memories about the ocean...
I don't think I have th-that many good m-memories...

...Is there a-anything I can help you with?
M-Maybe go out and buy some drinks...?

...What? My o-outfit is a p-p-problem?
W-Why...?
You think it's...c-cute...?! Oh... Th-Thank you...
I-I'm a little embarrassed b-by your c-compliment...

I think fishing is a perfect hobby for a s-sniper.
P-Preparing your equipment and waiting for a b-bite is very similar...
...The principle is the same.

I can swim...a-a little bit.
I'm not very good at the b-butterfly stroke, though...
H-Happy birthday... Sensei...!

I-If I catch something good while fishing today...
It'll b-be your g-gift, Sensei... O-Only if you want though!

My b-birthday... You remembered!
...Th-Thank you so much!

H-Happy new year, Sensei!
D-Does anyone ever...throw away osechi dishes...?

M-Moe promised to cook a big t-turkey for Christmas.
I-I'm looking forward to it...
I-If it's okay with you, Sensei... W-Will you join us?

I might be just a l-little cold wearing this...
I wish I could drink a n-nice, warm pumpkin tea...

Event.Transcription: Eek... I-It's just like a fishing village from a h-horror story...
I-I just w-wanna go back to th-the school...
Oh, w-wait... I don't have a school t-to go back to...

The residents here are so s-scary...! I-I talked to them for the investigation...
I-I just wanna run away...
The c-captain gave me some warm coffee earlier.
Maybe he's not as scary as I thought...
I think I'm starting to develop a f-fondness for this town.
But still, Kousagi Park is where I feel most safe.
D-Did you call me by any chance...?
(How did we end up in such a remote village...)
Miyako braided my hair b-before we came on this mission.
Heehee... This could be cute...

Sparrows, weasels, seagulls...
Wh-Why do wild animals keep c-coming to me...?
If...you happen to find any p-pretty rocks or shells, p-please bring them to me.
Sensei, will you c-collect pebbles? ...With m-me?

We should s-start heading back, but...
C-Can we collect pebbles t-together again?

Um, so does that mean...
I-I slip completely under everyone's notice...just like the p-pebbles...
Even touching the pebbles like that...w-won't help me stand out more...
This pebble is really pretty...!
I'm sorry... This is all I have to give you...
It's white...and shiny...
It's not much but...w-will you accept this...?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
It's fishing time. Sensei.
I don't think I can catch...anything here...
Is that...?
If only there were a fishing hole...
...Hm... Could we catch anything here?
...Huh? That sound...
Even at a place like this... Sensei is always the same. Thank you for always supporting...I mean helping me.

Lobby.Transcription:
Oh, Sensei.
I just got here...so maybe I shouldn't say this, but...
Let's go outside...
I've been waiting, Sensei.

We don't get this kind of opportunity often.
Let's make the most of it.

Sensei, is there anything you want to do?
Should we go out and do something? Or are you hungry?

I wore this for you, Sensei.
I'm going to catch a big one. Just wait.

Air conditioners and fans are great, but...
...cooling off in the water is better.
Sensei, do you know how to swim? Should I teach you?

Happy birthday, Sensei.
A birthday meal... How does sashimi sound?

Ah! My birthday...
You remembered. Thank you, Sensei.

It's the...new year. Happy new year, Sensei.
Yeah. Let's continue traveling together in the new year too.

Christmas...
I thought the water would be warm...but it's very cold.
...A little too cold.

Halloween... I saw some people wearing pumpkins on their heads.
...Should I try wearing one too?

Normal.Transcription: B-Blue...Archive...
Ugh... I hate the outdoors... Too hot, too humid... Why must summer be like this...?
Ah... There are too many people here...
Where oh where can I find some peace and quiet...?
I may be mistaken, but things seem busier here than usual...
*sigh* ...Geez.
Well... I suppose the atmosphere here isn't so bad.
Perhaps this is out of the blue, but I'm not sure if I'm worthy of all the things you do for me... I'm sorry. I said I wouldn't say things like that. I'll try my best if that's what you want, Sensei.

Lobby.Transcription:
Oh, Sensei! I've been waiting for you.
I've made you an Americano.

Welcome, Sensei. Allow me to...help...
Just as long as I don't have to go outside.
Indoors is better. I feel so much calmer indoors...

When it's just the two of us, it's so quiet and peaceful...
Oh, never mind. Forget I said anything.

I can help you organize files,
but I'm not so good with computers...
Maybe next time...we can try working in the old library?

If it's for you, I'll do anything.
It's not often, so...it's okay if it's a little weird.

Happy birthday, Sensei!
Oh, this outfit... There's no meaning behind it.

My birthday... I had forgotten.
Sensei, when I'm with you, I forget about everything else...

Happy New Year, Sensei.
This year...I'd like to stay indoors with you instead of going near the water.

Christmas...?
It was never a special day for me.
...At least not until I met you, Sensei.

It's noisy outside... Already...
Going to a quiet beach...I think that would be nicer.

Event.Transcription: Over here, Sensei. Preparations for the investigation have been made.
The summer is so hot... Even standing here doing nothing is exhausting...
Are we about halfway...?
Our investigation here will be over soon.
Let's check just in case...

S-Sensei? Wh-What's wrong?
Is there something on my face...?
Even if you suddenly call me like that...
If you need anything, just tell me in person...

Even though I don't really like being outside...
...it wasn't too bad since I got to be alone with you.
Now, let me summarize our investigation findings.
We've come to learn many things.
Hmm... Is there more to investigate?
There's nothing more to discover, not even if you investigated me...!
This...could be very meaningful.
For you, Sensei...

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
M-My name is Wakaba Hinata! Tell me whatever you need and I shall do my best!
Such lovely decor you have here...!
If you'd like something moved, do not hesitate to ask!
Hm? I feel as though someone is calling me...
Such a comfortable place we have here.
Sensei... Where could you be...?
I...don't know how to thank you enough... In fact, words may not be enough to express my gratitude. I'll repay your kindness with my actions, Sensei.

Lobby.Transcription:
I-I'm indebted to you for all you've done, Sensei.
What would you say to a nice walk on the beach...?

Welcome, Sensei.
I-I pray your day is filled with love and happiness.
Please let me help you with your work, Sensei!

Do I like summer...?
Yes, of course! I also like spring, autumn, and winter.
I wish to treasure the joy of summer and the joy of the seaside.
Hmm... To be honest, I find this outfit somewhat...embarrassing...
Ah, but my swimsuit won't interfere with my prayers, of course!

Happy birthday, Sensei!
I hope that I can say happy birthday to you again next year.

Oh, my birthday... You remembered!
Thank you... I'm so very happy.

Happy New Year, Sensei.
I wish you good health in the year to come.

It's Christmas!
This is a very special day for the Sisterhood.
...M-My outfit doesn't really matter!
It's Halloween! I'm so happy to see that everyone is having fun!

Event.Transcription: I've been waiting for you, Sensei!

Th-The preparations are complete.
Let me know if there's anything you need!
Just a little more! Stay strong!
Keep at it until the very end...!
Leave the cleanup to me.

It's hot... And the sun is so strong...
I-If you want, you may borrow my hat.
Oh? Sensei? What's wrong?
Uh, um... Sensei? If...you need something, just tell me...

Heehee! S-Sensei! Th-That tickles!
Hee! Ahahaha!!
Is there a particular item you're after?
Take a look around.
We still have time, so shall we look together?
S-Sensei... Haha! I-I'm okay... Hahaha!
Oh? Did you have something to say...?
Th-That's great! I think it's good too.
Yes! It's here!
That... I think that's very good! As expected, Sensei!
I'm glad you found what you were looking for!

Normal.Transcription: B-Blue Archive!
I've come to watch over you, Sensei! Anything risque is prohibited! No exceptions...!
Ugh, there are too many people here...
Wh-What's this...?!
Am I the only one dressed like this...?!
Sensei... Where are you...?
I-I'm not wearing this because I like it!
Th-This... Umm... Ah, I'm being rude...! Th-Thank you, Sensei! I'll keep doing my best! Th-That was good, right? See, I do know how to say thank you!

Lobby.Transcription: I've been waiting for you, Sensei! What's on the schedule today?
You're late, Sensei! What were you doing?!

Huh? My outfit...?
Wh-Why are you asking about it? No lewdness allowed! Death penalty!

You want me to do paperwork? I-I'm not sure about that...
I-I'll stand guard instead!
So this is what your work is like. Seems exhausting...
Don't you get sick of this place? Wouldn't you rather go to the beach instead? Or the mountains?
Heehee. Sensei, aren't you relieved to have me by your side?

Sensei, today's your birthday, right? Is there anything you want? You can tell me!
Oh... It can't be anything risque!

Oh, my birthday... You remembered...
Heehee. Thank you.
Happy New Year, Sensei. I hope we can go to the beach again this year... Heehee.

So, it's Christmas...
You want to go outside? When I'm dressed like this?
I-I warned you about risque thoughts! That's the death penalty!

Um, a swimsuit is NOT a Halloween costume!
Why would you ever think something like that?!

Event.Transcription: There's no time to waste, Sensei! Let's go!
As long as I'm here, there'll be no cutting corners!
Ha! That went smoothly!
Come on! Just a little more!
Maybe we should check one last time, just to be sure.
Eeek! You scared me, Sensei!
Why do you keep doing that...? Leave me alone.
Uh, seriously! If there's something you need, just tell me!
Hm? What's going on?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
The refreshing water feels so good. Sensei, do you like playing...in the water?
Oh my, that person...
What a cute place...
I think we'll get in trouble if we play in the water here.
Heehee, I feel someone's eyes on me. ♡
May I get closer?
Life changes everyone, but the old me would never have imagined today's me. And it's all thanks to you, Sensei.

Lobby.Transcription:
I've been waiting for you, Sensei.
Dressed like this the whole time, of course. ♡
There you are, Sensei. Would you like to go on a walk with me before work?

I think I've become more mischievous than I used to be.
Especially when it comes to you, Sensei.
If there's anything I can do for you, just let me know.
Aah, if you touch me there... Heehee. ♡
Heehee, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to give you a hard time, Sensei.
Am I underdressed? And here I thought I was wearing too much.

Today's your birthday, right, Sensei?
My gift is... Heeheehee. ♡

My birthday... Oh, right.
A gift...?
I've already got one!

Happy New Year, Sensei.
I hope we enjoy another peaceful year.

Christmas...
If I go out dressed like this, I'll be sure to draw attention. ♡
It's Halloween. I think everyone should wear a costume just like this one.

Event.Transcription: Shall we get started?
This is the start of a fun summer event. Heehee!
Ah... Is it too late to turn back...?

We're almost there.
It's a little lonely...
Let's look around to see if we missed anything.
Huh? What is it?
Wow, Sensei, I've never seen this side of you. ♥

Will you remember everything you did here?
Just be ready...when you return. ♥
Heeheehee... ♥
I'm excited to see what's in store for the future.
Everyone is waiting for you, Sensei.
Ah, something like that...in a place like this... ♥
Sensei, did something happen?
Wow, this is quite...
This was definitely worth all the hard work.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
The summer... The beach... It's all so blissful, Sensei. Of course, I haven't forgotten about my training.
I want to create a place where everyone can lay down their burdens.
A refreshing place. A place to rest.
It seems that everyone is enjoying themselves. I'm glad.
I wonder what Tsubaki and Kaede are doing...
I feel so sluggish and lazy... Is this the frightful power of summer...?
What a wonderful gift... I wish I could express in words how much appreciation I feel inside, but...it's hard to organize my thoughts... Th-Thank you, Sensei.

Lobby.Transcription: Hello, Sensei. I'm ready for whatever you have in store for me today.
Oh, Sensei! It's fine. I'm used to waiting.

"Summer." "Beach." They're such magical words.
So magical they almost made me forget to train...

Shall I attempt to read your mind, Sensei?
You...just want to spend some time with me, right?
Well? Am I right?
I came here today to help you work, Sensei...
But, I keep thinking of...other things... I need more training...

Would you like some lemonade? And perhaps a sandwich for a light snack...
I made plenty, so please, enjoy.

If you're hot...come sit under my parasol.
And...I've brought a knee pillow. How does that sound?

Sensei's birthday... What a fabulous day.
Heehee, happy birthday, Sensei!

You're wishing me...a happy birthday?
I'm so happy, really... So much so that I can't express it with words.
Heehee. I guess I already got my gift.

Happy New Year, Sensei.
It's the New Year already. Shall we make a wish together?
My wish? Heehee. It's a secret.

It's Christmas, Sensei. The day when good children get gifts...
So...what do you think, Sensei? Was I a good child?

Wow, it's Halloween. I've prepared all of my tricks and treats...
Oh? I don't have to prepare both? Come to think of it...

Event.Transcription:
Ah, please come in, Sensei.
This is the Beach Shack. I have many things to offer you.

I've been waiting for you, Sensei.
Helping the Festival Operations Department is very fulfilling.

A resort hunt... It's more complicated than I expected...
It's at times like this that I need to pull myself together.
I'd be lying if I said I wasn't nervous at first, but...
I owe this all to you, Sensei.

Memories of the beach in the summer... What a beautiful thing.
It seems especially beautiful today.

Sensei, did you call me?
Let me know if you ever need anything.

It's pretty hot. Be careful not to get heatstroke, Sensei.
If there's anything wrong, I'll take care of you.
Will Shizuko be okay? I'm a little worried.

It may seem like it'll be difficult to solve the case, but...
...it'll be okay if everyone works together.
This may be the best time to show off the results of my training.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Hallo! I'm Himeki Meru from the Knowledge Liberation Front! But you can call me by my pen name, Meruri. Nice to meet you, Sensei.
Now, where can I find some inspiration...?
Wait, wait... That view. Maybe...?
I need to work on my drawing skills...
If only my hands were faster...and my eyes and mind!
I publish all of my fan books under my pen name.
They say that a skilled painter doesn't discriminate between brushes. Still, her tools are important. What I'm trying to say is thank you, Sensei.

Lobby.Transcription:
Oh, welcome, Sensei!
All right, get to work! I'll be waiting!

LATE!!
Oh, you didn't make me wait. I also just got here.

Mm-hmm, mm-hmm...
Sensei, is it okay if I bring my art supplies here?
It's just that...I'd like to get some of my own work done while I'm here.
I know it's a bit off task, but...I've got a lot to do...

Art and knowledge both come from freedom.
So starting now...I'm going to start freely drawing you!

This is your battlefield, Sensei...!
I feel it... I can feel it. The energy! The chaos!

The greatest fan book authors start with a blank page...
In other words, I also have what it takes to become a great fan book author!

Happy birthday, Sensei! Congrats!
To celebrate, I'll draw your portrait!

Sensei, did you know? It's my birthday today!
...No, no. You don't need to take me anywhere! That's too much hassle!
Instead...let's just order some delivery.

Ah, another year begins. Happy New Year, Sensei.
Half of me wants to go out to celebrate the New Year, half of me wants to stay in.
Is there any way we can take care of this online?

When I was younger, I really wanted a Greatest Couple fan book for Christmas!
...Oh, I wished my little heart out for that book.
Ultimately, I realized I'd have to draw it myself if I wanted to make my heart's wish come true.

Halloween... Is the season of the pumpkin upon us...?!
We have no choice... Let's go out, Sensei! It's time to gather supplies!

Event.Transcription: Sensei's here. It's the Knowledge Liberation Front's time!

Welcome, Sensei. It looks like there's a lot going on. Let's head outside!
I hope we discover something to inspire my next book!
I never imagined things would turn out this way...

I can't believe how the story unfolded...
You really can never tell where life will lead you...

We've been through a lot, but things have settled down...
And we collected plenty, so ultimately, this was a success.

Did you call me?
Oh, I'm busy...ish.

I can trust Momiji to have my back.
Everyone has their own preferences, right?

Why? Sensei... Do you have too much time on your hands?
Well, I guess I can play with you for a bit.
Th-That tickles! Stop it! That's enough!

A mission!
Finishing each manuscript is a mission for me to complete!
I can handle anything entrusted to me! That's the Knowledge Liberation Front promise!

Yes? Sensei? ...You just wanted to call my name?
Wow. When you throw a line like that at me, I don't know how to respond.
Let's talk, Sensei! You keep saying things, and I'll put them in my next book!

Wow, that's amazing. Truly amazing. I'm not just saying that. I mean it!
Just look at how sincere my eyes are!

Mission complete! Come get your reward!
What do you think of my salesmanship smile?

Normal.Transcription: Blue. Archive.
I'm Akiizumi Momiji from the Red Winter Federal Academy Knowledge Liberation Front. Let's work together to protect all the world's knowledge!
...There just may be a rare, undiscovered book somewhere around here...
This is a good place to read.
Maybe I can sneak in a quick nap...
I was hoping to find the latest volumes...
This place seems like a good place to hide...doesn't it...?
For you, Sensei, I'll use it. What should I quiet down first...?

Lobby.Transcription: Oh, Sensei! Heehee... I've been waiting for you!

Oh! Were you looking for me?
J-Just one more minute! Let me finish this page...!

I like pretty books. Just looking at them makes me happy.
I like old and battered books too. They show the history the books have endured.

What do I like more, reading books or collecting them?
Hmm... Do I have to choose just one...?

I requested a book from the Secretariat, but I was rejected...
But I won't give up...!

What an unexpected twist... Hmm...
Oh, Sensei?!
I-I'm sorry! I didn't notice you...

An ending that tugs at the heartstrings, a scene where dreams come true... Isn't it amazing?!
These things don't happen too often in real life...

Happy birthday, Sensei.
I brought you a book I think you'll like.
Will you read it with me?

Y-You remembered my birthday?!
Oh, but I don't have anything to give you in return...!

You mean... I don't have to give you anything in return...?
If you're sure... This is all so new to me...

Happy New Year, Sensei!
I-If...it's okay with you, why don't you spend New Years with the Knowledge Liberation Front?

Merry Christmas, Sensei!
If I could ask Santa for a Christmas gift...
It'd be for a first edition book that I've been searching for...

I've read about Halloween in a lot of manga.
I guess that makes sense, since it's a day when all the monsters get together.

Event.Transcription:
Welcome, Sensei!
Heehee. I've been waiting!

Hi, Sensei!
If there's anything I can do, just let me know.

Seems like things are getting bigger and bigger...
But I'm sure it'll be okay, right, Sensei...?

It's too late to turn back now.
The Knowledge Liberation Front will push on!
Somehow, it's finally over... I'm just glad everyone's safe.
Yes? Did you call me, Sensei?

I wonder what Meru is doing right now...
I just hope she's not going crazy somewhere...

I like reading text just as much as looking at pictures.
Comics can teach us so many things.
S-Sensei? I feel embarrassed...when you look at me like that...
Are you looking for something, Sensei? Take your time.
I'm used to arranging and displaying things. Just leave it to me!

Look around as much as you'd like.
I'd hate for you to get the wrong things.

Managing the shop...?
This is nothing compared to managing the library.

What if there's an out-of-print first edition book mixed in here somewhere...? What should I do...?
Oh! I-I'm not saying I'd snatch it up for myself...!
Oh, so you picked that one.
Wait just a moment... Yes, here!

And...what's the line...?
"Oh! You have great taste!"

Thank you so much!
I was so professional just now! Heehee...
Welcome, Sensei. What would you like?

Are you getting your fortune?
Can I watch from the side? Heehee.
Is there something wrong?
Yes, Sensei? What's going on?

A little luck, just for you...
I've always wanted to say something like that!
Wow, you won! That's amazing, Sensei!
Sensei, you have really great luck! This is so great!

Can I see?
Hmm... This is pretty good!

Aah...
D-Don't be too sad. At least you have me, Sensei!

Normal.Transcription: Blue! Archive!
Whether you need keen scientific insight or a spirited cheer, just leave it to me!
Oh! There are so many people here!
This might be just the place I need!
Sensei, your decorating style is...fascinating!
Oh, what's that...?
While I'm at it, I should find an optimal cheering platform.
Allow me to explain how this gun works... Just kidding! Sensei, you already know... When you collect enough of this knowledge, one day...

Lobby.Transcription: Sensei, Sensei! You can do it! Stay strong!

I've been waiting for you, Sensei! Shall I cheer you on?
...You do need a cheer, don't you?

Oh, this outfit?
What do you think? Isn't it pretty?

Uh, umm... I'm not sure why, but...
I feel little embarrassed...
D-Don't just look at me like that. Please say something!
Schale needs cheerleaders too, so this cheer is just for you!

Do you know the history of cheerleading?
Oh... I see.

Happy birthday, Sensei!
Since today's your special day, I'll cheer you on in a special way!

M-My birthday...?! I-I never imagined that you'd remember...
I'm so happy! Hahaha!

Have a happy New Year!
I'll come cheer you on whenever you need it, Sensei!
Merry Christmas! Oh, did you know that Christmas started as...

Wow, it's so noisy outside!
Hmm... Do people know the real origin of Halloween?

Event.Transcription: Leave the cheering—and explaining—to me!

Play, play, run and play! You can do it, go Sensei!
How was that? Did it give you a burst of energy?
Things are heating up! You can do this!
Almost there! I'll cheer you on until the very end!

Ugh! I'm exhausted.
But I also feel...refreshed!
Oh? What is it?

Do you have a question for me?
Then, I...!

I-If you keep poking me like that...
This is a bit embarrassing...
Eek! W-Was that you, Sensei...?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive
The season of exercise...and appetite! There's a culinary feast to be enjoyed...and I have no choice but to take advantage of this opportunity.
Let us now depart on a gastronomic adventure.
So where should we head first...?
Eating is a noble pursuit.
No amount of exercising will do you any good if you don't eat well.
After we're done resting, shall we explore the street stalls?
I'll do my best. Especially for you, Sensei, since I know how much you care.

Lobby.Transcription:
Welcome, Sensei.
Can I ask you about today's schedule?

I can't believe you made me wait...
But for you, Sensei, I'll wait as long as you need. Heehee...
I'm already in my gym clothes, and part of me does want to compete, but...

Going to the games, cheering for my friends, and eating something delicious...
What a perfect order of events.

I feel somehow lighter dressed like this...
Gym clothes really are something special.

I feel more at peace than usual.
Could it be because of this outfit? Or perhaps because of Sensei...?
Heehee...

Sensei, after this, can you spare some time for me?
I'll take you to the best street stall.

Yes, of course I remember.
Today is your birthday, Sensei.
This outfit is so comfy and easy to move in. Why don't we go out?

I can't believe you're wishing me a happy birthday...
Thank you. I know I've already received my gift, but...

Well, it's only once a year, so maybe it's okay if I'm a little greedy...
Sensei, would you join me on a stroll through the street stalls?

Happy New Year, Sensei.
A day to celebrate the start of a new year...
And a great excuse to check out all the delicious offerings at the local food stalls.
Shall we go take a look?

Spending Christmas together... Heehee, what a wonderful thought.
I brought a dish that's just perfect for sharing.
Let's dig in!

I guess...some people think this is my Halloween costume...
I found out there's a food stall nearby that sells pumpkin snacks.
Shall we go check it out?

Event.Transcription: The Kivotos Halo Festival... It's the dawn of a new culinary era.

Thank you for coming, Sensei.
So, will you join me...
...in my conquest of the food stalls?

Sensei, are you enjoying yourself?
I myself couldn't be having more fun.

And so the Kivotos Halo Festival is coming to an end...
They say that good times are fleeting, but...
...memories are forever.
How are you holding up, Sensei? I've finished my conquest of the food stalls...

I don't gain weight easily, but I also can't eat much, so...
I'm always filled with regret about the food I couldn't try.

I need to move my body for a bit.
Would it be okay if I join the race? The bread-eating race, that is.

A Kivotos Halo Festival street stalls are like a culinary exhibition!
I'm convinced I'll find the ultimate flavor here somewhere...!

Sensei... Will you take a walk with me?
...It's nice to have a different outfit for a change.

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive.
Oh, have you come to pick me up? I would have gone myself if you'd asked. Once again, I am Ichika of the Trinity General School Justice Task Force. Please look after me!
Ah, so this is it? Sensei's Cafe!
I see. So this is how you like it...
It's very peaceful!
I'm relaxing...
Should I at least help clean...?
What should I say...? I'm thankful that you're treating me so kindly, but I don't know if I deserve it... Still... I'm happy. Really.

Lobby.Transcription: Welcome, Sensei! I'll do my best today too!

Ta-da! Ichika is here!
Or rather, it's Sensei that's here!

My, working here is quite comfortable!
Ah. I'm not saying that it's easy, of course. It's just very pleasant.

My most difficult work... I'd say it's breaking up fights.
Oh, you too, Sensei? We're the same.
I wish that everyone would simply relax and not get so worked up...
If I'm given a great responsibility, like Sensei has been... Will I be able to immerse myself in it completely?

Do you have a task for me? I'll do whatever you need!
I'm confident that I can complete any job you give me!

Happy birthday, Sensei!
Has anything good happened to you today? If not, let's make sure something good happens right now!

Hm... You want to know why I came all the way here on my birthday?
Right... Maybe I came...BECAUSE it's my birthday. Heehee!

Happy new year, Sensei!
I pray that this year, I might enjoy some leisure!

I'm sorry it's been so hectic since this morning!
The Justice Task Force has been called on to take care of all kinds of things.
My head is spinning!

Somehow, I've got a bad feeling...
Well, I'm sure it'll turn out all right, no? Haha!

Event.Transcription: Welcome! I'm ready as I'll ever be!
Let's get started!
Wouldn't you say there's about half left?
We're almost there. If there's anything I can do to help, please let me know!
Very good. I'll take a look around!
Yes. I'm right here.
Hm...? What's wrong?
I don't care for this kind of joke... Heehee.
Oh, Sensei. You don't have to call me like that multiple times. I'm always on standby right here.
Oh! Sensei! Perfect timing!
You're going to check the list, aren't you? I've prepared it for you!
Ah! What's this, Sensei? Are you going to do the same thing?
...Next time, come prepared!
Yes! Confirmation complete!
Is that it? Let's clean up!
That's it for today! So, Sensei. What are you going to do now?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!! Wahahaha!
Wahaha! Wherever there's a hot spring, so are we! And wherever there's no hot spring, we're there too! The explosives are primed for detonation!
Oh? This is...?
Right here. If we make a hot spring...
...Mm, too dangerous. Too many troublemakers here.
Even here...do I need to hide...?
Mm... I'm bored... I guess I could study.
Sensei... Are you sure you're okay with this? Sticking with me won't be easy. You've been warned. Whatever happens next is on you, okay? Wahaha!

Lobby.Transcription: Wow, Sensei! This place is pretty colorful!
You're finally here! I've been waiting, Sensei!

It's not like I'm just digging wherever I want, you know?
I have a little more sense than that.

Hm? There's more to developing a hot spring than digging around in the dirt?
I like building things too, of course!

We just never get to that stage, is all!
Wahaha! It's just one of the things I love about my job!

When I'm with you, Sensei, I'm just as happy as when I'm digging up hot springs.
Hahaha! Don't be so guarded!

If I'm arrested, please come visit me!
I'll be waiting! Hahaha!

Oh! Sensei, today's your birthday, isn't it?
It's a special day, so I'll make you a gift!

*sigh* The Prefect Team tried to nab me on the way to Schale. Again.
Really! Can't they give me a break on my birthday, of all days?

I wish you good fortune, Sensei! We survived another year!
Now, let's have another year full of digging!
I love Christmas! Security gets lax during the holidays, making it the perfect time to develop some hot springs!

It sure is rowdy here! Even the sound of the excavator will get drowned out in this noise...
Don't give me that look.

Event.Transcription: Wahaha! We meet again, Sensei!
Sensei! Over here! I've been waiting for you, you know?

You're...busy right about now, right?
Well then, why don't I help you out?

Now! The end of the work day is almost here!
There's no time to kick back and relax! Let's go!
Good work, Sensei. Let's go over it one more time!
Hm? Do you have something to say?
You think you can do whatever you want and I won't retaliate...? Just you wait!

Are you egging me on?
...Are you sure you can handle the consequences of this later on?
Wahaha! Don't tickle me! I'm too ticklish!
Now, what do you need?
Ah! We've got everything here! Everything except for what we don't! Wahaha!
The store's gonna close soon! Grab as much as you can!
Huh? What's wrong?
Don't get distracted or they'll sell out!
Hm, I see. You have a good eye, Sensei.
Excellent!
As expected! That's not bad at all!
You wanted that, did you?

Normal.Transcription: Blue Archive!
Hello Sensei! Welcome to Hot Spring Resort No. 227. Please make yourself at home.
(I feel a strange chill...)
